atk-s0517a:13: Yo sabbabhūtesu munīva aggo, anantasaṅkhesu jinattajesu;
atk-s0517a:20: Pāṭho visiṭṭho paṭisambhidānaṃ, maggoti tannāmavisesito ca.
atk-s0517a:24: Atthaṃ apubbaṃ anuvaṇṇayanto, suttañca yuttiñca anukkamanto.
atk-s0517a:25: Avokkamanto samayā sakā ca, anāmasanto samayaṃ parañca;
atk-s0517a:28: Sakkacca saddhammapakāsiniṃ taṃ, suṇātha dhāretha ca sādhu santoti.
atk-s0517a:29_0: Tattha paṭisambhidānaṃ maggoti tannāmavisesito cāti vuttattā paṭisambhidāmaggassa
atk-s0517a:29_1: paṭisambhidāmaggatā tāva vattabbā. Catasso hi paṭisambhidā – atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0517a:29_2: niruttipaṭisambhidā, paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti. Tāsaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ maggo adhigamūpāyoti
atk-s0517a:29_3: paṭisambhidāmaggo, paṭisambhidāpaṭilābhahetūti vuttaṃ hoti. Kathamayaṃ tāsaṃ maggo
atk-s0517a:29_4: hotīti ce? Pabhedato desitāya desanāya paṭisambhidāñāṇāvahattā. Nānābhedabhinnānañhi
atk-s0517a:29_5: dhammānaṃ nānābhedabhinnā desanā sotūnaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ paṭisambhidāñāṇappabhedañca
atk-s0517a:29_6: sañjaneti, puthujjanānaṃ āyatiṃ paṭisambhidāñāṇappabhedāya ca paccayo hoti. Vuttañca
atk-s0517a:29_7: – “pabhedato hi desanā ghanavinibbhogapaṭisambhidāñāṇāvahā hotī”ti. Ayañca nānābhedabhinnā
atk-s0517a:30_0: Tattha catassoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Paṭisambhidāti pabhedā. “Atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0517a:30_1: dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0517a:30_2: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttattā na aññassa kassaci pabhedā, ñāṇasseva
atk-s0517a:30_3: pabhedā. Tasmā “catasso paṭisambhidā”ti cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti attho. Atthappabhedassa
atk-s0517a:31_0: Tattha atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ. Tañhi yasmā hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati
atk-s0517a:31_1: pāpuṇīyati, tasmā atthoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yaṃkiñci paccayasamuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:31_2: bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā. Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0517a:32_0: Dhammoti saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-s0517a:32_1: tasmā dhammoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo,
atk-s0517a:32_2: bhāsitaṃ, kusalaṃ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā. Taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0517a:32_3: tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Ayameva hi attho abhidhamme –
atk-s0517a:33_0: “Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhe
atk-s0517a:33_1: ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:33_2: Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:34_0: “Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:34_1: atthapaṭisambhidā, yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā
atk-s0517a:35_1: jarāmaraṇanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:36_0: “Jātiyā ñāṇaṃ…pe… bhave ñāṇaṃ…pe… upādāne ñāṇaṃ…pe… taṇhāya ñāṇaṃ…pe… vedanāya ñāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0517a:36_1: phasse ñāṇaṃ….pe… saḷāyatane ñāṇaṃ….pe… nāmarūpe ñāṇaṃ…pe… viññāṇe ñāṇaṃ…pe… saṅkhāresu
atk-s0517a:36_2: ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhārasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhāranirodhe
atk-s0517a:36_3: ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:37_0: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti – suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ
atk-s0517a:37_1: jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati dhammapaṭisambhidā. So tassa tasseva
atk-s0517a:37_2: bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho’ti.
atk-s0517a:38_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ
atk-s0517a:38_1: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha tasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:38_2: samaye phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti. Ime dhammā kusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0517a:38_3: tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādinā nayena vibhajitvā vibhajitvā dassito.
atk-s0517a:39_0: Tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti abyabhicārivohāro,
atk-s0517a:39_1: tassa abhilāpe bhāsane udīraṇe taṃ lapitaṃ bhāsitaṃ udīritaṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ
atk-s0517a:39_2: ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti,
atk-s0517a:39_3: ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti evaṃ tassā dhammaniruttisaññitāya sabhāvaniruttiyā māgadhikāya
atk-s0517a:39_4: sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsāya pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā. Evamayaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā
atk-s0517a:39_5: saddārammaṇā nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā. Kasmā? Yasmā saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti,
atk-s0517a:39_6: ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti. Paṭisambhidāppatto hi “phasso”ti vutte “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti
atk-s0517a:39_7: jānāti, “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0517a:39_8: Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Aññaṃ panesa nāmākhyātaupasagganipātabyañjanasaddaṃ jānāti
atk-s0517a:39_9: na jānātīti? Yadaggena saddaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti
atk-s0517a:39_10: jānāti, tadaggena tampi jānissati. Taṃ pana nayidaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0517a:39_11: “bhāsaṃ nāma sattā uggaṇhantī”ti vatvā idaṃ kathitaṃ – mātāpitaro hi daharakāle kumārake
atk-s0517a:39_12: mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṃ taṃ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti, dārakā
atk-s0517a:39_13: tesaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ vavatthāpenti “iminā idaṃ vuttaṃ, iminā idaṃ vutta”nti. Gacchante
atk-s0517a:39_14: gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṃ jānanti. Mātā damiḷī, pitā andhako. Tesaṃ jātadārako
atk-s0517a:39_15: sace mātu kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ suṇāti, damiḷabhāsaṃ bhāsissati. Sace pitu kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0517a:39_16: suṇāti, andhakabhāsaṃ bhāsissati. Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ asuṇanto māgadhikabhāsaṃ bhāsissati.
atk-s0517a:40_0: Yopi agāmake mahāaraññe nibbatto, tattha añño kathento nāma natthi, sopi attano dhammatāya
atk-s0517a:40_1: vacanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhikabhāsameva bhāsissati. Niraye tiracchānayoniyaṃ pettivisaye
atk-s0517a:40_2: manussaloke devaloketi sabbattha māgadhikabhāsāva ussannā. Tattha sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā
atk-s0517a:40_4: na parivattati. Sammāsambuddhopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropento māgadhikabhāsāya
atk-s0517a:40_5: eva āropesi. Kasmā? Evañhi atthaṃ āharituṃ sukhaṃ hoti. Māgadhikabhāsāya hi tantiṃ
atk-s0517a:40_6: āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ sotapathāgamanameva papañco. Sote
atk-s0517a:40_7: pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti. Aññāya pana bhāsāya
atk-s0517a:40_8: tantiṃ āruḷhakaṃ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṃ hoti. Bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa
atk-s0517a:40_9: paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi, ariyasāvako no paṭisambhidāppatto nāma natthi.
atk-s0517a:41_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇamārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ ñāṇe pabhedagataṃ
atk-s0517a:41_1: ñāṇaṃ, yathāvuttesu vā tesu tīsu ñāṇesu gocarakiccādivasena vitthāragataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0517a:42_0: Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti, pañcahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0517a:42_1: visadā hontīti veditabbā. Katamesu dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti? Sekkhabhūmiyañca
atk-s0517a:42_4: paṭisambhidā asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatā, ānandattherassa, cittassa gahapatino,
atk-s0517a:42_5: dhammikassa upāsakassa, upālissa gahapatino, khujjuttarāya upāsikāyātievamādīnaṃ
atk-s0517a:42_6: paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:43_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi visadā honti? Adhigamena, pariyattiyā, savanena, paripucchāya,
atk-s0517a:43_1: pubbayogena. Tattha adhigamo nāma arahattappatti. Arahattañhi pattassa paṭisambhidā
atk-s0517a:43_2: visadā honti. Pariyatti nāma buddhavacanaṃ. Tañhi uggaṇhantassa paṭisambhidā visadā
atk-s0517a:43_3: honti. Savanaṃ nāma saddhammassavanaṃ. Sakkaccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā dhammaṃ suṇantassa
atk-s0517a:43_4: hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Paripucchā nāma pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā.
atk-s0517a:43_5: Uggahitapāḷiādīsu hi atthaṃ paripucchantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Pubbayogo
atk-s0517a:43_6: nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane yogāvacaratā gatapaccāgatikabhāvena yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ
atk-s0517a:43_7: pattavipassanānuyogo. Pubbayogāvacarassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti. Imehi pañcahi
atk-s0517a:44_0: Etesu pana kāraṇesu pariyatti savanaṃ paripucchāti imāni tīṇi pabhedasseva balavakāraṇāni.
atk-s0517a:44_1: Pubbayogo adhigamassa balavapaccayo, pabhedassa hoti na hotīti? Hoti, na pana tathā.
atk-s0517a:44_2: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā, pubbayogena pana pubbe ceva etarahi
atk-s0517a:44_3: ca saṅkhārasammasanaṃ vinā paṭisambhidā nāma natthi. Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā
atk-s0517a:48_0: Tattha pubbayogo vuttanayova. Bāhusaccaṃ nāma tesu tesu satthesu ca sippāyatanesu
atk-s0517a:48_1: ca kusalatā. Desabhāsā nāma ekasatavohārakusalatā, visesena pana māgadhike kosallaṃ.
atk-s0517a:48_2: Āgamo nāma antamaso opammavaggamattassapi buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ. Paripucchā
atk-s0517a:48_3: nāma ekagāthāyapi atthavinicchayapucchanaṃ. Adhigamo nāma sotāpannatā vā sakadāgāmitā
atk-s0517a:48_4: vā anāgāmitā vā arahattaṃ vā. Garusannissayo nāma sutapaṭibhānabahulānaṃ garūnaṃ
atk-s0517a:48_5: santike vāso. Mittasampatti nāma tathārūpānaṃyeva mittānaṃ paṭilābhoti.
atk-s0517a:49_0: Tattha buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca pubbayogañceva adhigamañca nissāya paṭisambhidā
atk-s0517a:49_1: pāpuṇanti, sāvakā sabbānipi etāni kāraṇāni. Paṭisambhidāppattiyā ca pāṭiyekko kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogo
atk-s0517a:49_2: nāma natthi, sekkhānaṃ pana sekkhaphalavimokkhantikā, asekkhānaṃ asekkhaphalavimokkhantikā
atk-s0517a:49_3: ca paṭisambhidāppatti hoti. Tathāgatānañhi dasa balāni viya ariyānaṃ ariyaphaleheva
atk-s0517a:49_4: paṭisambhidā ijjhantīti. Imāsaṃ catassannaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ maggoti paṭisambhidāmaggo,
atk-s0517a:49_5: paṭisambhidāmaggo eva pakaraṇaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggappakaraṇaṃ, pakārena karīyante vuccante
atk-s0517a:49_6: ettha nānābhedabhinnā gambhīrā atthā iti pakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:50_0: Tadetaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggappakaraṇaṃ atthasampannaṃ byañjanasampannaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīratthaṃ
atk-s0517a:50_8: lokānukampakena satthukappena dhammarājassa dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
atk-s0517a:50_9: bhāsitaṃ sutvā āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle yathāsutameva saṅgītiṃ āropitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:51_0: Tadetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ.
atk-s0517a:51_1: Dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu
atk-s0517a:51_2: mahānikāyesu khuddakamahānikāyapariyāpannaṃ. Suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ
atk-s0517a:51_3: itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallanti navasu satthu sāsanaṅgesu yathāsambhavaṃ
atk-s0517a:53: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0517a:54_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgārikattherena pana pañcasu ṭhānesu etadaggaṃ āropitena paṭiññātānaṃ
atk-s0517a:54_1: caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassānaṃ bhikkhuto gahitesu dvīsu dhammakkhandhasahassesu
atk-s0517a:54_2: anekasatadhammakkhandhasaṅgahitaṃ. Tassa tayo vaggā – mahāvaggo, majjhimavaggo, cūḷavaggoti.
atk-s0517a:54_3: Ekekasmiṃ vaggasmiṃ dasadasakaṃ katvā ñāṇakathādikā mātikākathāpariyosānā samatiṃsa
atk-s0517a:54_4: kathā. Evamanekadhā vavatthāpitassa imassa paṭisambhidāmaggappakaraṇassa anupubbaṃ
atk-s0517a:54_5: apubbapadatthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Imañhi pakaraṇaṃ pāṭhato atthato uddisantena ca
atk-s0517a:54_6: niddisantena ca sakkaccaṃ uddisitabbaṃ niddisitabbañca, uggaṇhantenāpi sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0517a:54_7: uggahetabbaṃ dhāretabbañca. Taṃ kissahetu? Gambhīrattā imassa pakaraṇassa lokahitāya
atk-s0517a:55: Tattha samatiṃsāya kathāsu ñāṇakathā kasmā ādito kathitāti ce? Ñāṇassa paṭipattimalavisodhakattena paṭipattiyā ādibhūtattā. Vuttañhi bhagavatā –
atk-s0517a:56: “Tasmātiha tvaṃ bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti ?
atk-s0517a:57: Ujukā diṭṭhīti hi sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmāpi ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:59_0: “Tatra, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi pubbaṅgamā hoti. Kathañca, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0517a:59_2: pajānāti. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi. Sammāsaṅkappaṃ ‘sammāsaṅkappo’ti pajānāti, micchāsaṅkappaṃ
atk-s0517a:59_8: pajānāti, micchāsamādhiṃ ‘micchāsamādhī’ti pajānāti. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhī”ti.
atk-s0517a:60: Pubbaṅgamabhūtāya hi sammādiṭṭhiyā siddhāya micchādiṭṭhīnampi micchādiṭṭhibhāvaṃ jānissatīti sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāva sodhetuṃ ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:61_0: “Apicudāyi, tiṭṭhatu pubbanto, tiṭṭhatu aparanto, dhammaṃ te desessāmi – imasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:61_1: sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati, imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā
atk-s0517a:62: Pubbantāparantadiṭṭhiyo ṭhapetvā ñāṇasseva vuttattā ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:63_0: “Alaṃ, subhadda, tiṭṭhatetaṃ ‘sabbe te sakāya paṭiññāya abbhaññiṃsu, sabbeva na abbhaññiṃsu,
atk-s0517a:63_1: udāhu ekacce abbhaññiṃsu, ekacce na abbhaññiṃsū’ti. Dhammaṃ te, subhadda, desessāmi,
atk-s0517a:63_2: taṃ suṇāhi sādhukaṃ manasikarohi, bhāsissāmī”ti ca –
atk-s0517a:64: Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavādānaṃ vāde ṭhapetvā ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa desitattā, aṭṭhaṅgike ca magge sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa padhānattā ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:65: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, sotāpattiyaṅgāni sappurisasaṃsevo, saddhammassavanaṃ, yoniso manasikāro, dhammānudhammapaṭipattī”ti ca –
atk-s0517a:66_0: “Saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ odahati,
atk-s0517a:66_1: ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ paññāya atthaṃ
atk-s0517a:66_2: upaparikkhati, atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā
atk-s0517a:66_3: chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussahitvā tuleti, tulayitvā padahati, pahitatto
atk-s0517a:66_4: kāyena ceva paramatthasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca naṃ paṭivijjha passatī”ti ca –
atk-s0517a:67: “Idha tathāgato loke uppajjati…pe… so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇa”nti ādīni ca –
atk-s0517a:68: Anekāni suttantapadāni anulomentena sutamaye ñāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā yathākkamena ñāṇakathā ādito kathitā.
atk-s0517a:69_0: Sā panāyaṃ ñāṇakathā uddesaniddesavasena dvidhā ṭhitā. Uddese “sotāvadhāne paññā
atk-s0517a:69_1: sutamaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena tesattati ñāṇāni mātikāvasena uddiṭṭhāni. Niddese “kathaṃ
atk-s0517a:69_2: sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ. ‘Ime dhammā abhiññeyyā’ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā
atk-s0517a:69_3: paññā sutamaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā nayena tāniyeva tesattati ñāṇāni vitthāravasena niddiṭṭhānīti.
atk-s0517a:74: 1. Tattha uddese tāva sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇanti ettha sotasaddo anekatthappabhedo. Tathā hesa –
atk-s0517a:77_0: “Sotāyatanaṃ sotadhātu sotindriya”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ sotasaddo maṃsasote dissati. “Sotena
atk-s0517a:77_1: saddaṃ sutvā”tiādīsu sotaviññāṇe. “Dibbāya sotadhātuyā”tiādīsu ñāṇasote. “Yāni sotāni
atk-s0517a:77_2: lokasminti yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni
atk-s0517a:77_3: paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni. Seyyathidaṃ – taṇhāsoto
atk-s0517a:77_4: diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu taṇhādīsu pañcasu dhammesu.
atk-s0517a:77_5: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu
atk-s0517a:77_6: udakadhārāyaṃ. “Ariyassetaṃ, āvuso, aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṃ, yadidaṃ soto”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:77_7: ariyamagge. “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṃ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṃ idha loke patiṭṭhitañca
atk-s0517a:77_8: paraloke patiṭṭhitañcā”tiādīsu cittasantatiyaṃ. Idha panāyaṃ maṃsasote daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0517a:77_9: Tena sotena hetubhūtena, karaṇabhūtena vā avadhīyati avatthāpīyati appīyatīti sotāvadhānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:77_10: Kiṃ taṃ? Sutaṃ. Sutañca nāma “bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo”tiādīsu viya
atk-s0517a:77_11: sotadvārānusārena viññātaṃ avadhāritaṃ dhammajātaṃ, taṃ idha sotāvadhānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:77_12: Tasmiṃ sotāvadhānasaṅkhāte sute pavattā paññā sotāvadhāne paññā. Paññāti ca tassa
atk-s0517a:77_13: tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā, tena tena vā aniccādinā
atk-s0517a:78: Sutamaye ñāṇanti ettha sutasaddo tāva saupasaggo anupasaggo ca –
atk-s0517a:81_0: Tathā hissa “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:81_1: vissutadhammassāti attho. “Avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassā”tiādīsu tintā tintassāti
atk-s0517a:81_2: attho. “Ye jhānapasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu anuyuttāti attho. “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu
atk-s0517a:81_3: upacitanti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññāta”ntiādīsu saddoti attho. “Bahussuto
atk-s0517a:81_4: hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo”tiādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti attho. Idha panassa
atk-s0517a:81_5: sotadvārānusārena viññātaṃ upadhāritanti attho. Sutamaye ñāṇanti yā esā etaṃ sutaṃ
atk-s0517a:81_6: viññātaṃ avadhāritaṃ saddhammaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇaṃ katvā sabbapaṭhamañca aparāparañca
atk-s0517a:81_7: pavattā paññā, taṃ “sutamaye ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ hoti, sutamayaṃ ñāṇanti attho. Sutamayeti
atk-s0517a:81_8: ca paccattavacanametaṃ, yathā “na hevaṃ vattabbe”. “Vanappagumbe yathā phussitagge”.
atk-s0517a:81_9: “Natthi attakāre natthi parakāre natthi purisakāre”tiādīsu paccattavacanaṃ, evamidhāpi
atk-s0517a:82_0: Atha vā sutena pakato phassādiko dhammapuñjo sutamayo, tasmiṃ sutamaye dhammapuñje
atk-s0517a:82_1: pavattaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ sutamaye ñāṇaṃ. Sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena dhamme
atk-s0517a:82_2: jānātīti ñāṇaṃ. Taṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pariyāyavacanena adhippāyapakāsanatthaṃ aniyamena “paññā”ti
atk-s0517a:82_3: vatvā pacchā adhippetaṃ “ñāṇa”nti niyametvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ñāṇañca nāma sabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:82_5: padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ araññagatasudesako viya. “Samāhito, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:82_6: bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato samādhipadaṭṭhānaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīsu hi sabhāvo
atk-s0517a:82_7: vā sāmaññaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ nāma, kiccaṃ vā sampatti vā raso nāma, upaṭṭhānākāro vā
atk-s0517a:82_8: phalaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:84: Pātimokkho satī ceva, ñāṇaṃ khanti tatheva ca;
atk-s0517a:86_0: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno
atk-s0517a:86_1: samannāgato”ti āgato pātimokkhasaṃvaro. “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti
atk-s0517a:86_2: nānubyañjanaggāhī. Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0517a:86_3: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ,
atk-s0517a:86_4: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”tiādinā nayena āgato satisaṃvaro.
atk-s0517a:90_0: Āgato ñāṇasaṃvaro. “Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:90_1: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”tiādinā nayena āgato paccayapaṭisevanāsaṃvaro,
atk-s0517a:90_2: sopi ñāṇasaṃvareneva saṅgahito. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya
atk-s0517a:90_4: sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ
atk-s0517a:90_5: adhivāsakajātiko hotī”ti āgato khantisaṃvaro. “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti
atk-s0517a:90_6: pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametī”tiādinā nayena āgato vīriyasaṃvaro.
atk-s0517a:90_7: “Idha ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī”ti āgato ājīvapārisuddhisaṃvaro,
atk-s0517a:90_8: sopi vīriyasaṃvareneva saṅgahito. Tesu sattasu saṃvaresu pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhipaccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātā
atk-s0517a:90_9: cattāro saṃvarā idhādhippetā, tesu ca visesena pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro
atk-s0517a:90_10: yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaroti vuccati. Sutamayañāṇe
atk-s0517a:90_11: vuttaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā saṃvarantassa saṃvaraṃ karontassa tasmiṃ saṃvare pavattā taṃsampayuttā
atk-s0517a:90_12: paññā “sutvāna saṃvare paññā”ti vuttā. Atha vā hetuatthe sutvāti vacanassa sambhavato
atk-s0517a:91_0: Sīlamaye ñāṇanti ettha sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? Samādhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:91_1: vā, kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Upadhāraṇaṃ vā, kusalānaṃ
atk-s0517a:91_2: dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvoti attho. Etadeva hi ettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū
atk-s0517a:91_3: anujānanti. Aññe pana “adhisevanaṭṭhena ācāraṭṭhena tassīlaṭṭhena siraṭṭhena sītalaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:94_0: Yathā hi nīlapītādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:94_1: nīlādibhedena bhinnassāpi sanidassanabhāvānatikkamanato, tathā sīlassa cetanādibhedena
atk-s0517a:94_2: anekadhā bhinnassāpi yadetaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ samādhānavasena kusalānañca dhammānaṃ
atk-s0517a:94_3: patiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ sīlanaṃ, tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ cetanādibhedena bhinnassāpi samādhānapatiṭṭhānabhāvānatikkamanato.
atk-s0517a:97: Tasmā idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma kiccaṭṭhena rasena dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, sampattiatthena rasena anavajjarasanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:100_0: Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ “kāyasoceyyaṃ vacīsoceyyaṃ manosoceyya”nti evaṃ vuttasoceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:100_1: sucibhāvena paccupaṭṭhāti gahaṇabhāvaṃ gacchati. Hirottappañca pana tassa viññūhi
atk-s0517a:100_2: padaṭṭhānanti vaṇṇitaṃ, āsannakāraṇanti attho. Hirottappe hi sati sīlaṃ uppajjati
atk-s0517a:100_3: ceva tiṭṭhati ca, asati neva uppajjati na tiṭṭhatīti evaṃvidhena sīlena sahagataṃ
atk-s0517a:100_4: taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ sīlamaye ñāṇaṃ. Atha vā sīlameva pakataṃ sīlamayaṃ, tasmiṃ sīlamaye
atk-s0517a:100_5: taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Asaṃvare ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇā ca, saṃvare ānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0517a:100_6: ca, saṃvarapārisuddhipaccavekkhaṇā ca, saṃvarasaṃkilesavodānapaccavekkhaṇā ca sīlamayañāṇeneva saṅgahitā.
atk-s0517a:101_0: 3. Saṃvaritvā samādahane paññāti sīlamayañāṇe vuttasīlasaṃvarena saṃvaritvā saṃvaraṃ
atk-s0517a:101_1: katvā sīle patiṭṭhāya samādahantassa upacārappanāvasena cittekaggataṃ karontassa
atk-s0517a:101_2: tasmiṃ samādahane pavattā taṃsampayuttā paññā. Samaṃ sammā ca ādahanaṃ ṭhapananti
atk-s0517a:102_0: Samādhibhāvanāmaye ñāṇanti ettha kusalacittekaggatā samādhi. Kenaṭṭhena samādhi?
atk-s0517a:102_1: Samādhānaṭṭhena samādhi. Kimidaṃ samādhānaṃ nāma? Ekārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ
atk-s0517a:102_2: sammā ca ādhānaṃ, ṭhapananti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā yassa dhammassānubhāvena ekārammaṇe
atk-s0517a:102_3: cittacetasikā samaṃ sammā ca avikkhipamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti, idaṃ samādhānanti
atk-s0517a:105_0: Bhāvīyati vaḍḍhīyatīti bhāvanā, samādhi eva bhāvanā samādhibhāvanā, samādhissa vā
atk-s0517a:105_1: bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā samādhibhāvanā. Samādhibhāvanāvacanena aññaṃ bhāvanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0517a:106_0: 4. Paccayapariggahe paññāti ettha paṭicca phalametīti paccayo. Paṭiccāti na vinā
atk-s0517a:106_1: tena, apaccakkhitvāti attho. Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho. Apica upakārakattho
atk-s0517a:106_2: paccayattho, tassa paccayassa bahuvidhattā paccayānaṃ pariggahe vavatthāpane ca paññā
atk-s0517a:107_1: dissati. Ayañhi “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
atk-s0517a:109: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti. –
atk-s0517a:111: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0517a:112: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. –
atk-s0517a:113_1: “Pārājikā dhammā saṅghādisesā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti
atk-s0517a:113_2: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti.
atk-s0517a:113_3: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”tiādīsu nissattatāyaṃ. “Jātidhammā jarādhammā maraṇadhammā”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:113_5: paccaye. “Ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā”tiādīsu paccayuppanne. Svāyamidhāpi
atk-s0517a:113_6: paccayuppanne daṭṭhabbo. Atthato pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti vā, paccayehi dhārīyantīti
atk-s0517a:113_7: vā, attano phalaṃ dhārentīti vā, attano paripūrakaṃ apāyesu apatamānaṃ dhārentīti
atk-s0517a:113_8: vā, sakasakalakkhaṇe dhārentīti vā, cittena avadhārīyantīti vā yathāyogaṃ dhammāti
atk-s0517a:113_9: vuccanti. Idha pana attano paccayehi dhārīyantīti dhammā, paccayasamuppannā dhammā
atk-s0517a:113_10: tiṭṭhanti uppajjanti ceva pavattanti ca etāyāti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayadhammānametaṃ
atk-s0517a:113_11: adhivacanaṃ. Tassaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Idañhi samādhibhāvanāmayañāṇe
atk-s0517a:113_12: vuttasamādhinā samāhitena cittena yathābhūtañāṇadassanatthāya yogamārabhitvā vavatthāpitanāmarūpassa
atk-s0517a:113_14: ñāṇa”nti avatvā eva kasmā “dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti vuttanti ce? Paccayapariggaheneva
atk-s0517a:113_15: paccayasamuppannapariggahassa siddhattā. Paccayasamuppanne hi apariggahite paccayapariggaho
atk-s0517a:113_16: na sakkā hoti kātuṃ. Tasmā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇagahaṇeneva tassa hetubhūtaṃ pubbe siddhaṃ
atk-s0517a:113_17: nāmarūpavavatthānañāṇaṃ vuttameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Kasmā dutiyatatiyañāṇaṃ viya
atk-s0517a:113_18: “samādahitvā paccayapariggahe paññā”ti na vuttanti ce? Samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhattā.
atk-s0517a:114: “Samādahitvā yathā ce vipassati, vipassamāno tathā ce samādahe;
atk-s0517a:115: Vipassanā ca samatho tadā ahu, samānabhāgā yuganaddhā vattare”ti. –
atk-s0517a:116_0: Hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā samādhiṃ avissajjetvā samādhiñca ñāṇañca yuganaddhaṃ katvā yāva
atk-s0517a:116_1: ariyamaggo, tāva ussukkāpetabbanti ñāpanatthaṃ “paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”micceva
atk-s0517a:117_0: 5. Atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññāti ettha attano
atk-s0517a:117_1: sabhāvaṃ, uppādādikkhaṇaṃ vā patvā ati itā atikkantāti atītā, tadubhayampi na āgatā
atk-s0517a:117_2: na sampattāti anāgatā, taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppādādiuddhaṃ pannā gatā pavattāti
atk-s0517a:117_3: paccuppannā. Addhā santatikhaṇapaccuppannesu santatipaccuppannaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0517a:117_5: kalāpavasena rāsiṃ katvā vavatthāne nicchayane sanniṭṭhāpane paññā.
atk-s0517a:118_0: Sammasane ñāṇanti sammā āmasane anumajjane pekkhaṇe ñāṇaṃ, kalāpasammasanañāṇanti
atk-s0517a:118_2: ṭhitassa “yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ
atk-s0517a:118_3: vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ aniccato
atk-s0517a:118_4: vavatthapeti, ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, dukkhato vavatthapeti, ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, anattato vavatthapeti,
atk-s0517a:118_5: ekaṃ sammasana”ntiādinā nayena vuttasammasanavasena pubbe vavatthāpite ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:118_6: khandhe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa kalāpasammasanañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:119_0: 6. Paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññāti santativasena paccuppannānaṃ
atk-s0517a:119_1: ajjhattaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammānaṃ vipariṇāmadassane bhaṅgadassane paññā. Yasmā “ime
atk-s0517a:119_2: dhammā uppajjitvā bhijjantī”ti udayaṃ gahetvāpi bhedeyeva cittaṃ ṭhapeti, tasmā avuttopi
atk-s0517a:119_3: udayo vuttoyeva hotīti veditabbo. Paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ dassanena vā udayadassanassa
atk-s0517a:119_4: siddhattā udayo vuttoyeva hoti. Na hi udayaṃ vinā dhammānaṃ uppannattaṃ sijjhati,
atk-s0517a:119_5: tasmā “paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādavipariṇāmānupassane paññā”ti avuttepi vuttameva
atk-s0517a:119_6: hotīti veditabbaṃ. “Udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti niyamitattā ca udayadassanaṃ siddhameva
atk-s0517a:119_7: hotīti anantaraṃ vuttassa sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā taṃsammasaneyeva pākaṭībhūte
atk-s0517a:119_8: udayabbaye pariggaṇhitvā saṅkhārānaṃ paricchedakaraṇatthaṃ udayabbayānupassanaṃ ārabhantassa
atk-s0517a:119_9: uppajjati udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṃ. Tañhi udayabbaye anupassanato udayabbayānupassanāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:120_0: 7. Ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti rūpakkhandhādiārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgato paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā passitvā.
atk-s0517a:120_1: Bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇanti tassa ārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgato paṭisaṅkhāya uppannassa
atk-s0517a:120_2: ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassane yā paññā, taṃ “vipassane ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ hoti. Vipassanāti
atk-s0517a:120_3: ca vividhā passanā vipassanā. Ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhātipi pāṭho. Tassattho – ārammaṇassa
atk-s0517a:120_4: paṭisaṅkhā jānanā passanāti vuttanayeneva ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā “bhaṅgānupassane paññā
atk-s0517a:120_5: vipassane ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ hoti. Yasmā pana bhaṅgānupassanāya eva vipassanā sikhaṃ
atk-s0517a:120_6: pāpuṇāti, tasmā visesetvā idameva “vipassane ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā udayabbayānupassanāya
atk-s0517a:120_7: ṭhitassa maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ uppajjati, tasmā tassā siddhāya taṃ siddhameva hotīti
atk-s0517a:120_8: taṃ avatvāva bhaṅgānupassanāya eva vipassanāsikhaṃ ñāṇaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Udayabbayānupassanāya
atk-s0517a:120_9: suparidiṭṭhaudayabbayassa suparicchinnesu saṅkhāresu lahuṃ lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu ñāṇe
atk-s0517a:120_10: tikkhe vahante udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅge eva sati santiṭṭhati, tassa “evaṃ uppajjitvā
atk-s0517a:120_11: evaṃ nāma saṅkhārā bhijjantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:121_1: pīḷāyogato sappaṭibhayavasena gahaṇūpagamane paññāti attho. Bhayato upaṭṭhātīti bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:121_2: ārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ bhayatupaṭṭhāne. Atha vā bhayato upatiṭṭhatīti bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:122_0: Ādīnave ñāṇanti bhummavacanameva. “Yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā, yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:122_1: yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā ekaṭṭhā, byañjanameva nāna”nti vuttattā ekamiva vuccamānampi
atk-s0517a:122_2: avatthābhedena muñcitukamyatādi viya tividhameva hoti. Tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānaādīnavānupassanāsu
atk-s0517a:122_3: siddhāsu nibbidānupassanā siddhā hotīti katvā avuttāpi vuttāva hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:123_0: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa
atk-s0517a:123_4: mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, tassa “atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0517a:123_5: anāgatāpi evameva nirujjhissantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:123_6: uppajjati. Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa
atk-s0517a:123_7: sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu neva tāṇaṃ na leṇaṃ na gati na paṭisaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0517a:123_8: sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso
atk-s0517a:123_9: vā na hoti, tayo bhavā vītaccitaṅgārapuṇṇā aṅgārakāsuyo viya, cattāro mahābhūtā ghoravisā
atk-s0517a:123_10: āsivisā viya, pañcakkhandhā ukkhittāsikā vadhakā viya, cha ajjhattikāyatanāni suññagāmo
atk-s0517a:123_11: viya, cha bāhirāyatanāni gāmaghātakacorā viya, sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nava ca sattāvāsā
atk-s0517a:123_12: ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā viya ca, sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā
atk-s0517a:123_13: rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā
atk-s0517a:123_14: hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi
atk-s0517a:123_15: savāḷakamiva vanagahanaṃ, sasaddūlā viya guhā, sagāharakkhasaṃ viya udakaṃ, samussitakhaggā
atk-s0517a:123_16: viya paccatthikā, savisaṃ viya bhojanaṃ, sacoro viya maggo, ādittamiva agāraṃ, uyyuttasenā
atk-s0517a:123_17: viya raṇabhūmi. Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṃviggo
atk-s0517a:123_18: lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati, evameva so yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena
atk-s0517a:123_19: sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṃ nirassādaṃ ādīnavameva passati.
atk-s0517a:124_1: sabhedake saṅkhāragate nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramati. Seyyathāpi nāma cittakūṭapabbatapādābhirato
atk-s0517a:124_2: suvaṇṇarājahaṃso asucimhi caṇḍālagāmadvāraāvāṭe nābhiramati, sattasu mahāsaresuyeva
atk-s0517a:124_3: abhiramati, evameva ayaṃ yogīrājahaṃso suparidiṭṭhādīnave sabhedake saṅkhāragate
atk-s0517a:124_4: nābhiramati, bhāvanārāmatāya pana bhāvanāratiyā samannāgatattā sattasu anupassanāsuyeva
atk-s0517a:124_5: abhiramati. Yathā ca suvaṇṇapañjarepi pakkhitto sīho migarājā nābhiramati, tiyojanasahassavitthate
atk-s0517a:124_6: pana himavanteyeva ramati, evamayampi yogīsīho tividhe sugatibhavepi nābhiramati,
atk-s0517a:124_7: tīsu anupassanāsuyeva ramati. Yathā ca sabbaseto sattappatiṭṭho iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo
atk-s0517a:124_8: chaddanto nāgarājā nagaramajjhe nābhiramati, himavati chaddantarahadeyeva ramati,
atk-s0517a:124_9: evamayaṃ yogīvaravāraṇo sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate nābhiramati, “anuppādo khema”ntiādinā
atk-s0517a:124_10: nayena niddiṭṭhe santipadeyeva ramati, tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāramānaso hoti. Ettāvatā
atk-s0517a:125_0: 9. Muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇanti muñcituṃ cajituṃ
atk-s0517a:125_1: kāmeti icchatīti muñcitukāmo, muñcitukāmassa bhāvo muñcitukamyatā. Paṭisaṅkhāti upaparikkhatīti
atk-s0517a:125_2: paṭisaṅkhā, paṭisaṅkhānaṃ vā paṭisaṅkhā. Santiṭṭhati ajjhupekkhatīti santiṭṭhanā,
atk-s0517a:125_3: santiṭṭhanaṃ vā santiṭṭhanā. Muñcitukamyatā ca sā paṭisaṅkhā ca santiṭṭhanā cāti
atk-s0517a:125_4: muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā. Iti pubbabhāge nibbidāñāṇena nibbinnassa uppādādīni
atk-s0517a:125_5: pariccajitukāmatā muñcitukamyatā. Muñcanassa upāyakaraṇatthaṃ majjhe paṭisaṅkhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:125_6: paṭisaṅkhā. Muñcitvā avasāne ajjhupekkhanaṃ santiṭṭhanā. Evaṃ avatthābhedena tippakārā
atk-s0517a:125_8: avatthābhedena bhinnānaṃ tissannampi paññānaṃ saṅkhārupekkhataṃ icchantena pana “paññā”ti
atk-s0517a:125_9: ca “saṅkhārupekkhāsū”ti ca bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ, avatthābhedena bhinnassāpi ekattā “ñāṇa”nti
atk-s0517a:125_10: ekavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Vuttañca – “yā ca muñcitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā
atk-s0517a:125_11: yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekaṭṭhā, byañjanameva nāna”nti. Keci pana “saṅkhārupekkhāsūti
atk-s0517a:125_12: bahuvacanaṃ samathavipassanāvasena saṅkhārupekkhānaṃ bahuttā”tipi vadanti. Saṅkhārupekkhāsūti
atk-s0517a:125_13: ca kiriyāpekkhanti veditabbaṃ. Avatthābhedena pana tena nibbidāñāṇena nibbindantassa
atk-s0517a:125_15: cittaṃ na sajjati na laggati na bajjhati, sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ muñcitukāmaṃ chaḍḍetukāmaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:126_0: Atha vā yathā jālabbhantaragato maccho, sappamukhagato maṇḍūko, pañjarapakkhitto
atk-s0517a:126_1: vanakukkuṭo, daḷhapāsavasaṃgato migo, ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappo, mahāpaṅkapakkhando
atk-s0517a:126_2: kuñjaro, supaṇṇamukhagato nāgarājā, rāhumukhapaviṭṭho cando, sapattaparikkhitto purisotievamādayo
atk-s0517a:126_3: tato tato muccitukāmā nissaritukāmāva honti, evaṃ tassa yogino cittaṃ sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā
atk-s0517a:126_4: muccitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ hoti. Evañhi vuccamāne “muccitukāmassa muccitukamyatā”ti
atk-s0517a:126_5: pāṭho yujjati. Evañca sati “uppādaṃ muñcitukamyatā”tiādīsu “uppādā muccitukamyatā”tiādi
atk-s0517a:126_6: vattabbaṃ hoti, tasmā purimo eva attho sundarataro. Athassa sabbasaṅkhāresu vigatālayassa
atk-s0517a:126_7: sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ muñcitukāmassa muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ uppajjati. So evaṃ sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate
atk-s0517a:126_8: sabhedake saṅkhāre muñcitukāmo muñcanassa upāyasampādanatthaṃ puna te eva saṅkhāre
atk-s0517a:126_9: paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassati. Evañhi vipassato cassa
atk-s0517a:126_10: aniccavasena nimittaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ uppajjati, dukkhavasena pavattaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_11: uppajjati, anattavasena nimittañca pavattañca paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ uppajjati. So paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena
atk-s0517a:126_12: “sabbe saṅkhārā suññā”ti disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto bhayañca
atk-s0517a:126_13: nandiñca vippahāya bhariyāya dosaṃ disvā vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso tassā bhariyāya
atk-s0517a:126_14: saṅkhāresu udāsīno hoti majjhatto, “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā na gaṇhāti. Tassa evaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_15: jānato evaṃ passato tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ patilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivattati na sampasāriyati.
atk-s0517a:126_16: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakaṃ poṇe udakaphusitāni patilīyanti paṭikuṭanti paṭivattanti
atk-s0517a:126_17: na sampasāriyanti. Seyyathāpi vā pana kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_18: patilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivattati na sampasāriyati, evaṃ tassa tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_19: patilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivattati na sampasāriyati, upekkhā saṇṭhāti. Evamassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_20: uppannaṃ hoti. Iminā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇena saddhiṃ upari gotrabhuñāṇassa sādhakaṃ
atk-s0517a:126_21: anulomañāṇaṃ pubbāparañāṇehi avuttampi vuttameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhi bhagavatā –
atk-s0517a:127_0: “So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā
atk-s0517a:127_1: samannāgato bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato
atk-s0517a:127_2: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, sammattaniyāmaṃ anokkamamāno
atk-s0517a:127_3: sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā sacchikarissatīti
atk-s0517a:129_0: “Katihākārehi anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati? Katihākārehi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati?
atk-s0517a:129_1: Cattālīsāya ākārehi anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati, cattālīsāya ākārehi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:131: “Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:132_0: Tassa hi taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa adhimokkhasaddhā
atk-s0517a:132_1: balavatarā hoti, vīriyaṃ supaggahitaṃ, sati sūpaṭṭhitā, cittaṃ susamāhitaṃ, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:132_2: tikkhataraṃ pavattati. Tassa idāni maggo uppajjissatīti saṅkhārupekkhāya saṅkhāre
atk-s0517a:132_3: “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:132_4: saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayeneva saṅkhāre “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā
atk-s0517a:132_5: ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ. Tadanantaraṃ tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:132_6: katvā dve tīṇi cattāri vā javanacittāni uppajjanti. Taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:132_7: Tañhi purimānañca aṭṭhannaṃ vipassanāñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi, upari ca pattabbānaṃ
atk-s0517a:132_8: sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anulometi. Yathā hi dhammiko rājā vinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-s0517a:132_9: nisinno aṭṭhannaṃ vohārikamahāmattānaṃ vinicchayaṃ sutvā agatigamanaṃ pahāya majjhatto
atk-s0517a:132_10: hutvā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodamāno tesañca vinicchayassa anulometi, porāṇassa ca rājadhammassa.
atk-s0517a:132_11: Tattha rājā viya anulomañāṇaṃ, aṭṭha vohārikamahāmattā viya aṭṭha vipassanāñāṇāni,
atk-s0517a:132_12: porāṇarājadhammo viya sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā, yathā rājā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodamāno
atk-s0517a:132_13: vohārikānañca vinicchayassa rājadhammassa ca anulometi, evamidaṃ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre
atk-s0517a:132_14: ārabbha uppajjamānānaṃ aṭṭhannañca vipassanāñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi, upari
atk-s0517a:132_15: ca pattabbānaṃ sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ. Tasmā anulomañāṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:133_0: 10. Bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā gotrabhuñāṇanti ettha bahiddhāti saṅkhāranimittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:133_1: Tañhi ajjhattacittasantāne akusalakkhandhe upādāya bahiddhāti vuttaṃ. Tasmā bahiddhā
atk-s0517a:133_2: saṅkhāranimittamhā vuṭṭhāti vigataṃ hutvā uddhaṃ tiṭṭhatīti vuṭṭhānaṃ, vivaṭṭati
atk-s0517a:133_3: parāvaṭṭati parammukhaṃ hotīti vivaṭṭanaṃ, vuṭṭhānañca taṃ vivaṭṭanañcāti vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭanaṃ. Tenevāha –
atk-s0517a:134: “Gotrabhuñāṇaṃ samudayassa asamucchindanato pavattā na vuṭṭhāti, nibbānārammaṇato pana nimittā vuṭṭhātīti ekato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0517a:135_0: Puthujjanagottābhibhavanato ariyagottabhāvanato gotrabhu. Idañhi anulomañāṇehi padumapalāsato
atk-s0517a:135_1: udakamiva sabbasaṅkhārato patilīyamānacittassa anulomañāṇassa āsevanante animittaṃ
atk-s0517a:135_2: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanabhūmiṃ
atk-s0517a:135_3: atikkamamānaṃ ariyagottaṃ ariyasaṅkhaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānaṃ nibbānārammaṇe paṭhamāvattanapaṭhamābhogapaṭhamasamannāhārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0517a:135_5: sādhayamānaṃ sikhāppattaṃ vipassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ apunarāvattakaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:136_0: 11. Dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇanti ettha dubhatoti ubhato, dvayatoti
atk-s0517a:136_1: vā vuttaṃ hoti. Kilesānaṃ samucchindanato kilesehi ca tadanuvattakakkhandhehi ca
atk-s0517a:136_2: nibbānārammaṇakaraṇato bahiddhā sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi ca vuṭṭhāti vivaṭṭatīti dubhato
atk-s0517a:137: “Cattāripi maggañāṇāni animittārammaṇattā nimittato vuṭṭhahanti, samudayassa samucchindanato pavattā vuṭṭhahantīti dubhato vuṭṭhānāni hontī”ti.
atk-s0517a:138_0: Magge ñāṇanti nibbānaṃ maggati pekkhati, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati anvesīyati,
atk-s0517a:138_1: kilese vā mārento gacchati pavattatīti maggo, tasmiṃ magge ñāṇaṃ. Jātiggahaṇena ekavacanaṃ
atk-s0517a:138_2: kataṃ. Tañhi gotrabhuñāṇassa anantaraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ sayaṃvajjhe kilese
atk-s0517a:138_4: pidahamānaṃ sattaariyadhanasammukhībhāvaṃ kurumānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ micchāmaggaṃ pajahamānaṃ
atk-s0517a:138_6: ca anekāni ānisaṃsasatāni paṭilābhayamānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0517a:139: Ṭhātuṃ icchaṃ puriso, laṅghitvā mātikāya paratīre;
atk-s0517a:141: Rajjuṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā, ullaṅghitvāna pāraninnatanu;
atk-s0517a:142: Pārāpanno pana taṃ, muñciya vedhaṃ patiṭṭhahati pāre.
atk-s0517a:144: Diṭṭhabhayo abhaye pana, ṭhātuṃ icchaṃ amatapāre.
atk-s0517a:149: Taṃ muñciya gotrabhunā, aladdhaāsevanena tu pavedhaṃ;
atk-s0517a:153: Candaṃ passeyya naro, yathā tathevānulomañāṇehi kamā;
atk-s0517a:154: Saccacchādakamohe, vināsite pekkhate hi gotrabhu amataṃ.
atk-s0517a:155: Vātā viya te candaṃ, amataṃ na hi pekkharenulomāni;
atk-s0517a:156: Puriso abbhāni yathā, gotrabhu na tamaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0517a:164: Aññe ca anekasate, ānīsaṃse dadāti ñāṇamidanti.
atk-s0517a:165_0: 12. Payogappaṭippassaddhipaññā phale ñāṇanti ettha payogoti bhuso yogo, phalasacchikiriyāya
atk-s0517a:165_1: maggabhāvanāya ubhato vuṭṭhānapayogo, tassa payogassa paṭippassambhanaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:165_2: payogapaṭippassaddhi. Kiṃ taṃ? Catumaggakiccapariyosānaṃ. Tassā payogapaṭippassaddhiyā
atk-s0517a:165_3: hetubhūtāya pavattā phale paññā payogappaṭippassaddhipaññā. Phalati vipaccatīti phalaṃ,
atk-s0517a:165_4: tasmiṃ phale taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Ekekassa hi maggañāṇassa anantarā tassa tasseva
atk-s0517a:165_5: vipākabhūtāni nibbānārammaṇāni tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā phalacittāni uppajjanti. Anantaravipākattāyeva
atk-s0517a:165_7: āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ. Yassa dve anulomāni, tassa tatiyaṃ gotrabhu, catutthaṃ
atk-s0517a:165_8: maggacittaṃ, tīṇi phalacittāni honti. Yassa tīṇi anulomāni, tassa catutthaṃ gotrabhu,
atk-s0517a:165_9: pañcamaṃ maggacittaṃ, dve phalacittāni honti. Yassa cattāri anulomāni, tassa pañcamaṃ
atk-s0517a:165_10: gotrabhu, chaṭṭhaṃ maggacittaṃ, ekaṃ phalacittaṃ hoti. Idaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0517a:165_11: Kālantaraphalaṃ pana samāpattivasena uppajjamānaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa uppajjamānañca eteneva saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:166_0: 13. Chinnavaṭumānupassane paññāti tena tena ariyamaggena samucchinnaṃ taṃ taṃ upakkilesaṃ
atk-s0517a:166_1: pacchā passane paññā. Vimuttiñāṇanti vimuttiyā ñāṇaṃ. Vimuttīti ca upakkilesehi vimuttaṃ
atk-s0517a:166_2: parisuddhaṃ cittaṃ, vimuttabhāvo vā. Tassā vimuttiyā jānanaṃ ñāṇaṃ vimuttiñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:166_3: Kilesehi vimuttaṃ cittasantatimpi kilesehi vimuttabhāvampi paccavekkhanto kilesehi
atk-s0517a:166_4: na vinā paccavekkhatīti etena pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. “Vimuttasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:166_5: vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti hi idameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:166_6: pana avuttampi imināva vuttaṃ hotīti gahetabbaṃ. Vuttañca –
atk-s0517a:168: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, iti vutto lakkhaṇo hāro”ti. ;
atk-s0517a:169: Atha vā arahato avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇābhāvā catunnaṃ ariyānaṃ labbhamānaṃ pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:170_0: 14. Tadā samudāgate dhamme passane paññāti tadā maggakkhaṇe phalakkhaṇe ca samudāgate
atk-s0517a:170_1: paṭilābhavasena ca paṭivedhavasena ca samāgate sampatte samaṅgibhūte maggaphaladhamme
atk-s0517a:170_2: catusaccadhamme ca passanā pekkhaṇā pajānanā paññā. Paccavekkhaṇe ñāṇanti nivattitvā
atk-s0517a:170_3: bhusaṃ passanaṃ jānanaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Iminā ca ñāṇadvayena paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni vuttāni honti.
atk-s0517a:170_4: Sotāpannassa hi maggavīthiyaṃ sotāpattiphalapariyosāne cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
atk-s0517a:170_5: tato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā maggapaccavekkhaṇatthāya manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0517a:170_6: tasmiṃ niruddhe paṭipāṭiyā satta maggapaccavekkhaṇajavanānīti. Puna bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā
atk-s0517a:170_7: teneva nayena phalādīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanādīni uppajjanti. Yesaṃ uppattiyā
atk-s0517a:170_8: esa maggaṃ paccavekkhati, phalaṃ paccavekkhati, pahīnakilese paccavekkhati, avasiṭṭhakilese
atk-s0517a:170_9: paccavekkhati, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati. So hi “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ
atk-s0517a:170_10: paccavekkhati, tato “ayaṃ me ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati, tato “ime nāma
atk-s0517a:170_11: me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati, tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti
atk-s0517a:170_12: uparimaggavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati, avasāne “ayaṃ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭiladdho”ti
atk-s0517a:170_13: amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati. Iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni
atk-s0517a:170_14: honti. Yathā ca sotāpannassa, evaṃ sakadāgāmianāgāmīnampi. Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:170_15: nāma natthīti cattāriyeva paccavekkhaṇāni. Evaṃ sabbāni ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni.
atk-s0517a:170_16: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedoyeva ceso. Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ sekkhānaṃ hoti vā
atk-s0517a:170_17: na vā. Tassa hi abhāvatoyeva mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ pucchi “kosu nāma me dhammo
atk-s0517a:170_18: ajjhattaṃ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:171_0: Ettha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇādīnaṃ ekādasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vibhāvanatthāya ayaṃ upamā veditabbā
atk-s0517a:171_1: – yathā puriso “macche gahessāmī”ti macchakhippaṃ gahetvā tadanurūpe udake osāretvā
atk-s0517a:171_2: khippamukhena hatthaṃ otāretvā antoudake kaṇhasappaṃ macchasaññāya gīvāya daḷhaṃ
atk-s0517a:171_3: gahetvā “mahā vata mayā maccho laddho”ti tuṭṭho ukkhipitvā passanto sovatthikattayadassanena
atk-s0517a:171_4: “sappo”ti sañjānitvā bhīto ādīnavaṃ disvā gahaṇe nibbinno muñcitukāmo hutvā muñcanassa
atk-s0517a:171_5: upāyaṃ karonto agganaṅguṭṭhato paṭṭhāya hatthaṃ nibbeṭhetvā bāhaṃ ukkhipitvā uparisīse
atk-s0517a:171_6: dve tayo vāre paribbhametvā sappaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā “gaccha re duṭṭhasappā”ti nissajjitvā
atk-s0517a:171_7: vegena thalaṃ āruyha ṭhitova “mahantassa vata bho sappassa mukhato muttomhī”ti haṭṭho
atk-s0517a:172_0: Tattha tassa purisassa macchasaññāya kaṇhasappaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā tussanaṃ viya imassa
atk-s0517a:172_1: yogino ādito bālaputhujjanassa aniccatādivasena bhayānakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ niccādisaññāya
atk-s0517a:172_2: “ahaṃ mamā”ti diṭṭhitaṇhāhi daḷhaṃ gahetvā tussanaṃ, tassa khippamukhato sappaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0517a:172_3: sovatthikattayaṃ disvā “sappo”ti sañjānanaṃ viya sappaccayanāmarūpapariggahena ghanavinibbhogaṃ
atk-s0517a:172_4: katvā kalāpasammasanādīhi ñāṇehi khandhapañcakassa aniccatādilakkhaṇattayaṃ disvā
atk-s0517a:172_5: “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tassa vavatthāpanaṃ, tassa bhāyanaṃ viya imassa bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:172_6: sappe ādīnavadassanaṃ viya ādīnavānupassanāñāṇaṃ, sappagahaṇe nibbindanaṃ viya nibbidānupassanāñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:172_7: sappaṃ muñcitukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ, muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṃ viya paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:172_8: sappaṃ paribbhametvā dubbalaṃ katvā nivattitvā ḍaṃsituṃ asamatthabhāvapāpanaṃ viya
atk-s0517a:172_9: tilakkhaṇāropanena saṅkhārupekkhānulomañāṇehi saṅkhāre paribbhametvā dubbalaṃ katvā
atk-s0517a:172_10: puna niccasukhattākārena upaṭṭhātuṃ asamatthatāpāpanaṃ, sappavissajjanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:172_11: sappaṃ vissajjetvā thalaṃ āruyha ṭhānaṃ viya nibbānathalaṃ āruyha ṭhitaṃ maggaphalañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:173_0: Imesañca sutamayañāṇādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ uppattikkamena paṭipattikkamena ca
atk-s0517a:173_1: desanakkamassa katattā paccavekkhaṇesu paṭhamaṃ kilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ hoti, tato maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇānīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:174_0: “Lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya, kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ
atk-s0517a:174_2: anavasesappahānāyā”ti ca kilesappahānaṃyeva adhikaṃ katvā maggapaṭipattiyā vuttattā
atk-s0517a:174_3: paṭipattānurūpeneva kilesapaccavekkhaṇassa ādibhāvo yujjati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakkamo
atk-s0517a:174_4: pana dassitoyeva. So pana kamo pañcavidho uppattikkamo pahānakkamo paṭipattikkamo
atk-s0517a:176: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesi nibbattatī ghano”ti. –
atk-s0517a:177_0: Evamādi uppattikkamo. “Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā, bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā”ti
atk-s0517a:177_3: evamādi paṭipattikkamo. “Kāmāvacarā dhammā, rūpāvacarā dhammā, arūpāvacarā dhammā”ti
atk-s0517a:177_4: evamādi bhūmikkamo. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā
atk-s0517a:177_5: pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti vā, “anupubbikathaṃ
atk-s0517a:177_6: kathesi. Seyyathidaṃ – dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ
atk-s0517a:177_7: saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesī”ti vā evamādi desanakkamo. Idha pana cuddasannaṃ
atk-s0517a:177_8: ñāṇānaṃ uppattikkamo paṭipattikkamo ca tadubhayavasena paṭipāṭiyā desitattā desanakkamo
atk-s0517a:178_0: 15. Idāni yasmā heṭṭhā sarūpena nāmarūpavavatthānañāṇaṃ na vuttaṃ, tasmā pañcadhā
atk-s0517a:178_1: nāmarūpappabhedaṃ dassetuṃ ajjhattavavatthāne paññā vatthunānatte ñāṇantiādīni pañca
atk-s0517a:178_2: ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni. Sakale hi nāmarūpe vutte yaṃ pariggahetuṃ sakkā, yañca pariggahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:178_3: taṃ pariggahessati. Lokuttaranāmañhi pariggahetuñca na sakkā anadhigatattā, na ca
atk-s0517a:178_5: mayaṃ attāti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmā”ti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā
atk-s0517a:178_6: pavattāti ajjhattā. Ajjhattasaddo panāyaṃ gocarajjhatte niyakajjhatte ajjhattajjhatte
atk-s0517a:178_7: visayajjhatteti catūsu atthesu dissati. “Tena, ānanda, bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:178_8: samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ, ajjhattarato samāhito”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:178_9: hi ayaṃ gocarajjhatte dissati. “Ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ, ajjhattaṃ vā dhammesu dhammānupassī
atk-s0517a:178_10: viharatī”tiādīsu niyakajjhatte. “Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, ajjhattikā dhammā”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:178_11: ajjhattajjhatte. “Ayaṃ kho, panānanda, vihāro tathāgatena abhisambuddho yadidaṃ sabbanimittānaṃ
atk-s0517a:178_12: amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu visayajjhatte, issariyaṭṭhāneti
atk-s0517a:178_13: attho. Phalasamāpatti hi buddhānaṃ issariyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Idha pana ajjhattajjhatte
atk-s0517a:178_14: daṭṭhabbo. Tesaṃ ajjhattānaṃ vavatthāne ajjhattavavatthāne. Vatthunānatteti vatthūnaṃ
atk-s0517a:178_15: nānābhāve, nānāvatthūsūti attho. Ettha javanamanoviññāṇassa paccayabhūto bhavaṅgamanopi
atk-s0517a:178_16: cakkhādipañcakaṃ viya uppattiṭṭhānattā vatthūti vutto. Āvajjanampi tannissitameva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:180: Bahiddhāti chahi ajjhattajjhattehi bahibhūtesu tesaṃ visayesu. Gocaranānatteti visayanānatte.
atk-s0517a:181: 17. Cariyāvavatthāneti viññāṇacariyāaññāṇacariyāñāṇacariyāvasena cariyānaṃ vavatthāne. “Cariyavavatthāne”ti rassaṃ katvāpi paṭhanti.
atk-s0517a:182_0: 18. Catudhammavavatthāneti kāmāvacarabhūmiādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena catunnaṃ
atk-s0517a:182_1: catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ vavatthāne. Bhūmīti ca “bhūmigatañca vehāsaṭṭhañcā”tiādīsu pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0517a:182_2: vattati. “Abhūmiṃ tāta, mā sevā”tiādīsu visaye. “Sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:182_3: uppajjanaṭṭhāne. Idha pana koṭṭhāse vattati. Paricchedetipi vadanti.
atk-s0517a:183_1: ca navannaṃ navannaṃ dhammānaṃ vavatthāne. Imesu ca pañcasu ñāṇesu paṭhamaṃ ajjhattadhammā
atk-s0517a:183_2: vavatthāpetabbāti vatthunānatte ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tato tesaṃ visayā vavatthāpetabbāti
atk-s0517a:183_3: tadanantaraṃ gocaranānatte ñāṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tato parāni tīṇi ñāṇāni tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0517a:184_0: 20. Idāni yasmā nāmarūpasseva pabhedato vavatthāpanañāṇaṃ ñātapariññā, tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:184_1: tīraṇapariññā, tadanantaraṃ pahānapariññāti tisso pariññā. Taṃsambandhā ca bhāvanāsacchikiriyā
atk-s0517a:184_2: honti, tasmā dhammanānattañāṇānantaraṃ ñātaṭṭhe ñāṇādīni pañca ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:184_3: Tisso hi pariññā ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā ca. Tattha “ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:184_4: rūpaṃ, vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0517a:184_5: pavattā paññā ñātapariññā nāma. “Rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, vedanā aniccā dukkhā
atk-s0517a:184_6: anattā”tiādinā nayena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāpaññā
atk-s0517a:184_7: tīraṇapariññā nāma. Tesuyeva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāva pahānapariññā nāma.
atk-s0517a:185_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiñhi
atk-s0517a:185_1: antare dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti. Kalāpasammasanato
atk-s0517a:185_2: paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi. Etasmiñhi antare sāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva
atk-s0517a:185_3: ādhipaccaṃ hoti. Bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0517a:185_4: hi “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0517a:185_5: anattato anupassanto attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto
atk-s0517a:185_6: rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahatī”ti
atk-s0517a:185_7: evaṃ niccasaññādipahānasādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:186_0: Tattha abhiññāpaññāti dhammānaṃ ruppanādisabhāvena jānanapaññā. Sā hi sobhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:186_1: abhisaddena “tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvajānanavasena sobhanaṃ jānana”nti katvā
atk-s0517a:186_2: abhiññāti vuccati. Ñātaṭṭhe ñāṇanti jānanasabhāvaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:187_0: 21. Pariññāpaññāti jānanapaññā. Sā hi byāpanaṭṭhena parisaddena “aniccādisāmaññalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0517a:187_1: sakiccasamāpanavasena vā byāpitaṃ jānana”nti katvā pariññāti vuccati. Tīraṇaṭṭhe
atk-s0517a:188: 22. Pahāne paññāti niccasaññādīnaṃ pajahanā paññā, pajahatīti vā, pajahanti etenāti vā pahānaṃ. Pariccāgaṭṭhe ñāṇanti pariccajanasabhāvaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:189: 23. Bhāvanāpaññāti vaḍḍhanapaññā. Ekarasaṭṭhe ñāṇanti ekakiccasabhāvaṃ ñāṇaṃ, vimuttirasena vā ekarasasabhāvaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:190: 24. Sacchikiriyāpaññāti paṭivedhavasena paṭilābhavasena vā paccakkhakaraṇapaññā. Phassanaṭṭhe ñāṇanti tadubhayavaseneva vindanasabhāvaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:191_1: honti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ ariyapuggalānaṃyeva labbhamānāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni
atk-s0517a:191_2: uddiṭṭhāni. Tatthāpi paccayuppanno attho dukkhasaccaṃ viya pākaṭo suviññeyyo cāti
atk-s0517a:191_3: paṭhamaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, tassa atthassa hetudhammavisayattā tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:191_5: tesu tīsupi ñāṇesu pavattanato tadanantaraṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ. Pa-kāraṃ
atk-s0517a:192_0: 29-31. Ito parāni vihāraṭṭhe ñāṇādīni tīṇi ñāṇāni ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato paṭisambhidāpabhedato
atk-s0517a:192_1: ca paṭisambhidāñāṇānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāni. Vihāraṭṭhe ñāṇañhi dhammapaṭisambhidā hoti,
atk-s0517a:192_2: samāpattaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Dhammasabhāve ñāṇañhi paṭisambhidākathāyaṃ
atk-s0517a:192_3: dhammapaṭisambhidāti vuttaṃ. Nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pana atthapaṭisambhidā eva. Tattha vihāranānatteti
atk-s0517a:192_5: Vihāroti ca sasampayuttā vipassanā eva. Samāpattinānatteti animittādivasena nānāphalasamāpattiyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:193_2: visesetvā aparenākārena vattukāmena tadeva “ānantarikasamādhimhi ñāṇa”nti uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:193_3: Tattha avikkhepaparisuddhattāti vikkhipati tena cittanti vikkhepo, uddhaccassetaṃ
atk-s0517a:193_4: nāmaṃ. Na vikkhepo avikkhepo, uddhaccapaṭipakkhassa samādhissetaṃ nāmaṃ. Parisuddhassa
atk-s0517a:193_5: bhāvo parisuddhattaṃ, avikkhepassa parisuddhattaṃ avikkhepaparisuddhattaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0517a:193_6: avikkhepaparisuddhattā samādhissa parisuddhabhāvenāti attho. Idañhi āsavasamucchedassa
atk-s0517a:193_7: anantaraphaladāyakattassa ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Āsavasamucchedeti ettha āsavantīti āsavā,
atk-s0517a:193_8: cakkhutopi…pe… manatopi sandanti pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammato yāva gotrabhuṃ,
atk-s0517a:193_9: okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savantīti vā āsavā, etaṃ dhammaṃ etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā
atk-s0517a:193_10: pavattantīti attho. Antokaraṇattho hi ayaṃ ā-kāro. Cirapārivāsikaṭṭhena madirādayo
atk-s0517a:193_11: āsavā viyātipi āsavā. Lokasmiñhi cirapārivāsikā madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti. Yadi
atk-s0517a:193_12: ca cirapārivāsikaṭṭhena āsavā, eteyeva bhavitumarahanti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0517a:194: “Purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:195: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā, samucchijjati etenāti samucchedo. Paññāti kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ samucchede paññā.
atk-s0517a:196_0: Ānantarikasamādhimhi ñāṇanti attano pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalappadānato
atk-s0517a:196_1: ānantarikoti laddhanāmo maggasamādhi. Na hi maggasamādhimhi uppanne tassa phaluppattinisedhako
atk-s0517a:197_0: “Ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā
atk-s0517a:197_1: assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya, yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0517a:197_2: ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ṭhitakappī. Sabbepi maggasamaṅgino puggalā ṭhitakappino”ti.
atk-s0517a:199_0: 33. Iminā maggañāṇena phalappattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato imassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:199_1: araṇavihārañāṇādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni. Tatrāpi ca arahatoyeva satatameva
atk-s0517a:199_2: ca sambhavato araṇavihāre ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, tadanantaraṃ nirodhassa anāgāmiarahantānaṃ
atk-s0517a:199_3: sambhavepi bahusambhārattā visesena ca nirodhassa nibbānasammatattā ca nirodhasamāpattiyā
atk-s0517a:199_4: ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, tadanantaraṃ parinibbānassa kālantare parinibbānakālaṃ āhacca ṭhitattā
atk-s0517a:199_5: dīghakālikanti parinibbāne ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, tadanantaraṃ samasīsaṭṭhassa sabbakilesakhayānantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:199_6: parinibbānakālaṃ āhacca ṭhitattā rassakālikanti samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0517a:199_7: santo cāti ca-kāro dassanādhipateyyañca santo vihārādhigamo ca paṇītādhimuttatā cāti
atk-s0517a:199_8: tīhipi padehi sambandhitabbo. Dassananti vipassanāñāṇaṃ, adhipatiyeva ādhipateyyaṃ,
atk-s0517a:199_9: adhipatito vā āgatattā ādhipateyyaṃ, dassanañca taṃ ādhipateyyañcāti dassanādhipateyyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:199_10: Viharatīti vihāro, viharanti tena vāti vihāro, adhigammati pāpuṇīyatīti adhigamo,
atk-s0517a:199_11: vihāro eva adhigamo vihārādhigamo. So ca kilesapariḷāhavirahitattā nibbutoti santo.
atk-s0517a:199_12: So ca arahattaphalasamāpattipaññā. Uttamaṭṭhena atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇīto, padhānabhāvaṃ
atk-s0517a:199_13: nītoti vā paṇīto, paṇīte adhimutto visaṭṭhacitto tapparamo paṇītādhimutto, tassa
atk-s0517a:199_14: bhāvo paṇītādhimuttatā. Sā ca phalasamāpattādhimuttā pubbabhāgapaññā eva.
atk-s0517a:200_0: Araṇavihāreti nikkilesavihāre. Rāgādayo hi raṇanti satte cuṇṇenti pīḷentīti raṇā,
atk-s0517a:200_1: raṇanti etehi sattā kandanti paridevantīti vā raṇā. Vutto tividhopi vihāro. Natthi
atk-s0517a:200_2: etassa raṇāti araṇo. Vividhe paccanīkadhamme haranti etenāti vihāro. Tasmiṃ araṇe
atk-s0517a:200_3: vihāre. Niddesavāre vuttapaṭhamajjhānādīni ca paṇītādhimuttatāya eva saṅgahitāni.
atk-s0517a:200_4: Phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitukāmatāya hi paṭhamajjhānādiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttadhamme
atk-s0517a:200_5: vipassati, yā ca araṇavibhaṅgasuttante bhagavatā desitā araṇapaṭipadā, sāpi imināva
atk-s0517a:201_0: “Araṇavibhaṅgaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi…pe… na kāmasukhaṃ anuyuñjeyya hīnaṃ gammaṃ
atk-s0517a:201_1: pothujjanikaṃ anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ, na ca attakilamathānuyogaṃ anuyuñjeyya dukkhaṃ
atk-s0517a:201_2: anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ. Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā
atk-s0517a:201_3: tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya
atk-s0517a:201_4: nibbānāya saṃvattati. Ussādanañca jaññā, apasādanañca jaññā, ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca
atk-s0517a:201_5: ñatvā nevussādeyya na apasādeyya, dhammameva deseyya. Sukhavinicchayaṃ jaññā, sukhavinicchayaṃ
atk-s0517a:201_6: ñatvā ajjhattaṃ sukhamanuyuñjeyya, rahovādaṃ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṃ bhaṇe,
atk-s0517a:201_7: ataramānova bhāseyya no taramāno, janapadaniruttiṃ nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṃ nātidhāveyyāti.
atk-s0517a:201_8: Ayamuddeso araṇavibhaṅgassa …pe… tatra, bhikkhave, yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṃ
atk-s0517a:201_9: ananuyogo hīnaṃ…pe… anatthasaṃhitaṃ, adukkho eso dhammo avighāto anupāyāso apariḷāho
atk-s0517a:201_10: sammāpaṭipadā. Tasmā eso dhammo araṇo…pe… tatra, bhikkhave, yo attakilamathānuyogaṃ
atk-s0517a:201_11: ananuyogo dukkhaṃ anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ. Adukkho eso dhammo …pe… tasmā eso dhammo
atk-s0517a:201_12: araṇo. Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā…pe… adukkho
atk-s0517a:201_13: eso dhammo…pe… tasmā eso dhammo araṇo…pe… tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ nevussādanā na
atk-s0517a:201_14: apasādanā dhammadesanā ca, adukkho eso dhammo…pe… tasmā eso dhammo araṇo…pe… tatra,
atk-s0517a:201_15: bhikkhave, yadidaṃ nekkhammasukhaṃ pavivekasukhaṃ upasamasukhaṃ sambodhisukhaṃ, adukkho
atk-s0517a:201_16: eso dhammo…pe… tasmā eso dhammo araṇo…pe… tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ rahovādo bhūto
atk-s0517a:201_17: taccho atthasaṃhito, adukkho eso dhammo…pe… tasmā eso dhammo araṇo …pe… tatra, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:201_18: yvāyaṃ sammukhā khīṇavādo bhūto taccho atthasaṃhito, adukkho eso dhammo…pe… tasmā
atk-s0517a:201_19: eso dhammo araṇo…pe… tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ ataramānassa bhāsitaṃ, adukkho eso
atk-s0517a:201_20: dhammo…pe… tasmā eso dhammo araṇo…pe… tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ janapadaniruttiyā
atk-s0517a:201_21: ca anabhiniveso samaññāya ca anatisāro, adukkho eso dhammo…pe… tasmā eso dhammo araṇoti.
atk-s0517a:201_22: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, saraṇañca dhammaṃ jānissāma, araṇañca dhammaṃ jānissāma. Saraṇañca
atk-s0517a:201_23: dhammaṃ ñatvā araṇañca dhammaṃ ñatvā araṇaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjissāmāti evañhi vo,
atk-s0517a:201_24: bhikkhave, sikkhitabbaṃ. Subhūti ca pana, bhikkhave, kulaputto araṇapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno”ti.
atk-s0517a:202_0: Tattha majjhimā paṭipadā dassanādhipateyyena ca santena vihārādhigamena ca saṅgahitā.
atk-s0517a:202_1: Kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathaṃ ananuyogo majjhimā paṭipadā eva. Arahato hi vipassanāpubbabhāgamajjhimā
atk-s0517a:202_2: paṭipadā hoti, arahattaphalasamāpatti aṭṭhaṅgamaggavasena majjhimā paṭipadā ca. Sesā
atk-s0517a:202_3: pana paṇītādhimuttatāya eva saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Kiñcāpi sabbepi arahanto araṇavihārino,
atk-s0517a:202_5: micchāpaṭipannā”ti puggalavasenāpi ussādanāpasādanāni katvā dhammaṃ desenti. Subhūtitthero
atk-s0517a:202_6: pana “ayaṃ micchāpaṭipadā, ayaṃ sammāpaṭipadā”ti dhammavaseneva dhammaṃ desesi. Teneva
atk-s0517a:202_7: bhagavā taṃyeva araṇapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannoti ca vaṇṇesi, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0517a:202_8: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti ca araṇavihārīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0517a:203_0: 34. Dvīhi balehīti samathabalavipassanābalehi. Samannāgatattāti yuttattā paripuṇṇattā
atk-s0517a:203_1: vā. Tayo cāti vibhattivipallāso, tiṇṇañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṅkhārānanti vacīsaṅkhārakāyasaṅkhāracittasaṅkhārānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:203_2: Paṭippassaddhiyāti paṭippassaddhatthaṃ nirodhatthaṃ, appavattatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:203_3: Soḷasahīti aniccānupassanādīni aṭṭha, maggaphalāni aṭṭhāti soḷasahi. Ñāṇacariyāhīti
atk-s0517a:203_4: ñāṇappavattīhi. Navahīti rūpārūpāvacarasamādhi tadupacāro cāti navahi. Vasibhāvatā
atk-s0517a:203_5: paññāti lahutā, yathāsukhavattanaṃ issariyaṃ vaso, so assa atthīti vasī, vasino bhāvo
atk-s0517a:203_6: vasibhāvo, vasibhāvo eva vasibhāvatā, yathā pāṭikulyameva pāṭikulyatā. Evaṃvidhā
atk-s0517a:203_7: paññā vasibhāvatāya paññāti vā attho. Si-kāraṃ dīghaṃ katvā ca paṭhanti. Samannāgatattā
atk-s0517a:203_8: ca paṭippassaddhiyā ca ñāṇacariyāhi ca samādhicariyāhi cāti ca-kāro sambandhitabbo.
atk-s0517a:204_0: Nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇanti anāgāmiarahantānaṃ nirodhasamāpattinimittaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yathā
atk-s0517a:204_1: ajinamhi haññate dīpīti. Nirodhasamāpattīti ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa abhāvamattaṃ,
atk-s0517a:204_2: na koci dhammo, paññattimattaṃ abhāvamattattā nirodhoti ca. Samāpajjantena samāpajjīyati
atk-s0517a:205_0: 35. Sampajānassāti sammā pakārehi jānātīti sampajāno. Tassa sampajānassa. Pavattapariyādāneti
atk-s0517a:205_1: pavattanaṃ pavattaṃ, samudācāroti attho. Kilesapavattaṃ khandhapavattañca. Tassa
atk-s0517a:205_2: pavattassa pariyādānaṃ parikkhayo appavatti pavattapariyādānaṃ. Tasmiṃ pavattapariyādāne.
atk-s0517a:205_3: Parinibbāne ñāṇanti arahato kāmacchandādīnaṃ parinibbānaṃ appavattaṃ anupādisesaparinibbānañca
atk-s0517a:205_4: paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ kilesaparinibbāne khandhaparinibbāne ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:206_0: 36. Sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ. Sammā samucchedeti santatisamucchedavasena
atk-s0517a:206_1: suṭṭhu nirodhe. Nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatāti nirodhe gate puna na upaṭṭhānatāya, puna
atk-s0517a:206_2: anuppattiyanti attho. Sammāsamucchede ca nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatā cāti ca-kāro sambandhitabbo.
atk-s0517a:207_0: Samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇanti nekkhammādīni sattatiṃsa samāni, taṇhādīni terasa sīsāni. Paccanīkadhammānaṃ
atk-s0517a:207_1: samitattā samāni, yathāyogaṃ padhānattā ca koṭittā ca sīsāni. Ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe
atk-s0517a:207_2: vā ekasmiṃ roge vā sabhāgasantativasena ekasmiṃ jīvitindriye vā nekkhammādīni samāni
atk-s0517a:207_3: ca saddhādīni sīsāni ca assa santīti samasīsī, samasīsissa attho samasīsaṭṭho. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:207_4: samasīsaṭṭhe, samasīsibhāveti attho. Ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe roge vā sabhāgasantativasena
atk-s0517a:207_5: jīvite vā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā tasmiṃyeva iriyāpathe roge sabhāgajīvite vā cattāri
atk-s0517a:207_6: maggaphalāni patvā, tasmiṃyeva parinibbāyantassa arahatoyeva samasīsibhāvo hotīti
atk-s0517a:207_7: tasmiṃ samasīsibhāve ñāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttañca puggalapaññattiyaṃ, tassā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
atk-s0517a:208: “Katamo ca puggalo samasīsī? Yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samasīsī”ti.
atk-s0517a:209_0: “Samasīsiniddese apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā, santatipaccuppannavasena ekavāraṃyeva,
atk-s0517a:209_1: ekakālaṃyevāti attho. Pariyādānanti parikkhayo. Ayanti ayaṃ puggalo samasīsī nāma
atk-s0517a:209_2: vuccati. So panesa tividho hoti iriyāpathasamasīsī rogasamasīsī jīvitasamasīsīti.
atk-s0517a:209_3: Tattha yo caṅkamantova vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā caṅkamantova parinibbāti,
atk-s0517a:209_4: yo ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā ṭhitakova parinibbāti, yo nisinnova
atk-s0517a:209_5: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā nisinnova parinibbāti, yo nipannova vipassanaṃ
atk-s0517a:209_6: ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā nipannova parinibbāti, ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma. Yo
atk-s0517a:209_7: pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena
atk-s0517a:209_8: parinibbāti, ayaṃ rogasamasīsī nāma. Kataro jīvitasamasīsī? Terasa sīsāni. Tattha
atk-s0517a:209_9: kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ
atk-s0517a:209_10: pariyādiyati, avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti, jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ
atk-s0517a:209_11: cittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ aññaṃ, jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ
atk-s0517a:209_12: cittaṃ aññaṃ. Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati, so jīvitasamasīsī
atk-s0517a:209_13: nāma. Kathamidaṃ samaṃ hotīti? Vārasamatāya. Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Sotāpattimagge
atk-s0517a:209_14: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni, sakadāgāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge cattārīti
atk-s0517a:209_15: ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyati. Imāya
atk-s0517a:209_16: vārasamatāya eva ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma. Tenāyaṃ puggalo ‘jīvitasamasīsī’ti
atk-s0517a:210_0: 37. Idāni yasmā sutamayasīlamayabhāvanāmayañāṇāni vaṭṭapādakāni sallekhā nāma na
atk-s0517a:210_1: honti, lokuttarapādakāneva etāni ca aññāni ca ñāṇāni sallekhāti vuccanti, tasmā paccanīkasallekhanākārena
atk-s0517a:210_2: pavattāni ñāṇāni dassetuṃ samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇānantaraṃ sallekhaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:210_3: Tattha puthunānattatejapariyādāne paññāti lokuttarehi asammissaṭṭhena puthūnaṃ rāgādīnañca
atk-s0517a:210_5: dussīlyādīnañca pariyādāne khepane paññā, nekkhammādimhi sattatiṃsabhede dhamme paññāti
atk-s0517a:210_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā puthubhūtā nānattabhūtā ca tejā eva tesaṃ puthubhūtānaṃ nānattabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0517a:210_7: dussīlyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ tejānaṃ pariyādāne paññāti attho. Tejehiyeva puthūnaṃ nānattānañca
atk-s0517a:211_0: Sallekhaṭṭhe ñāṇanti paccanīkadhamme sallekhati samucchindatīti sallekho, tasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:211_1: nekkhammādike sattatiṃsappabhede sallekhasabhāve ñāṇaṃ. “Pare vihiṃsakā bhavissanti,
atk-s0517a:211_2: mayamettha avihiṃsakā bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā sallekhasuttante
atk-s0517a:211_3: vutto catucattālīsabhedopi sallekho iminā saṅgahitoyevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:212_0: 38. Idāni sallekhe ṭhitena kattabbaṃ sammappadhānavīriyaṃ dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ vīriyārambhe
atk-s0517a:212_1: ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭheti kosajjavasena asallīno
atk-s0517a:212_2: asaṅkucito attā assāti asallīnatto. Attāti cittaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:214: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā”ti. ādi –
atk-s0517a:215_0: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahito pesito vissaṭṭho attā etenāti pahitatto. Attāti
atk-s0517a:215_1: attabhāvo. Yathāha – “yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:215_2: Asallīnatto ca so pahitatto cāti asallīnattapahitatto. Sahajātadhamme paggaṇhāti
atk-s0517a:215_3: upatthambhetīti paggaho, paggaho eva attho paggahaṭṭho, paggahasabhāvoti attho. Asallīnattapahitattassa
atk-s0517a:215_5: “Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi appaṭivānaṃ padaheyyātha. Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi
atk-s0517a:215_6: ca avasissatu, upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena
atk-s0517a:215_7: purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ, na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0517a:215_8: vuttattā asallīnattapahitattavacanena padhānasmiṃ appaṭivānitā anivattanatā vuttā.
atk-s0517a:215_9: Paggahaṭṭhavacanena pana kosajjuddhaccavimuttaṃ samappavattaṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:216_0: Vīriyārambhe ñāṇanti vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ, vīrānaṃ vā kammaṃ, vidhinā vā nayena upāyena
atk-s0517a:216_1: īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti vīriyaṃ. Tadetaṃ ussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0517a:216_3: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ, vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ
atk-s0517a:216_4: mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho vīriyārambho. Iminā sesārambhe paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0517a:216_5: Ayañhi ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ vīriye hiṃsāyaṃ vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
atk-s0517a:219_0: Ettha hi kammaṃ ārambhoti āgataṃ. “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
atk-s0517a:219_1: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphalā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikiriyā. “Ārambhatha
atk-s0517a:219_2: nikkamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti ettha vīriyaṃ. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:219_3: ārambhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā. “Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī”ti ettha
atk-s0517a:219_4: chedanabhañjanādikaṃ vikopanaṃ. Idha pana vīriyameva adhippetaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “vīriyasaṅkhāto
atk-s0517a:219_5: ārambho vīriyārambho”ti. Vīriyañhi ārabhanakavasena ārambhoti vuccati. Tasmiṃ vīriyārambhe
atk-s0517a:219_6: ñāṇaṃ. Asallīnattā pahitattātipi paṭhanti, asallīnabhāvena pahitabhāvenāti attho.
atk-s0517a:220_0: 39. Idāni sammāvāyāmasiddhaṃ maggaphalaṃ pattena lokahitatthaṃ dhammadesanā kātabbāti
atk-s0517a:220_1: dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ atthasandassane ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha nānādhammappakāsanatāti
atk-s0517a:220_2: sabbasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatavasena nānādhammānaṃ pakāsanatā dīpanatā desanatā. Pakāsanatāti
atk-s0517a:220_3: ca pakāsanā eva. Atthasandassaneti nānāatthānaṃ paresaṃ sandassane. Dhammā ca atthā ca te eva.
atk-s0517a:221_0: 40. Idāni paresaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassentassa tassa ariyapuggalassa yathāsabhāvadhammadesanākāraṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:221_1: dassanavisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ dassanavisuddhiñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0517a:221_3: ca kāmacchandādīnaṃ nānattassa ca nekkhammādīnaṃ ekattassa ca paṭivedho, abhisamayoti
atk-s0517a:221_4: attho. So pana maggapaññā phalapaññā ca. Maggapaññā saccābhisamayakkhaṇe saccābhisamayavasena
atk-s0517a:221_5: paṭivijjhatīti paṭivedho, phalapaññā paṭividdhattā paṭivedho. Ekasaṅgahatāti ettha
atk-s0517a:221_6: jātisaṅgaho, sañjātisaṅgaho, kiriyāsaṅgaho, gaṇanasaṅgahoti catubbidho saṅgaho. Tattha
atk-s0517a:221_7: “sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu, sabbe brāhmaṇā, sabbe vessā, sabbe suddā āgacchantu”,
atk-s0517a:221_8: “yā, cāvuso visākha, sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā
atk-s0517a:221_9: sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ jātisaṅgaho nāma. “Ekajātikā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne
atk-s0517a:221_10: viya hi idha sabbe jātiyā ekasaṅgahitā. “Sabbe kosalakā āgacchantu, sabbe māgadhikā,
atk-s0517a:221_11: sabbe bhārukacchakā āgacchantu”, “yo, cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati,
atk-s0517a:221_12: yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0517a:221_13: “Ekaṭṭhāne jātā saṃvaḍḍhā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe jātiṭṭhānena
atk-s0517a:221_14: nivutthokāsena ekasaṅgahitā. “Sabbe hatthārohā āgacchantu, sabbe assārohā āgacchantu,
atk-s0517a:221_15: sabbe rathikā āgacchantu”, “yā, cāvuso visākha, sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo,
atk-s0517a:221_16: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho nāma. Sabbeva hi te attano
atk-s0517a:221_17: kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahitā. “Cakkhāyatanaṃ katamaṃ khandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, cakkhāyatanaṃ
atk-s0517a:221_18: rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati. Hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena
atk-s0517a:221_19: vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0517a:221_20: Ayamidha adhippeto. Tathaṭṭhādīsu dvādasasu ākāresu visuṃ visuṃ ekena saṅgaho gaṇanaparicchedo
atk-s0517a:222_0: Dassanavisuddhiñāṇanti maggaphalañāṇaṃ dassanaṃ. Dassanameva visuddhi dassanavisuddhi,
atk-s0517a:222_1: dassanavisuddhi eva ñāṇaṃ dassanavisuddhiñāṇaṃ. Maggañāṇaṃ visujjhatīti dassanavisuddhi,
atk-s0517a:223_0: 41. Idāni dassanavisuddhisādhakāni vipassanāñāṇāni dvidhā dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ khantiñāṇapariyogāhaṇañāṇāni
atk-s0517a:223_1: uddiṭṭhāni. Tattha viditattā paññāti rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ aniccādito viditattā pavattā
atk-s0517a:223_2: paññā. Khantiñāṇanti viditameva khamatīti khanti, khanti eva ñāṇaṃ khantiñāṇaṃ. Etena
atk-s0517a:223_3: adhivāsanakhantiṃ paṭikkhipati. Etaṃ kalāpasammasanādivasena pavattaṃ taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:224_0: 42. Phuṭṭhattā paññāti rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ aniccādivasena ñāṇaphassena phuṭṭhattā pavattā
atk-s0517a:224_1: paññā. Pariyogāhaṇe ñāṇanti phuṭṭhameva pariyogāhati pavisatīti pariyogāhaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:224_2: Gā-kāraṃ rassaṃ katvāpi paṭhanti. Etaṃ bhaṅgānupassanādivasena pavattaṃ tikkhavipassanāñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:224_3: Keci pana “vipassanāñāṇameva saddhāvāhissa khantiñāṇaṃ, paññāvāhissa pariyogāhaṇañāṇa”nti
atk-s0517a:224_4: vadanti. Evaṃ sante etāni dve ñāṇāni ekassa na sambhavanti, tadasambhave ekassa sāvakassa
atk-s0517a:224_5: sattasaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇāni na sambhavanti, tasmā taṃ na yujjati.
atk-s0517a:225_0: 43. Idāni yasmā puthujjanā sekkhā ca vipassanūpage khandhādayo dhamme sakale eva
atk-s0517a:225_1: sammasanti, na tesaṃ ekadesaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ padesavihāro na labbhati, arahatoyeva
atk-s0517a:225_2: yathāruci padesavihāro labbhatīti dassanavisuddhisādhakāni ñāṇāni vatvā tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:225_3: arahato dassanavisuddhisiddhaṃ padesavihārañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha samodahane paññāti
atk-s0517a:225_4: khandhādīnaṃ ekadesassa vedanādhammassa samodahanapaññā, sampiṇḍanapaññā rāsikaraṇapaññā.
atk-s0517a:226_0: Padesavihāre ñāṇanti khandhādīnaṃ padesena ekadesena avayavena vihāro padesavihāro,
atk-s0517a:226_1: tasmiṃ padesavihāre ñāṇaṃ. Tattha padeso nāma khandhapadeso āyatanadhātusaccaindriyapaccayākārasatipaṭṭhānajhānanāmarūpadhammapadesoti
atk-s0517a:226_2: nānāvidho. Evaṃ nānāvidho cesa vedanā eva. Kathaṃ? Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vedanākkhandhavasena
atk-s0517a:226_3: khandhekadeso, dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ vedanāvasena dhammāyatanekadeso, aṭṭhārasannaṃ
atk-s0517a:226_4: dhātūnaṃ vedanāvasena dhammadhātekadeso, catunnaṃ saccānaṃ vedanāvasena dukkhasaccekadeso,
atk-s0517a:226_5: bāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ pañcavedanindriyavasena indriyekadeso, dvādasannaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ
atk-s0517a:226_6: phassapaccayā vedanāvasena paccayākārekadeso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ vedanānupassanāvasena
atk-s0517a:226_7: satipaṭṭhānekadeso, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sukhaupekkhāvasena jhānekadeso, nāmarūpānaṃ
atk-s0517a:226_8: vedanāvasena nāmarūpekadeso, kusalādīnaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ vedanāvasena dhammekadesoti
atk-s0517a:226_9: evaṃ vedanā eva khandhādīnaṃ padeso, tassā vedanāya eva paccavekkhaṇavasena padesavihāro.
atk-s0517a:227_0: 44. Idāni yasmā samādhibhāvanāmayañāṇādīni bhāventā puthujjanā sekkhā ca te te bhāvetabbabhāvanādhamme
atk-s0517a:227_1: adhipatī jeṭṭhake katvā tena tena pahātabbe tappaccanīke nānāsabhāve dhamme anekādīnave
atk-s0517a:227_2: ādīnavato paccavekkhitvā tassa tassa bhāvanādhammassa vasena cittaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0517a:227_3: te te paccanīkadhamme pajahanti. Pajahantā vipassanākāle sabbasaṅkhāre suññato disvā
atk-s0517a:227_4: pacchā samucchedena pajahanti, tathā pajahantā ca ekābhisamayavasena saccāni paṭivijjhantā
atk-s0517a:227_5: pajahanti. Yathāvutteheva ākārehi sabbepi ariyā yathāyogaṃ paṭipajjanti, tasmā padesavihārañāṇānantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:227_6: saññāvivaṭṭañāṇādīni cha ñāṇāni yathākkamena uddiṭṭhāni. Tattha adhipatattā paññāti
atk-s0517a:227_7: nekkhammādīnaṃ adhipatibhāvena nekkhammādīni adhikāni katvā tadadhikabhāvena pavattā
atk-s0517a:227_8: paññāti attho. Saññāvivaṭṭe ñāṇanti saññāya vivaṭṭanaṃ parāvaṭṭanaṃ parammukhabhāvoti
atk-s0517a:227_9: saññāvivaṭṭo, yāya saññāya te te bhāvanādhamme adhipatiṃ karoti, tāya saññāya hetubhūtāya,
atk-s0517a:227_10: karaṇabhūtāya vā tato tato kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭane ñāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etto vivaṭṭoti
atk-s0517a:227_11: avuttepi yato vivaṭṭati, tato eva vivaṭṭoti gayhati yathā vivaṭṭanānupassanāya. Sā
atk-s0517a:227_12: pana saññā sañjānanalakkhaṇā, tadevetanti puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā
atk-s0517a:227_14: hatthidassakaandhā viya, ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā vijju
atk-s0517a:227_15: viya, yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ purisāti uppannasaññā viya.
atk-s0517a:228_0: 45. Nānatte paññāti nānāsabhāve bhāvetabbato aññasabhāve kāmacchandādike ādīnavadassanena
atk-s0517a:228_1: pavattā paññā. Nānatteti ca nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Nānattappahānaṃ vā nānattaṃ,
atk-s0517a:228_2: nānattappahānanimittaṃ nānattappahānahetu nekkhammādīsu paññāti adhippāyo. Cetovivaṭṭe
atk-s0517a:228_3: ñāṇanti cetaso kāmacchandādito vivaṭṭanaṃ nekkhammādīsu ñāṇaṃ. Cetoti cettha cetanā
atk-s0517a:228_4: adhippetā. Sā cetanābhāvalakkhaṇā, abhisandahanalakkhaṇā vā, āyūhanarasā, saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-s0517a:228_6: ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussāhanabhāvena pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0517a:229_0: 46. Adhiṭṭhāne paññāti nekkhammādivasena cittassa patiṭṭhāpane paññā. Cittavivaṭṭe
atk-s0517a:229_1: ñāṇanti kāmacchandādipahānavasena cittassa vivaṭṭane ñāṇaṃ. Cittañcettha vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:230: 47. Suññate paññāti attattaniyasuññatāya anattānattaniye pavattā anattānupassanā paññā. Ñāṇavivaṭṭe ñāṇanti ñāṇameva abhinivesato vivaṭṭatīti vivaṭṭo, taṃ ñāṇavivaṭṭabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:231_0: 48. Vosagge paññāti ettha vosajjatīti vosaggo, kāmacchandādīnaṃ vosaggo nekkhammādimhi
atk-s0517a:231_1: paññā. Vimokkhavivaṭṭe ñāṇanti kāmacchandādikehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, vimokkho eva
