atk-s0517a:232_0: 49. Tathaṭṭhe paññāti ekekassa saccassa catubbidhe catubbidhe aviparītasabhāve kiccavasena
atk-s0517a:232_1: asammohato pavattā paññā. Saccavivaṭṭe ñāṇanti catūsu saccesu dubhato vuṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0517a:232_2: vivaṭṭatīti saccavivaṭṭo, so eva ñāṇaṃ. Ekameva ñāṇaṃ adhipatikatadhammavasena saññāvivaṭṭoti,
atk-s0517a:232_4: vimokkhavivaṭṭoti evaṃ catudhā vuttaṃ. Anattānupassanāva suññatākāravasena “ñāṇavivaṭṭe
atk-s0517a:232_5: ñāṇa”nti vuttā. Maggañāṇameva heṭṭhā “magge ñāṇa”nti ca, “ānantarikasamādhimhi ñāṇa”nti
atk-s0517a:232_6: ca dvidhā vuttaṃ, vivaṭṭanākāravasena “saccavivaṭṭe ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:233_0: 50. Idāni tassa saccavivaṭṭañāṇavasena pavattassa āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇassa vasena pavattāni
atk-s0517a:233_1: kamato cha abhiññāñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni. Tatthāpi lokapākaṭānubhāvattā ativimhāpananti
atk-s0517a:233_2: paṭhamaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, cetopariyañāṇassa visayato dibbasotañāṇaṃ oḷārikavisayanti
atk-s0517a:233_3: dutiyaṃ dibbasotañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, sukhumavisayattā tatiyaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:233_5: uddiṭṭhaṃ, paccuppannānāgatatamavinodakattā dutiyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, sabbatamasamucchedakattā
atk-s0517a:233_6: tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha kāyampīti rūpakāyampi. Cittampīti
atk-s0517a:233_7: pādakajjhānacittampi. Ekavavatthānatāti parikammacittena ekato ṭhapanatāya ca dissamānakāyena,
atk-s0517a:233_8: adissamānakāyena vā gantukāmakāle yathāyogaṃ kāyassapi cittassapi missīkaraṇatāya
atk-s0517a:233_9: cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyoti cettha sarīraṃ. Sarīrañhi asucisañcayato kucchitānaṃ kesādīnañceva
atk-s0517a:233_10: cakkhurogādīnaṃ rogasatānañca āyabhūtato kāyoti vuccati. Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañcāti
atk-s0517a:233_11: ettha catutthajjhānasampayuttaṃ ekaṃyeva saññaṃ ākāranānattato dvidhā katvā samuccayattho
atk-s0517a:233_12: ca-saddo payutto. Catutthajjhānasmiñhi upekkhā santattā sukhanti vuttā, taṃsampayuttā
atk-s0517a:233_13: saññā sukhasaññā. Sāyeva nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādipaccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññā.
atk-s0517a:233_14: Adhiṭṭhānavasenāti adhikaṃ katvā ṭhānavasena, pavisanavasenāti adhippāyo. Adhiṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0517a:233_15: cāti ca-saddo sambandhitabbo. Ettāvatā sabbappakārassa iddhividhassa yathāyogaṃ kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:234_0: Ijjhanaṭṭhe paññāti ijjhanasabhāve paññā. Iddhividhe ñāṇanti ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi,
atk-s0517a:234_1: nipphattiatthena paṭilābhaṭṭhena cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yañhi nipphajjati paṭilabbhati
atk-s0517a:234_2: ca, taṃ ijjhatīti vuccati. Yathāha – “kāmaṃ kāmayamānassa, tassa cetaṃ samijjhatī”ti.
atk-s0517a:234_3: Tathā “nekkhammaṃ ijjhatīti iddhi, paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriyaṃ, arahattamaggo ijjhatīti
atk-s0517a:234_4: iddhi, paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriya”nti. Aparo nayo – ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi, upāyasampadāyetaṃ
atk-s0517a:234_5: adhivacanaṃ. Upāyasampadā hi ijjhati adhippetaphalappasavanato. Yathāha – “ayaṃ kho
atk-s0517a:234_6: citto gahapati sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, sace paṇidahissati, anāgatamaddhānaṃ rājā assaṃ
atk-s0517a:234_7: cakkavattīti. Ijjhissati hi sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti. Aparo nayo – etāya
atk-s0517a:234_8: sattā ijjhantīti iddhi, ijjhantīti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:234_9: Iddhi eva vidhaṃ iddhividhaṃ, iddhikoṭṭhāso iddhivikappoti attho. Taṃ iddhividhaṃ
atk-s0517a:235_1: attano vitakkavipphāravasena vitakkavegavasena. Vitakkoti cettha vitakketīti vitakko,
atk-s0517a:235_2: vitakkanaṃ vā vitakko, ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo,
atk-s0517a:235_3: āhananapariyāhananaraso. Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ
atk-s0517a:235_4: karotīti vuccati. Ārammaṇe cittassa ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno, tajjāsamannāhārena pana
atk-s0517a:235_5: indriyena ca parikkhitte visaye anantarāyena uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti
atk-s0517a:235_7: Saddā eva cettha vitakkuppattikāraṇattā saṅkhāranimittattā ca nimittāni. Bherisaddādivasena
atk-s0517a:235_8: ekagghanībhūtā, anekā vā saddā, nānādisāsu vā saddā, nānāsattānaṃ vā saddā nānattasaddā,
atk-s0517a:235_9: ekadisāya saddā, ekasattassa vā saddā, bherisaddādivasena ekekasaddā vā ekattasaddā.
atk-s0517a:235_10: Saddoti cettha sappatīti saddo, kathīyatīti attho. Pariyogāhaṇe paññāti pavisanapaññā,
atk-s0517a:235_11: pajānanapaññāti attho. Sotadhātuvisuddhiñāṇanti savanaṭṭhena ca nijjīvaṭṭhena ca
atk-s0517a:235_12: sotadhātu, sotadhātukiccakaraṇavasena ca sotadhātu viyātipi sotadhātu, parisuddhattā
atk-s0517a:235_13: nirupakkilesattā visuddhi, sotadhātu eva visuddhi sotadhātuvisuddhi, sotadhātuvisuddhi
atk-s0517a:236_1: tiṇṇannaṃ cittānaṃ. Vipphārattāti vipphārabhāvena vegenāti attho. Hetuatthe nissakkavacanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:236_2: cetopariyañāṇuppādanatthaṃ parikammakaraṇakāle paresaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ cittānaṃ vipphārahetunā.
atk-s0517a:236_3: Indriyānaṃ pasādavasenāti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ pasādavasena, indriyānaṃ
atk-s0517a:236_4: patiṭṭhitokāsā cettha phalūpacārena indriyānanti vuttā yathā “vippasannāni kho te,
atk-s0517a:236_5: āvuso, indriyāni parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto”ti. Indriyapatiṭṭhitokāsesupi hadayavatthu
atk-s0517a:236_7: vattabbe appasādasaddassa lopo katoti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā idamappasannanti gahaṇassa
atk-s0517a:236_8: pasādamapekkhitvā eva sambhavato “pasādavasenā”ti vacaneneva appasādopi vuttova hotīti
atk-s0517a:236_10: Ettha asamāhitassa viññāṇacariyā nānattā, samāhitassa viññāṇacariyā ekattā. Sarāgādicittaṃ
atk-s0517a:236_11: vā nānattaṃ, vītarāgādicittaṃ ekattaṃ. Cetopariyañāṇanti ettha pariyātīti pariyaṃ,
atk-s0517a:236_12: paricchindatīti attho. Cetaso pariyaṃ cetopariyaṃ, cetopariyañca taṃ ñāṇañcāti cetopariyañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:237_0: 53. Paccayappavattānaṃ dhammānanti paṭiccasamuppādavasena paccayato pavattānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:237_1: Nānattekattakammavipphāravasenāti ettha akusalaṃ kammaṃ nānattaṃ, kusalaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0517a:237_2: ekattaṃ. Kāmāvacaraṃ vā kammaṃ nānattaṃ, rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ kammaṃ ekattaṃ. Nānattekattakammavipphāravasena
atk-s0517a:237_3: paccayapavattānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariyogāhaṇe paññāti sambandho. Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇanti
atk-s0517a:237_4: pubbe atītajātīsu nivutthakhandhā pubbenivāso. Nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano
atk-s0517a:237_5: santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā. Pubbe atītajātīsu nivutthadhammā vā pubbenivāso. Nivutthāti
atk-s0517a:237_6: gocaranivāsena nivutthā attano viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā, paraviññāṇena viññātāpi
atk-s0517a:237_7: vā. Chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsu te buddhānaṃyeva labbhanti. Pubbenivāsānussatīti
atk-s0517a:237_8: yāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, sā pubbenivāsānussati, ñāṇanti tāya satiyā sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:238_0: 54. Obhāsavasenāti dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthaṃ pasāritassa tejokasiṇaodātakasiṇaālokakasiṇānaṃ
atk-s0517a:238_2: nānāsattānaṃ rūpāni, nānattakāyaṃ upapannānaṃ vā sattānaṃ rūpāni, nānādisāsu vā rūpāni,
atk-s0517a:238_3: asammissāni vā rūpāni nānattarūpāni, ekasattassa rūpāni, ekattakāyaṃ upapannassa
atk-s0517a:238_4: vā rūpāni, ekadisāya vā rūpāni, nānādisādīnaṃ sammissībhūtāni vā rūpāni ekattarūpāni.
atk-s0517a:238_5: Rūpanti cettha vaṇṇāyatanameva. Tañhi rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ
atk-s0517a:238_6: hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Rūpameva rūpanimittaṃ. Tesaṃ nānattekattarūpanimittānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:239_0: Dibbacakkhuñāṇanti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Devānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi
atk-s0517a:239_1: apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu
atk-s0517a:239_2: hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā
atk-s0517a:239_3: dibbaṃ, dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:239_5: dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu, cakkhukiccakaraṇena
atk-s0517a:239_6: cakkhumivātipi cakkhu, dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu, dibbacakkhu ca taṃ ñāṇañcāti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:240_0: 55. Catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehīti aṭṭhasu maggaphalesu ekekasmiṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ indriyānaṃ
atk-s0517a:240_1: vasena catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehi. Tiṇṇannaṃ indriyānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ
atk-s0517a:240_2: aññātāvindriyanti, imesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ indriyānaṃ. Vasibhāvatā paññāti vasibhāvatāya
atk-s0517a:240_3: pavattā paññā, arahattaphale aṭṭhannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena aṭṭhahi ākārehi aññātāvindriyasseva
atk-s0517a:240_5: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti attanā vajjhānaṃ āsavānaṃ khayakaraṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:241_1: ekekassa maggañāṇassa ekābhisamayataṃ dassetuṃ “pariññaṭṭhe paññā”tiādīni cattāri
atk-s0517a:241_2: ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni. Tatthāpi oḷārikattā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ
atk-s0517a:241_3: paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva hetudassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayasaccaṃ, hetunirodhā
atk-s0517a:241_5: ante maggasaccaṃ. Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ vā sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0517a:241_6: dukkhamāha, taṃ neva akataṃ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti
atk-s0517a:241_7: ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ
atk-s0517a:241_8: dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ, tato nirodhādhigamatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:241_9: nirodhasampāpakaṃ magganti. Idāni tabbisayāni ñāṇāni teneva kamena uddiṭṭhāni. Tattha
atk-s0517a:241_10: pariññaṭṭheti dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhādike catubbidhe parijānitabbasabhāve. Pahānaṭṭheti
atk-s0517a:241_11: samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭhādike catubbidhe pahātabbasabhāve. Sacchikiriyaṭṭheti nirodhassa
atk-s0517a:241_12: nissaraṇaṭṭhādike catubbidhe sacchikātabbasabhāve. Bhāvanaṭṭheti maggassa niyyānaṭṭhādike
atk-s0517a:242_0: 60-63. Idāni bhāvitamaggassa paccavekkhaṇavasena vā abhāvitamaggassa anussavavasena
atk-s0517a:242_1: vā visuṃ visuṃ saccañāṇāni dassetuṃ dukkhe ñāṇādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni. Tattha
atk-s0517a:242_2: dukkheti ettha du-iti ayaṃ saddo kucchite dissati. Kucchitañhi puttaṃ duputtoti vadanti.
atk-s0517a:242_3: Khaṃ-saddo pana tucche. Tucchañhi ākāsaṃ ‘kha’nti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṃ kucchitaṃ
atk-s0517a:243_0: Dukkhasamudayeti ettha saṃ-iti ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu viya saṃyogaṃ
atk-s0517a:243_1: dīpeti. U-iti ayaṃ saddo “uppannaṃ udita”ntiādīsu viya uppattiṃ. Aya-saddo pana kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:243_2: dīpeti. Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassa uppattikāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:244_0: Dukkhanirodheti ettha ni-saddo abhāvaṃ, rodha-saddo ca cārakaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā abhāvo
atk-s0517a:244_1: ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:244_3: vuccati. Dukkhassa vā anuppattinirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodhanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:245_0: Dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyāti ettha yasmā ayaṃ etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati
atk-s0517a:245_1: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā, paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā,
atk-s0517a:245_2: tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāti vuccati. Cattāri maggañāṇāneva heṭṭhā vuṭṭhānākāradīpanavasena
atk-s0517a:245_4: ñāṇa”nti vuttāni, vivaṭṭanākāradīpanavasena “saccavivaṭṭe ñāṇa”nti vuttāni, maggapaṭipāṭikkameneva
atk-s0517a:245_5: arahattamaggañāṇuppattiṃ, tassa ca ñāṇassa abhiññābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ arahattamaggañāṇameva
atk-s0517a:245_6: “āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Puna catunnampi maggañāṇānaṃ ekābhisamayataṃ dīpetuṃ
atk-s0517a:245_7: “pariññaṭṭhe paññā dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri ñāṇāni vuttāni. Puna ekekasmiṃ sacce
atk-s0517a:245_8: visuṃ visuṃ uppattidīpanavasena “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri ñāṇāni uddiṭṭhānīti
atk-s0517a:246_0: 64-67. Idāni sabbesaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ ariyamaggānubhāveneva paṭisambhidāñāṇāni siddhānīti
atk-s0517a:246_1: dassetuṃ atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇantiādīni puna cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni uddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:246_3: heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhāni pana pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ pabhedappattāni paṭisambhidāñāṇānīti
atk-s0517a:246_4: veditabbānīti ayametesaṃ ubhayatthavacane viseso. Yasmā vā anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ dukkhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:246_5: nirodhārammaṇañca ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā hoti, samudayārammaṇaṃ maggārammaṇañca
atk-s0517a:246_6: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tadabhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, tesu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:246_7: paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā, tasmā tampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ suddhikapaṭisambhidāñāṇāni
atk-s0517a:246_8: uddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni. Tasmāyeva ca heṭṭhā nānattasaddena visesetvā vuttāni. Idha
atk-s0517a:247_0: 68. Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sattasaṭṭhi sāvakasādhāraṇañāṇāni uddisitvā idāni sāvakehi asādhāraṇāni
atk-s0517a:247_1: tathāgatānaṃyeva āveṇikāni ñāṇāni dassetuṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇādīni cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni
atk-s0517a:247_2: uddiṭṭhāni. Tatthapi yasmā tathāgatā sattānaṃ dhammadesanāya bhājanābhājanattaṃ olokentā
atk-s0517a:248: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye”tiādi.
atk-s0517a:249_0: Sattasantāne ca olokentā paṭhamaṃ indriyaparipākāparipākaṃ olokenti, indriyaparipākañca
atk-s0517a:249_1: ñatvā āsayādīnaṃ anurūpena dhammadesanatthaṃ tato āsayānusayacaritāni olokenti, tasmāpi
atk-s0517a:249_2: paṭhamaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, tadanantaraṃ āsayānusayañāṇaṃ. Dhammaṃ
atk-s0517a:249_3: desentā ca yasmā pāṭihāriyena vinetabbānaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karonti, tasmā āsayānusayañāṇānantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:249_4: yamakapāṭihāriye ñāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ñāṇānaṃ hetuparidīpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:249_7: sabbaññutaññāṇassa anāvariyabhāvaparidīpanatthañca tadanantaraṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ uddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:250_0: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇanti ettha upari “sattāna”nti padaṃ idheva āharitvā “sattānaṃ
atk-s0517a:250_1: indriyaparopariyattañāṇa”nti yojetabbaṃ. Parāni ca aparāni ca parāparānīti vattabbe
atk-s0517a:250_2: sandhivasena ro-kāraṃ katvā paroparānīti vuccati. Paroparānaṃ bhāvo paropariyaṃ,
atk-s0517a:250_3: paropariyameva paropariyattaṃ, veneyyasattānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ
atk-s0517a:250_6: avariyāni ca varovariyāni, varovariyānaṃ bhāvo varovariyattanti yojetabbaṃ. Avariyānīti
atk-s0517a:250_7: ca na uttamānīti attho. Atha vā parāni ca oparāni ca paroparāni, tesaṃ bhāvo paropariyattanti
atk-s0517a:250_8: yojetabbaṃ. Oparānīti ca orānīti vuttaṃ hoti, lāmakānīti attho, “paroparā yassa samecca
atk-s0517a:251: 69. Sattānaṃ āsayānusaye ñāṇanti ettha rūpādīsu khandhesu chandarāgena sattā visattāti sattā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0517a:252_0: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto tatra visatto,
atk-s0517a:252_1: tasmā ‘satto’ti vuccati. Vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā
atk-s0517a:252_2: nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto tatra visatto, tasmā ‘satto’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0517a:253_0: Akkharacintakā pana atthaṃ avicāretvā “nāmamattameta”nti icchanti. Yepi atthaṃ vicārenti,
atk-s0517a:253_1: te satvayogena sattāti icchanti, tesaṃ sattānaṃ. Āsayanti nissayanti etaṃ iti āsayo,
atk-s0517a:253_2: micchādiṭṭhiyā, sammādiṭṭhiyā vā kāmādīhi, nekkhammādīhi vā paribhāvitassa santānassetaṃ
atk-s0517a:253_3: adhivacanaṃ. Sattasantāne anusenti anupavattantīti anusayā, thāmagatānaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ
atk-s0517a:253_4: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Āsayo ca anusayo ca āsayānusayo. Jātiggahaṇena ca dvandasamāsavasena
atk-s0517a:253_5: ca ekavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yasmā caritādhimuttiyo āsayānusayasaṅgahitā, tasmā uddese
atk-s0517a:253_6: caritādhimuttīsu ñāṇāni āsayānusayañāṇeneva saṅgahetvā “āsayānusaye ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:253_7: Yeneva hi adhippāyena uddeso kato, teneva adhippāyena niddeso katoti.
atk-s0517a:254_0: 70. Yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇanti ettha aggikkhandhaudakadhārādīnaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ sakiṃyeva
atk-s0517a:254_1: pavattito yamakaṃ, assaddhiyādīnaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ haraṇato pāṭihīraṃ, yamakañca
atk-s0517a:255_0: 71. Mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā ñāṇanti ettha paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti
atk-s0517a:255_1: karuṇā, kināti vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati vināsetīti karuṇā, kirīyati vā dukkhitesu pharaṇavasena
atk-s0517a:255_2: pasārīyatīti karuṇā, pharaṇakammavasena kammaguṇavasena ca mahatī karuṇā mahākaruṇā,
atk-s0517a:255_3: samāpajjanti etaṃ mahākāruṇikāti samāpatti, mahākaruṇā ca sā samāpatti cāti mahākaruṇāsamāpatti.
atk-s0517a:256_0: 72-73. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇanti ettha pañcaneyyapathappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ aññāsīti
atk-s0517a:256_1: sabbaññū, sabbaññussa bhāvo sabbaññutā, sā eva ñāṇaṃ “sabbaññutāñāṇa”nti vattabbe
atk-s0517a:256_2: “sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādibhedā sabbadhammā hi saṅkhāro vikāro
atk-s0517a:256_3: lakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ paññattīti pañceva neyyapathā honti. Sabbaññūti ca kamasabbaññū,
atk-s0517a:256_4: sakiṃsabbaññū, satatasabbaññū, sattisabbaññū, ñātasabbaññūti pañcavidhā sabbaññuno
atk-s0517a:256_5: siyuṃ. Kamena sabbajānanakālāsambhavato kamasabbaññutā na hoti, sakiṃ sabbārammaṇagahaṇābhāvato
atk-s0517a:256_6: sakiṃsabbaññutā na hoti, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārammaṇacittasambhavato bhavaṅgacittavirodhato
atk-s0517a:256_7: yuttiabhāvato ca satatasabbaññutā na hoti, parisesato sabbajānanasamatthattā sattisabbaññutā
atk-s0517a:256_8: vā siyā, viditasabbadhammattā ñātasabbaññutā vā siyā. Sattisabbaññuno sabbajānanattaṃ
atk-s0517a:258: Sabbaṃ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ, tathāgato tena samantacakkhū”ti. –
atk-s0517a:259_0: Vuttattā ñātasabbaññuttameva yujjati. Evañhi sati kiccato asammohato kāraṇasiddhito
atk-s0517a:259_1: āvajjanapaṭibaddhato sabbaññuttameva hotīti. Āvajjanapaṭibaddhattā eva hi natthi
atk-s0517a:259_2: etassa āvaraṇanti anāvaraṇaṃ, tadeva anāvaraṇañāṇanti vuccatīti.
atk-s0517a:260_0: Imāni tesattati ñāṇānīti sāvakehi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena uddiṭṭhāni imāni tesattati
atk-s0517a:260_1: ñāṇāni. Imesaṃ tesattatiyā ñāṇānanti ādito paṭṭhāya vuttānaṃ imesaṃ tesattatiñāṇānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:260_2: Ubbāhanatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Tesattatīnantipi pāṭho. “Tesattatiyā”ti vattabbe
atk-s0517a:260_3: ekasmiṃ bahuvacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇānītiādito paṭṭhāya sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni.
atk-s0517a:260_4: Sāvakasādhāraṇānīti savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātattā sāvakā, samānaṃ dhāraṇametesanti
atk-s0517a:260_5: sādhāraṇāni, tathāgatānaṃ sāvakehi sādhāraṇāni sāvakasādhāraṇāni. Cha ñāṇānīti ante
atk-s0517a:260_6: uddiṭṭhāni cha ñāṇāni. Asādhāraṇāni sāvakehīti sāvakehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatānaṃyeva ñāṇānīti.
atk-s0517a:265_0: 1. Idāni yathānikkhittena uddesena saṅgahite dhamme pabhedato dassetuṃ kathaṃ sotāvadhāne
atk-s0517a:265_1: paññā sutamaye ñāṇantiādi niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ, “sotāvadhāne paññā
atk-s0517a:265_2: sutamaye ñāṇa”nti, taṃ kathaṃ hotīti? Ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Pañcavidhā hi pucchā
atk-s0517a:266_0: Katamā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā? pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ
atk-s0517a:266_1: avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ, tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya
atk-s0517a:267_0: Katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā? pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ
atk-s0517a:267_1: vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ, so aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0517a:268_0: Katamā vimaticchedanāpucchā? pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti vimatipakkhando dveḷhakajāto
atk-s0517a:268_1: “evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti? So vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ
atk-s0517a:269_0: Katamā anumatipucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā pañhaṃ pucchati – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0517a:269_1: bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti? “Aniccaṃ, bhante”. “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ
atk-s0517a:269_2: vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti? “Dukkhaṃ, bhante”. “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ,
atk-s0517a:269_3: kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti? “No hetaṃ, bhante”ti, ayaṃ anumatipucchā.
atk-s0517a:270_0: Katamā kathetukamyatāpucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ kathetukamyatāya pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0517a:270_1: – “cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”ti ? Ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0517a:271_0: Idāni samātikuddesāya kathetukamyatāpucchāya “ime dhammā abhiññeyyāti sotāvadhānaṃ,
atk-s0517a:271_1: taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇa”ntiādayo soḷasa vissajjanuddesā. Tattha ime dhammā
atk-s0517a:271_2: abhiññeyyāti “desayantassā”ti pāṭhaseso. Ime dhammā abhijānitabbāti satthuno, aññatarassa
atk-s0517a:271_3: vā garuṭṭhāniyassa sabrahmacārissa dhammaṃ desayantassa pubbe vuttanayena sotāvadhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:271_4: sutaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ nāma. Taṃpajānanā paññā tassa sutassa pajānanā pariyāyaparicchindakapaññā
atk-s0517a:271_5: sutamaye ñāṇaṃ nāmāti attho. Tassa pajānanā taṃpajānanāti sāmivacanasamāso. Taṃ pajānanāti
atk-s0517a:271_6: vibhattivipallāsavasena upayogavacanaṃ vā. Abhiññeyyāti ca sabhāvalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena
atk-s0517a:271_8: ca byāpitvā jānitabbā. Bhāvetabbāti vaḍḍhetabbā. Sacchikātabbāti paccakkhaṃ kātabbā.
atk-s0517a:271_9: Duvidhā hi sacchikiriyā paṭilābhasacchikiriyā ārammaṇasacchikiriyā ca. Paccanīkasamudācāravasena
atk-s0517a:271_10: parihāniyasaṅkhātaṃ hānaṃ bhajantīti hānabhāgiyā. Tadanudhammatāya satiyā saṇṭhānavasena
atk-s0517a:271_11: ṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhitiṃ bhajantīti ṭhitibhāgiyā. Uparivisesādhigamavasena visesaṃ bhajantīti
atk-s0517a:271_12: visesabhāgiyā. Anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0517a:271_13: nibbijjhati padāletīti ariyamaggo nibbedho nāma, nibbidāsahagatānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0517a:272_0: Sabbe saṅkhārāti sabbe sappaccayā dhammā. Te hi saṅkhatasaṅkhārā nāma. Paccayehi
atk-s0517a:272_1: saṅgamma karīyantīti saṅkhārā, te eva paccayehi saṅgamma katattā saṅkhatāti visesetvā
atk-s0517a:272_3: vuttā. Tepi “aniccā va saṅkhārā”tiādīsu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. “Avijjāgato
atk-s0517a:272_4: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo puññañceva saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādīsu avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0517a:272_6: abhisaṅkhārassa gati, tāvatikaṃ gantvā akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsī”tiādīsu āgataṃ kāyikaṃ
atk-s0517a:272_7: cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ payogābhisaṅkhāro nāma. “Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa kho,
atk-s0517a:272_8: āvuso visākha, bhikkhuno paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāro, tato kāyasaṅkhāro, tato
atk-s0517a:272_9: cittasaṅkhāro”tiādīsu āgatā vitakkavicārā. Vācaṃ saṅkharontīti vacīsaṅkhārā. Assāsapassāsā
atk-s0517a:272_10: kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā. Saññā ca vedanā ca cittena saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā.
atk-s0517a:273_0: Aniccāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena. Dukkhāti pīḷanaṭṭhena. Sabbe dhammāti nibbānampi antokatvā
atk-s0517a:273_1: vuttā. Anattāti avasavattanaṭṭhena. Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccantiādīsu “dukkhasamudayo
atk-s0517a:273_3: Yasmā pana buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti. Yathāha
atk-s0517a:273_4: “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni.
atk-s0517a:273_5: Ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Ariyassa saccānītipi
atk-s0517a:273_6: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha “sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti
atk-s0517a:273_7: vuccantī”ti. Etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha “imesaṃ
atk-s0517a:273_8: kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ
atk-s0517a:273_9: sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti. Ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Ariyānīti avitathāni,
atk-s0517a:273_10: avisaṃvādakānīti attho. Yathāha “imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni
atk-s0517a:273_11: avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Saccānīti ko saccaṭṭhoti
atk-s0517a:273_12: ce? Yo paññācakkhunā upaparikkhamānānaṃ māyāva viparīto, marīcīva visaṃvādako, titthiyānaṃ
atk-s0517a:273_13: parikappitaattāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti, atha kho bādhanapabhavasantiniyyānappakārena
atk-s0517a:273_14: tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva. Esa aggilakkhaṇaṃ viya lokapakati
atk-s0517a:273_15: viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha “idaṃ dukkhanti,
atk-s0517a:273_16: bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti vitthāro. Apica –
atk-s0517a:274: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
atk-s0517a:276: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
atk-s0517a:278: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
atk-s0517a:280: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
atk-s0517a:284_0: So panāyaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṃ – “saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:284_1: vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu viratisacce. “Kasmā nu saccāni
atk-s0517a:284_2: vadanti nānā, pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce. “Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutīyamatthi,
atk-s0517a:284_3: yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajāna”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca. “Catunnaṃ
atk-s0517a:284_4: saccānaṃ kati kusalā kati akusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce pavattatīti.
atk-s0517a:288_0: 2. Idāni vissajjanuddesasaṅgahite dhamme pabhedato dassetuṃ kathaṃ ime dhammā abhiññeyyātiādi
atk-s0517a:288_1: niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha abhiññeyyaniddesādīsu pañcasu ādito ekakādivasena dasa
atk-s0517a:288_2: dasa vissajjanāni dasuttarapariyāyena saṃsandetvā uddiṭṭhāni. Tesu abhiññeyyaniddese
atk-s0517a:288_3: tāva sabbe sattāti kāmabhavādīsu saññābhavādīsu ekavokārabhavādīsu ca sabbabhavesu
atk-s0517a:288_4: sabbe sattā. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti āhārato ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikā. Ṭhitīti cettha
atk-s0517a:288_5: sakakkhaṇe atthitā adhippetā. Iti sabbasattānaṃ ṭhitihetu āhāro nā eko dhammo adhikena
atk-s0517a:288_6: ñāṇena jānitabbo. Paccaye hi abhiññāte paccayuppannāpi abhiññātā honti ubhinnampi
atk-s0517a:288_7: aññamaññāpekkhattā. Etena ñātapariññā vuttā hoti. Nanu ca evaṃ sante yaṃ vuttaṃ “asaññasattā
atk-s0517a:288_8: devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā”tiādi, taṃ virujjhatīti. Tañca na virujjhati. Tesañhi
atk-s0517a:288_9: jhānaṃ āhāroti. Evaṃ santepi “cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā,
atk-s0517a:288_10: sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāya. Katame cattāro? Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo
atk-s0517a:288_11: vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catuttha”nti idaṃ virujjhatīti.
atk-s0517a:288_12: Idampi na virujjhati. Etasmiñhi sutte nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇāva dhammā āhārāti
atk-s0517a:288_13: vuttā. Idha pana pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto. Sabbasaṅkhatadhammānañhi paccayo
atk-s0517a:288_14: laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, so ca yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ janeti, taṃ taṃ āharati nāma. Tasmā āhāroti vuccati. Tenevāha –
atk-s0517a:289_0: “Avijjampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sāhāraṃ vadāmi, no anāhāraṃ. Ko ca, bhikkhave, avijjāya
atk-s0517a:289_1: āhāro? ‘Pañca nīvaraṇā’tissa vacanīyaṃ. Pañca nīvaraṇepāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sāhāre vadāmi,
atk-s0517a:289_2: no anāhāre. Ko ca, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ āhāro. ‘Ayoniso manasikāro’tissa
atk-s0517a:290: Etasmiñhi paccayāhāre gahite pariyāyāhāropi nippariyāyāhāropi sabbo gahitova hoti.
atk-s0517a:291_0: Tattha asaññabhave paccayāhāro labbhati. Anuppanne hi buddhe titthāyatane pabbajitvā
atk-s0517a:291_1: vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya “dhī cittaṃ,
atk-s0517a:291_2: dhī cittaṃ, cittassa nāma abhāvoyeva sādhu. Cittañhi nissāya vadhabandhanādipaccayaṃ
atk-s0517a:291_3: dukkhaṃ uppajjati, citte asati nattheta”nti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānā
atk-s0517a:291_4: kālaṃkatvā asaññabhave nibbattanti. Yo yassa iriyāpatho manussaloke paṇihito ahosi,
atk-s0517a:291_5: so tena iriyāpathena nibbattitvā pañca kappasatāni tiṭṭhati. Ettakaṃ addhānaṃ nipanno
atk-s0517a:291_6: viya nisinno viya ṭhito viya hoti. Evarūpānañca sattānaṃ paccayāhāro labbhati. Te
atk-s0517a:291_7: hi yaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetvā nibbattā, tade nesaṃ paccayo hoti. Yathā jiyāvegena khittasaro
atk-s0517a:291_8: yāva jiyāvego atthi, tāva gacchati, evaṃ yāva jhānapaccayo atthi, tāva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0517a:291_9: Tasmiṃ niṭṭhite khīṇavego saro viya patanti.
atk-s0517a:292_0: Ye pana te nerayikā “nevuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino na puññaphalūpajīvino”ti vuttā, tesaṃ
atk-s0517a:292_1: ko āhāroti? Tesaṃ kammameva āhāroti. Kiṃ pañca āhārā atthīti? “Pañca, na pañcā”ti
atk-s0517a:292_2: idaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Nanu “paccayo āhāro”ti vutto, tasmā yena kammena te niraye nibbattā,
atk-s0517a:292_3: tadeva tesaṃ ṭhitipaccayattā āhāro. Yaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “na tāva kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0517a:292_4: yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti. Tasmā āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikāti attho.
atk-s0517a:292_5: Kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ ārabbhāti cettha vivādo na kātabbo. Mukhe uppannakheḷopi hi tesaṃ
atk-s0517a:292_6: āhārakiccaṃ sādheti. Kheḷo hi niraye dukkhavedanīyo hutvā paccayo hoti, sagge sukhavedanīyo.
atk-s0517a:292_7: Iti kāmabhave nippariyāyena cattāro āhārā, rūpārūpabhavesu ṭhapetvā asaññabhavaṃ
atk-s0517a:292_8: sesānaṃ tayo, asaññānañceva avasesānañca paccayāhāroti iminā āhārena sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā.
atk-s0517a:293_0: Sabbe sattāti ca puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā, sabbe saṅkhārāti adhippāyo. Bhagavatopi
atk-s0517a:293_1: hi dhammapuggalānaṃ vasena catubbidhā desanā – dhammādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā, dhammādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0517a:293_3: bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti, yathayidaṃ
atk-s0517a:293_4: cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hotī”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā.
atk-s0517a:293_5: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato
atk-s0517a:293_6: upagaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā. “Ekapuggalo,
atk-s0517a:293_7: bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya
atk-s0517a:293_8: atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti, evarūpī puggalādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā.
atk-s0517a:293_9: “Ekapuggalassa bhikkhave, pātubhāvā mahato cakkhussa pātubhāvo hotī”ti evarūpī puggalādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0517a:293_10: dhammadesanā. Tāsu idha puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā. Upari yāva dasakā dhammānaṃyeva
atk-s0517a:293_11: gahitattā sattaggahaṇena dhammaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ, visesena vā sattasantānapariyāpannadhammānaṃyeva
atk-s0517a:293_12: adhikena ñāṇena sabhāvato upaparikkhitabbattā sattaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ, saṅkhāre
atk-s0517a:293_13: upādāya sattoti paññattimattasambhavato vā phalopacārena saṅkhārā “sattā”ti vuttāti
atk-s0517a:293_14: veditabbaṃ. Na hi koci satto paccayaṭṭhitiko atthi aññatra saṅkhārehi, vohāravasena
atk-s0517a:293_15: pana evaṃ vuccati. Evametena ñātapariññā vuttā hoti.
atk-s0517a:294: Dve dhātuyoti saṅkhatā ca dhātu asaṅkhatā ca dhātu. Tattha anekehi paccayehi saṅgamma katā pañcakkhandhā saṅkhatā dhātu, kehici paccayehi akataṃ nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatā dhātu.
atk-s0517a:295_0: Tisso dhātuyoti kāmadhātu rūpadhātu arūpadhātu. Tattha katamā kāmadhātu? Heṭṭhato
atk-s0517a:295_1: avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ
atk-s0517a:295_2: etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhā dhātū āyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā
atk-s0517a:295_3: saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātu. Tattha katamā rūpadhātu? Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ
atk-s0517a:295_4: pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā
atk-s0517a:295_5: ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā
atk-s0517a:295_6: dhammā. Ayaṃ vuccati rūpadhātu. Tattha katamā arūpadhātu? Heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanūpage
atk-s0517a:295_7: deve pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpage deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:295_8: antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa
atk-s0517a:295_9: vā cittacetasikā dhammā. Ayaṃ vuccati arūpadhātu. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kāmadhātūti
atk-s0517a:295_10: kāmabhavo pañcakkhandhā labbhanti, rūpadhātūti rūpabhavo pañcakkhandhā labbhanti.
atk-s0517a:295_11: Arūpadhātūti arūpabhavo cattāro khandhā labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ dasuttarapariyāyena yojanā.
atk-s0517a:296_0: Saṅgītipariyāyena pana “tisso kusaladhātuyo – nekkhammadhātu abyāpādadhātu avihiṃsādhātu.
atk-s0517a:296_1: Aparāpi tisso dhātuyo – rūpadhātu arūpadhātu nirodhadhātu. Aparāpi tisso dhātuyo
atk-s0517a:296_2: – hīnā dhātu majjhimā dhātu paṇītā dhātū”ti vuttā dhātuyopi ettha yujjanti. Nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0517a:296_3: takko vitakko…pe… sammāsaṅkappo. Ayaṃ vuccati nekkhammadhātu. Sabbepi kusalā dhammā
atk-s0517a:296_4: nekkhammadhātu. Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… sammāsaṅkappo abyāpādadhātu.
atk-s0517a:296_5: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti. Ayaṃ vuccati abyāpādadhātu.
atk-s0517a:296_6: Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… sammāsaṅkappo avihiṃsādhātu. Yā sattesu karuṇā
atk-s0517a:296_7: karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti. Ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātu. Rūpārūpadhātuyo
atk-s0517a:296_8: vuttāyeva. Nirodhadhātu nibbānaṃ. Hīnā dhātu dvādasākusalacittuppādā, majjhimā dhātu
atk-s0517a:296_9: avasesā tebhūmakadhammā. Paṇītā dhātu nava lokuttaradhammā. Sabbāpi ca nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātu.
atk-s0517a:297_0: Cattāri ariyasaccānīti dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhaṃ
atk-s0517a:297_1: ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ. Imesaṃ vaṇṇanā saccavissajjanesuyeva bhavissati.
atk-s0517a:298_0: Pañca vimuttāyatanānīti attano hitatthāya parehi pavattitadhammadesanāsavanaṃ, paresaṃ
atk-s0517a:298_1: hitatthāya attano yathāsutadhammadesanā, yathāsutassa dhammassa sajjhāyakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0517a:298_2: yathāsutassa dhammassa cetasā anuvitakkanaṃ, kasiṇāsubhādīsu anukūlaṃ ārammaṇanti,
atk-s0517a:299_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī,
atk-s0517a:299_1: yathā yathā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo
atk-s0517a:299_2: sabrahmacārī, tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme atthapaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0517a:299_3: ca, tassa atthapaṭisaṃvedino dhammapaṭisaṃvedino pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti
atk-s0517a:299_4: jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:300_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā
atk-s0517a:300_1: garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī, api ca kho yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena
atk-s0517a:300_2: paresaṃ deseti. Yathā yathā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno…pe… sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
atk-s0517a:301_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno naheva kho satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā
atk-s0517a:301_1: garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī, nāpi yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ
atk-s0517a:301_2: deseti, api ca kho yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena sajjhāyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:301_3: Yathā yathā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno…pe… sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati. Idaṃ tatiyaṃ vimuttāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:302_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno naheva kho satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā
atk-s0517a:302_1: garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī, nāpi yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ
atk-s0517a:302_2: deseti, nāpi yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena sajjhāyaṃ karoti, api
atk-s0517a:302_3: ca kho yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
atk-s0517a:302_4: Yathā yathā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno…pe… sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati. Idaṃ catutthaṃ vimuttāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:303_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno naheva kho satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā
atk-s0517a:303_1: garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī, nāpi yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ
atk-s0517a:303_2: deseti, nāpi yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena sajjhāyaṃ karoti, nāpi
atk-s0517a:303_3: yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati,
atk-s0517a:303_4: api ca khvassa aññataraṃ samādhinimittaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti sumanasikataṃ sūpadhāritaṃ
atk-s0517a:303_5: suppaṭividdhaṃ paññāya, yathā yathā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aññataraṃ samādhinimittaṃ
atk-s0517a:303_6: suggahitaṃ hoti sumanasikataṃ sūpadhāritaṃ suppaṭividdhaṃ paññāya tathā tathā so
atk-s0517a:303_7: tasmiṃ dhamme atthapaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṃvedī ca. Tassa atthapaṭisaṃvedino
atk-s0517a:303_8: dhammapaṭisaṃvedino pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati,
atk-s0517a:303_9: passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati. Idaṃ pañcamaṃ vimuttāyatana”nti.
atk-s0517a:304: Cha anuttariyānīti ettha natthi etesaṃ uttaranti anuttarāni, anuttarāni eva anuttariyāni, jeṭṭhakānīti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0517a:305: “Chayimāni, bhikkhave, anuttariyāni. Katamāni cha? Dassanānuttariyaṃ, savanānuttariyaṃ, lābhānuttariyaṃ, sikkhānuttariyaṃ, pāricariyānuttariyaṃ, anussatānuttariyanti.
atk-s0517a:306_0: “Katamañca, bhikkhave, dassanānuttariyaṃ? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco hatthiratanampi
atk-s0517a:306_1: dassanāya gacchati, assaratanampi dassanāya gacchati, maṇiratanampi dassanāya gacchati,
atk-s0517a:306_2: uccāvacaṃ vā pana dassanāya gacchati, samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā micchādiṭṭhikaṃ micchāpaṭipannaṃ
atk-s0517a:306_3: dassanāya gacchati. Atthetaṃ, bhikkhave, dassanaṃ, netaṃ natthīti vadāmi. Tañca kho
atk-s0517a:306_4: etaṃ, bhikkhave, dassanaṃ hīnaṃ gammaṃ pothujjanikaṃ anariyaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ na
atk-s0517a:306_5: nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya
atk-s0517a:306_6: saṃvattati. Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ vā dassanāya gacchati
atk-s0517a:306_7: niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Etadānuttariyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:306_8: dassanānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya
atk-s0517a:306_9: ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ
atk-s0517a:306_10: vā dassanāya gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Idaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0517a:307_0: “Savanānuttariyañca kathaṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bherisaddampi savanāya gacchati,
atk-s0517a:307_1: vīṇāsaddampi savanāya gacchati, gītasaddampi savanāya gacchati, uccāvacaṃ vā pana
atk-s0517a:307_2: savanāya gacchati, samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā micchādiṭṭhikassa micchāpaṭipannassa
atk-s0517a:307_3: dhammassavanāya gacchati. Atthetaṃ, bhikkhave, savanaṃ, netaṃ natthīti vadāmi. Tañca
atk-s0517a:307_4: kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, savanaṃ hīnaṃ…pe… na nibbānāya saṃvattati. Yo ca kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:307_5: tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā dhammassavanāya gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo
atk-s0517a:307_6: ekantagato abhippasanno. Etadānuttariyaṃ, bhikkhave, savanānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā…pe…
atk-s0517a:307_7: nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā dhammassavanāya
atk-s0517a:307_8: gacchati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:308_0: “Lābhānuttariyañca kathaṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puttalābhampi labhati, dāralābhampi
atk-s0517a:308_1: labhati, dhanalābhampi labhati, uccāvacaṃ vā pana lābhampi labhati. Samaṇe vā brāhmaṇe
atk-s0517a:308_2: vā micchādiṭṭhike micchāpaṭipanne saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. Attheso, bhikkhave, lābho,
atk-s0517a:308_3: neso natthīti vadāmi. So ca kho eso, bhikkhave, lābho hīno…pe… na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0517a:308_4: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathāgate vā tathāgatasāvake vā saddhaṃ paṭilabhati niviṭṭhasaddho
atk-s0517a:308_5: niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Etadānuttariyaṃ, bhikkhave, lābhānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0517a:308_6: visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ tathāgate vā tathāgatasāvake vā
atk-s0517a:308_7: saddhaṃ paṭilabhati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Idaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0517a:308_8: bhikkhave, lābhānuttariyaṃ. Iti dassanānuttariyaṃ, savanānuttariyaṃ, lābhānuttariyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:309_0: “Sikkhānuttariyañca kathaṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco hatthismimpi sikkhati, assasmimpi
atk-s0517a:309_1: sikkhati, rathasmimpi sikkhati, dhanusmimpi sikkhati, tharusmimpi sikkhati, uccāvacaṃ
atk-s0517a:309_2: vā pana sikkhati, samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā micchādiṭṭhikassa micchāpaṭipannassa
atk-s0517a:309_3: sikkhati. Atthesā, bhikkhave, sikkhā, nesā natthīti vadāmi. Sā ca kho esā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:309_4: sikkhā hīnā…pe… na nibbānāya saṃvattati. Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatappavedite
atk-s0517a:309_5: dhammavinaye adhisīlampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipaññampi sikkhati niviṭṭhasaddho
atk-s0517a:309_6: niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Etadānuttariyaṃ, bhikkhave, sikkhānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0517a:309_7: visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye
atk-s0517a:309_8: adhisīlampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipaññampi sikkhati niviṭṭhasaddho
atk-s0517a:309_9: niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sikkhānuttariyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:310_0: “Pāricariyānuttariyañca kathaṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco khattiyampi paricarati,
atk-s0517a:310_1: brāhmaṇampi paricarati, gahapatimpi paricarati, uccāvacaṃ vā pana paricarati, samaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:310_2: vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā micchādiṭṭhikaṃ micchāpaṭipannaṃ paricarati. Atthesā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:310_3: pāricariyā, nesā natthīti vadāmi. Sā ca kho esā, bhikkhave, pāricariyā hīnā…pe… na
atk-s0517a:310_4: nibbānāya saṃvattati. Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ vā paricarati
atk-s0517a:310_5: niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Etadānuttariyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:310_6: pāricariyānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ tathāgataṃ
atk-s0517a:310_7: vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ vā paricarati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno.
atk-s0517a:310_8: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, pāricariyānuttariyaṃ. Iti dassanānuttariyaṃ, savanānuttariyaṃ,
atk-s0517a:311_0: “Anussatānuttariyañca kathaṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puttalābhampi anussarati,
atk-s0517a:311_1: dāralābhampi anussarati, dhanalābhampi anussarati, uccāvacaṃ vā pana anussarati,
atk-s0517a:311_2: samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā micchādiṭṭhikaṃ micchāpaṭipannaṃ anussarati. Atthesā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:311_3: anussati, nesā natthīti vadāmi. Sā ca kho esā, bhikkhave, anussati hīnā…pe… na nibbānāya
atk-s0517a:311_4: saṃvattati. Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ vā anussarati niviṭṭhasaddho
atk-s0517a:311_5: niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Etadānuttariyaṃ, bhikkhave, anussatīnaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0517a:311_6: visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ
atk-s0517a:311_7: vā anussarati niviṭṭhasaddho niviṭṭhapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. Idaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0517a:311_8: bhikkhave, anussatānuttariyaṃ. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cha anuttariyānī”ti.
atk-s0517a:312_0: Satta niddasavatthūnīti ettha natthi etassa dasāti niddaso. Niddasassa niddasabhāvassa
atk-s0517a:312_1: vatthūni kāraṇāni niddasavatthūni. Khīṇāsavo hi dasavassakāle parinibbuto puna paṭisandhiyā
atk-s0517a:312_2: abhāvā puna dasavasso na hotīti niddasoti vuccati. Na kevalañca dasavassova na hoti,
atk-s0517a:312_3: navavassopi…pe… ekamuhuttikopi na hotiyeva. Na kevalañca dasavassakāle parinibbuto,
atk-s0517a:312_4: sattavassikakāle parinibbutopi nissatto niddaso nimuhutto hotiyeva. Titthiyasamaye
atk-s0517a:312_5: uppannavohāraṃ pana sāsane khīṇāsavassa āropetvā tattha tādisassa abhāvaṃ, idha ca
atk-s0517a:312_6: sabbhāvaṃ dassento bhagavā tādisasabhāvassa kāraṇāni “satta niddasavatthūnī”ti āha. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:313_0: “Sattimāni, bhikkhave, niddasavatthūni. Katamāni satta? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-s0517a:313_1: sikkhāsamādāne tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca sikkhāsamādāne avigatapemo. Dhammanisantiyā
atk-s0517a:313_2: tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca dhammanisantiyā avigatapemo. Icchāvinaye tibbacchando
atk-s0517a:313_3: hoti, āyatiñca icchāvinaye avigatapemo. Paṭisallāne tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca paṭisallāne
atk-s0517a:313_4: avigatapemo. Vīriyārambhe tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca vīriyārambhe avigatapemo. Satinepakke
atk-s0517a:313_5: tibbacchando hoti, āyatiñca satinepakke avigatapemo. Diṭṭhipaṭivedhe tibbacchando
atk-s0517a:313_6: hoti, āyatiñca diṭṭhipaṭivedhe avigatapemo. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, satta niddasavatthūnī”ti.
atk-s0517a:314: Theropi tatheva desanaṃ uddharitvā “satta niddasavatthūnī”ti āha.
atk-s0517a:315_0: Aṭṭha abhibhāyatanānīti ettha abhibhuyyamānāni āyatanāni etesaṃ jhānānanti abhibhāyatanāni,
atk-s0517a:315_1: jhānāni. Āyatanānīti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanasaṅkhātāni kasiṇārammaṇāni. Ñāṇuttariko
atk-s0517a:315_2: hi puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ ettha ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ. Na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe
atk-s0517a:315_3: bhāro atthī”ti, tāni ārammaṇāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha
atk-s0517a:315_4: appanaṃ nibbattetīti attho. Evaṃ uppāditāni jhānāni “abhibhāyatanānī”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0517a:316: “Katamāni aṭṭha? Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti. Idaṃ paṭhamaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:317: “Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti. Idaṃ dutiyaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:318: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti. Idaṃ tatiyaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:319: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti. Idaṃ catutthaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:320_0: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni
atk-s0517a:320_1: nīlanibhāsāni. Seyyathāpi nāma umāpupphaṃ nīlaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ nīlanidassanaṃ nīlanibhāsaṃ,
atk-s0517a:320_2: seyyathāpi vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ nīlaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:320_3: nīlanidassanaṃ nīlanibhāsaṃ, evameva ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati
atk-s0517a:320_4: nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti
atk-s0517a:321_0: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni
atk-s0517a:321_1: pītanibhāsāni. Seyyathāpi nāma kaṇikārapupphaṃ pītaṃ pītavaṇṇaṃ pītanidassanaṃ pītanibhāsaṃ,
atk-s0517a:321_2: seyyathāpi vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ pītaṃ pītavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:321_3: pītanidassanaṃ pītanibhāsaṃ, evameva ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati
atk-s0517a:321_4: pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti
atk-s0517a:322_0: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni
atk-s0517a:322_1: lohitakanibhāsāni. Seyyathāpi nāma bandhujīvakapupphaṃ lohitakaṃ lohitakavaṇṇaṃ lohitakanidassanaṃ
atk-s0517a:322_2: lohitakanibhāsaṃ, seyyathāpi vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0517a:322_3: lohitakaṃ lohitakavaṇṇaṃ lohitakanidassanaṃ lohitakanibhāsaṃ, evameva ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī
atk-s0517a:322_4: eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati lohitakāni lohitakavaṇṇāni lohitakanidassanāni lohitakanibhāsāni,
atk-s0517a:322_5: ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti. Idaṃ sattamaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:323_0: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni
atk-s0517a:323_1: odātanibhāsāni. Seyyathāpi nāma osadhitārakā odātā odātavaṇṇā odātanidassanā odātanibhāsā,
atk-s0517a:323_2: seyyathāpi vā pana taṃ vatthaṃ bārāṇaseyyakaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ odātaṃ odātavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:323_3: odātanidassanaṃ odātanibhāsaṃ, evameva ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati
atk-s0517a:323_4: odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi passāmī’ti
atk-s0517a:323_5: evaṃsaññī hoti. Idaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ. Imāni aṭṭha abhibhāyatanāni.
atk-s0517a:324: Nava anupubbavihārāti pubbaṃ pubbaṃ anu anupubbaṃ, anupubbaṃ viharitabbato samāpajjitabbato vihārā anupubbavihārā, anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbavihārāti attho.
atk-s0517a:325_0: “Katame nava? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi
atk-s0517a:325_1: savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Vitakkavicārānaṃ
atk-s0517a:325_2: vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ
atk-s0517a:325_3: pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati
atk-s0517a:325_4: sato sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti ‘upekkhako
atk-s0517a:325_5: satimā sukhavihārī’ti, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa
atk-s0517a:325_6: ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ
atk-s0517a:325_7: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ
atk-s0517a:325_8: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0517a:325_9: viharati. Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇa’nti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ
atk-s0517a:325_10: upasampajja viharati. Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0517a:325_11: upasampajja viharati. Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0517a:325_12: upasampajja viharati. Sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ
atk-s0517a:326: Dasa nijjaravatthūnīti micchādiṭṭhādīni nijjarayanti nāsayantīti nijjarāni. Vatthūnīti kāraṇāni. Nijjarāni ca tāni vatthūni cāti nijjaravatthūni. Sammādiṭṭhādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:327_0: “Katamāni dasa? Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hoti. Ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā
atk-s0517a:327_1: aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammādiṭṭhipaccayā
atk-s0517a:327_2: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:328_0: “Sammāsaṅkappassa, bhikkhave, micchāsaṅkappo nijjiṇṇo hoti. Ye ca micchāsaṅkappapaccayā
atk-s0517a:328_1: aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāsaṅkappapaccayā
atk-s0517a:328_2: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:329_0: “Sammāvācassa, bhikkhave, micchāvācā nijjiṇṇā hoti. Ye ca micchāvācāpaccayā aneke
atk-s0517a:329_1: pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāvācāpaccayā ca aneke
atk-s0517a:330_0: “Sammākammantassa, bhikkhave, micchākammanto nijjiṇṇo hoti. Ye ca micchākammantapaccayā
atk-s0517a:330_1: aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammākammantapaccayā
atk-s0517a:330_2: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:331_0: “Sammāājīvassa, bhikkhave, micchāājīvo nijjiṇṇo hoti. Ye ca micchāājīvapaccayā aneke
atk-s0517a:331_1: pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāājīvapaccayā ca
atk-s0517a:332_0: “Sammāvāyāmassa, bhikkhave, micchāvāyāmo nijjiṇṇo hoti. Ye ca micchāvāyāmapaccayā
atk-s0517a:332_1: aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāvāyāmapaccayā
atk-s0517a:332_2: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:333_0: “Sammāsatissa, bhikkhave, micchāsati nijjiṇṇā hoti. Ye ca micchāsatipaccayā aneke
atk-s0517a:333_1: pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāsatipaccayā ca aneke
atk-s0517a:334_0: “Sammāsamādhissa, bhikkhave, micchāsamādhi nijjiṇṇo hoti. Ye ca micchāsamādhipaccayā
atk-s0517a:334_1: aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāsamādhipaccayā
atk-s0517a:334_2: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0517a:335_0: “Sammāñāṇissa, bhikkhave, micchāñāṇaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ hoti. Ye ca micchāñāṇapaccayā aneke
atk-s0517a:335_1: pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāñāṇapaccayā ca aneke
atk-s0517a:336_0: “Sammāvimuttissa, bhikkhave, micchāvimutti nijjiṇṇā hoti. Ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā
atk-s0517a:336_1: aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti, sammāvimuttipaccayā
atk-s0517a:336_2: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti vuttāni dasa nijjaravatthūni.
atk-s0517a:337_0: 3. Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyyantiādi bhagavatā vuttaṃ idha āharitvā dassitanti
atk-s0517a:337_1: veditabbaṃ. Kiñca-iti ca-kāro padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Cakkhādīni tiṃsa vissajjanāni
atk-s0517a:337_2: chasu dvāresu ekekasmiṃ pañca pañca katvā dvārārammaṇapavattikkamena niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:337_3: Tattha duvidhaṃ cakkhu – maṃsacakkhu paññācakkhu ca. Tesu buddhacakkhu samantacakkhu
atk-s0517a:337_4: ñāṇacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhūti pañcavidhaṃ paññācakkhu. “Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ,
atk-s0517a:337_5: bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”ti idaṃ buddhacakkhu nāma. “Samantacakkhu
atk-s0517a:337_6: vuccati sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti idaṃ samantacakkhu nāma. “Cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti
atk-s0517a:337_7: idaṃ ñāṇacakkhu nāma. “Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti
atk-s0517a:337_8: idaṃ dibbacakkhu nāma. “Virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggattayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0517a:338_0: Maṃsacakkhupi sasambhāracakkhu, pasādacakkhūti duvidhaṃ hoti. Yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake
atk-s0517a:338_1: patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena upari bhamukaṭṭhikena ubhato akkhikūṭehi bahiddhā
atk-s0517a:338_2: akkhipakhumehi paricchinno akkhikūpakamajjhā nikkhantena nhārusuttakena matthaluṅge
atk-s0517a:338_3: ābaddho setakaṇhātikaṇhamaṇḍalavicitto maṃsapiṇḍo, idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu nāma. Yo
atk-s0517a:338_4: pana ettha sito ettha paṭibaddho catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, idaṃ pasādacakkhu
atk-s0517a:338_5: nāma. Idamidhādhippetaṃ. Tadetaṃ tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa
atk-s0517a:338_6: kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidese diṭṭhimaṇḍale
atk-s0517a:338_7: sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ picupaṭalāni viya satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā pamāṇato
atk-s0517a:338_8: muggavidalamattaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:338_9: Taṃ cakkhatīti cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayantīti rūpā, vaṇṇavikāraṃ
atk-s0517a:338_10: āpajjamānā hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsentīti attho. Cakkhuto pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ, cakkhussa
atk-s0517a:338_11: vā viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Phusatīti phasso. Upasaggena padaṃ maṇḍetvā samphassoti
atk-s0517a:338_12: vuttaṃ. Cakkhuto pavatto samphasso cakkhusamphasso. Cakkhusamphassapaccayāti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttaphassapaccayā.
atk-s0517a:338_13: Vedayitanti vindanaṃ, vedanāti attho. Tadeva sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, yassuppajjati, taṃ
atk-s0517a:338_14: sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:338_15: Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ, yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Na dukkhaṃ na
atk-s0517a:338_16: sukhanti adukkhamasukhaṃ. Ma-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. So pana cakkhusamphasso
atk-s0517a:338_17: attanā sampayuttāya vedanāya sahajāta aññamaññanissaya vipākaāhārasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
atk-s0517a:339_0: Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0517a:339_1: padese sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Sappantīti
atk-s0517a:339_2: saddā, udāharīyantīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Taṃ sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0517a:339_3: padese ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Gandhayantīti
atk-s0517a:339_4: gandhā, attano vatthuṃ sūcentīti attho. Jīvitamavhāyatīti jivhā, sāyanaṭṭhena vā
atk-s0517a:339_5: jivhā. Sā sasambhārajivhāya atiaggamūlapassāni vajjetvā uparimatalamajjhe bhinnauppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0517a:339_6: padese jivhāviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati. Rasanti
atk-s0517a:339_7: te sattāti rasā, assādentīti attho. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti
atk-s0517a:339_8: uppattideso. So yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇappavatti nāma atthi, tattha yebhuyyena
atk-s0517a:339_9: kāyapasādo kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamāno tiṭṭhati. Phusīyantīti
atk-s0517a:339_10: phoṭṭhabbā. Munātīti mano, vijānātīti attho. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti dhammā.
atk-s0517a:339_11: Manoti sahāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Dhammāti dvādasapabhedā dhammārammaṇā dhammā. Manoviññāṇanti
atk-s0517a:339_12: javanamanoviññāṇaṃ. Manosamphassoti taṃsampayutto phasso. So sampayuttāya vedanāya
atk-s0517a:339_13: vipākapaccayavajjehi sesehi sattahi paccayo hoti, anantarāya teheva, sesānaṃ upanissayavaseneva paccayo hoti.
atk-s0517a:340_0: Rūpādīni pañca vissajjanāni khandhavasena niddiṭṭhāni. Sītādīhi ruppati pīḷīyatīti
atk-s0517a:340_1: rūpaṃ. Vedayatīti vedanā. Sañjānātīti saññā. Saṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:340_2: Cakkhādīni dhammavicārapariyantāni dasa chakkavasena, saṭṭhi vissajjanāni piyarūpasātarūpavasena
atk-s0517a:340_3: niddiṭṭhāni. Cakkhusamphassajādikā vedanā taṃtaṃsampayuttāva. Rūpesu saññā rūpasaññā.
atk-s0517a:340_4: Sañcetayatīti sañcetanā, abhisandahatīti attho. Tasatīti taṇhā, pipāsatīti attho.
atk-s0517a:340_5: Vitakketīti vitakko, vitakkanaṃ vā vitakko, ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Ārammaṇe tena cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:340_6: vicaratīti vicāro, vicaraṇaṃ vā vicāro, anusañcaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:341_0: 4. Pathavīdhātādīni cha vissajjanāni saṃkhittena nāmarūpavavatthānavasena niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:341_1: Patthaṭattā pathavī. Appeti, āpīyati, appāyatīti vā āpo. Tejayatīti tejo. Vāyatīti
atk-s0517a:341_2: vāyo. Na kassati na nikassati, kasituṃ chindituṃ bhindituṃ vā na sakkāti ākāso. Nissattaṭṭhena dhātu.
atk-s0517a:342_0: Pathavīkasiṇādīni dasa vissajjanāni kasiṇabhāvanāvasena niddiṭṭhāni. Kasiṇanti sakalapharaṇavasena
atk-s0517a:342_1: kasiṇamaṇḍalampi tasmiṃ upaṭṭhitanimittampi tadārammaṇaṃ jhānampi vuccati. Idha pana
atk-s0517a:342_2: jhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Ādimhi cattāri mahābhūtakasiṇārammaṇāni jhānāni, tato parāni cattāri
atk-s0517a:342_3: vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇāni. Ākāsakasiṇanti paricchedākāso, tadārammaṇañca jhānaṃ, kasiṇugghāṭimākāso,
atk-s0517a:342_4: tadārammaṇañca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Viññāṇakasiṇanti ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇaṃ, tadārammaṇañca viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:343_0: Kesādīni dvattiṃsa vissajjanāni dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānavasena niddiṭṭhāni. Tesu
atk-s0517a:343_1: pana kesādīsu paṭikūlato upaṭṭhitesu kāyagatāsativasena asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0517a:343_2: vaṇṇato upaṭṭhitesu kasiṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, dhātuto upaṭṭhitesu catudhātuvavatthānakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:343_3: hoti, kesātiādīni ca paṭikūlato vaṇṇato vā upaṭṭhitānaṃ tadārammaṇāni jhānāni, dhātuto
atk-s0517a:343_4: upaṭṭhitassa te ca koṭṭhāsā tadārammaṇā ca dhātubhāvanā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:344: Kesā ubhosu passesu kaṇṇacūḷikāhi purato nalāṭantena, pacchato ca galavāṭakena paricchinnā sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā ṭhitā anekasatasahassasaṅkhā.
atk-s0517a:345: Lomā ṭhapetvā kesādīnaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ hatthatalapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena sarīracamme navanavutiyā lomakūpasahassesu likkhāmattaṃ pavisitvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0517a:347: Dantā dvīsu haṇukaṭṭhikesu ṭhitā yebhuyyena dvattiṃsa.
atk-s0517a:348: Taco sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā pākaṭakilomakassa upari chaviyā heṭṭhā ṭhitaṃ cammaṃ.
atk-s0517a:349: Maṃsaṃ sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpitvā ṭhitāni navamaṃsapesisatāni.
atk-s0517a:350: Nhārū sakalasarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitāni nava nhārusatāni.
atk-s0517a:351: Aṭṭhī sakalasarīre heṭṭhā aṭṭhīnaṃ upari ṭhitāni sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni.
atk-s0517a:352: Aṭṭhimiñjā tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitā miñjā.
atk-s0517a:353: Vakkaṃ galavāṭakā nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhā hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā dve maṃsapiṇḍikā.
atk-s0517a:354: Hadayaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe ṭhitaṃ anto cittasannissayaṃ aḍḍhapasatamattalohitapuṇṇaṃ punnāgaṭṭhipatiṭṭhānamattāvāṭakaṃ hadayamaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0517a:355: Yakanaṃ dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ yamakamaṃsapaṭalaṃ.
atk-s0517a:356_0: Kilomakaṃ hadayavakkāni paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ paṭicchannakilomakasaṅkhātañca sakalasarīre
atk-s0517a:356_1: cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ appaṭicchannakilomakasaṅkhātañcāti
atk-s0517a:357: Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ udarajivhāmaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0517a:358: Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antare hadayayakanānaṃ upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ dvattiṃsamaṃsakhaṇḍappabhedaṃ papphāsamaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0517a:359_0: Antaṃ upari galavāṭake heṭṭhā karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante
atk-s0517a:359_1: sarīrabbhantare ṭhitā purisassa dvattiṃsahatthā itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthā ekavīsatiyā
atk-s0517a:360: Antaguṇaṃ antabhoge ekato agalante ābandhitvā ekavīsatiyā antabhogānaṃ antarā ṭhitaṃ bandhanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:361_3: āpajjitvā āmāsayasaṅkhāte uparinābhiantapaṭale ṭhitaṃ nānappakārakaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:362: Karīsaṃ pakkāsayasaṅkhāte heṭṭhā nābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antare ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatte antāvasāne ṭhitaṃ vaccaṃ.
atk-s0517a:363_0: Pittaṃ hadayamaṃsapapphāsānaṃ antare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ mahākosātakīkosakasadise
atk-s0517a:363_2: thaddhasukkhacammañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ abaddhapittasaṅkhātañcāti duvidhaṃ pittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:365_0: Pubbo khāṇukaṇṭakapaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate vā sarīrappadese abbhantaradhātukkhobhavasena
atk-s0517a:365_1: vā uppannesu gaṇḍapīḷakādīsu paripakkalohitapariṇāmo. Lohitaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ
atk-s0517a:365_2: pūretvā hadayavakkapapphāsānaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharantaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse
atk-s0517a:365_5: upādiṇṇasarīraṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitasaṅkhātañcāti duvidhaṃ lohitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:366: Sedo aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvikārādīhi santatte sarīre sabbakesalomakūpavivarehi paggharaṇakaāpodhātu.
atk-s0517a:367: Medo thūlassa sakalasarīre cammamaṃsantare kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito thinasineho.
atk-s0517a:368: Assu somanassadomanassavisabhāgāhārautūhi samuṭṭhahitvā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhantī vā paggharantī vā āpodhātu.
atk-s0517a:369: Vasā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgehi usmājātesu yebhuyyena hatthatalahatthapiṭṭhipādatalapādapiṭṭhināsāpuṭanalāṭaaṃsakūṭesu ṭhito vilīnasineho.
atk-s0517a:370_0: Kheḷo tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passantassa vā sarantassa vā mukhe vā ṭhapentassa hadayaṃ
atk-s0517a:370_1: vā ākilāyantassa kismiñcideva vā jigucchaṃ uppādentassa bhiyyo uppajjitvā ubhohi
atk-s0517a:370_2: kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya tiṭṭhamānā pheṇamissā āpodhātu.
atk-s0517a:371_0: Siṅghāṇikā visabhāgāhārautuvasena sañjātadhātukkhobhassa vā rodantassa vā antosīse
atk-s0517a:371_1: matthaluṅgato galitvā tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhantaṃ vā
atk-s0517a:372: Lasikā aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitaṃ picchilakuṇapaṃ.
atk-s0517a:374: Matthaluṅgaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya ṭhito catupiṇḍasamodhāno miñjarāsi.
atk-s0517a:375_0: Cakkhāyatanādīni dvādasa vissajjanāni dvādasāyatanavasena niddiṭṭhāni. Āyatanato,
atk-s0517a:375_1: āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṃ. Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā
atk-s0517a:375_2: cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti,
atk-s0517a:375_3: vāyamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti, vitthārentīti
atk-s0517a:375_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva
atk-s0517a:375_5: na nivattati, tāva nayanti, pavattayantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:376_0: Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:376_1: ca āyatanaṃ. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ “āyatana”nti
atk-s0517a:376_2: vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro. Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane,
atk-s0517a:376_3: sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho gunnaṃ āyatana”ntiādīsu
atk-s0517a:376_4: sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:376_5: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo
atk-s0517a:376_6: nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ, cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissayattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo
atk-s0517a:376_7: ca nesaṃ ākaro, tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato cakkhādayo ca
atk-s0517a:376_8: nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃnissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito cakkhādayo ca
atk-s0517a:376_9: nesaṃ sañjātideso, cakkhādīnaṃ abhāve abhāvato cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇanti yathāvuttenatthena
atk-s0517a:376_10: cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ sesānipi.
atk-s0517a:377_0: Cakkhudhātādīni aṭṭhārasa vissajjanāni aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena niddiṭṭhāni. Cakkhādīsu
atk-s0517a:377_1: ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṃ vidhīyate, etāya, ettha vā
atk-s0517a:377_2: dhīyatīti dhātu. Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo
atk-s0517a:377_3: viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ, anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti. Bhārahārehi ca bhāro
atk-s0517a:377_4: viya sattehi dhīyante, dhārīyantīti attho. Dukkhavidhānamattameva cetā avasavattanato.
atk-s0517a:377_5: Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi anuvidhīyati. Tathāvihitañcetaṃ etāsveva
atk-s0517a:377_6: dhīyati, ṭhapīyatīti attho. Apica yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na
atk-s0517a:377_7: evametā. Etā pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Yathā ca loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo
atk-s0517a:377_8: selāvayavā dhātuyoti vuccanti, evametāpi dhātuyo viyāti dhātuyo. Vicittā hetā ñāṇaneyyāvayavāti.
atk-s0517a:377_9: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu
atk-s0517a:377_10: dhātusamaññā, evamevetesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā
atk-s0517a:377_11: veditabbā. Aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnā hete cakkhādayoti. Apica dhātūti
atk-s0517a:377_12: nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturo ayaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu
atk-s0517a:377_13: jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti. Yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ dhātu
atk-s0517a:377_14: cāti cakkhudhātu. Evaṃ sesāpi. Manodhātūti ca tisso manodhātuyo. Dhammadhātūti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
atk-s0517a:377_15: soḷasa sukhumarūpāni nibbānañca. Manoviññāṇadhātūti chasattati manoviññāṇadhātuyo.
atk-s0517a:378_0: Cakkhundriyādīni bāvīsati vissajjanāni bāvīsatindriyavasena niddiṭṭhāni. Cakkhumeva
atk-s0517a:378_1: dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti cakkhundriyaṃ. Sotameva savanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0517a:378_2: kāretīti sotindriyaṃ. Ghānameva ghāyanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ghānindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:378_3: Jivhā eva sāyanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti jivhindriyaṃ. Kāyo eva phusanalakkhaṇe
atk-s0517a:378_4: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti kāyindriyaṃ. Manate iti mano, vijānātīti attho. Aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-s0517a:378_5: panāhu – nāliyā minamāno viya mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ manati jānātīti
atk-s0517a:378_6: mano, tadeva mananalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti manindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:379_0: Jīvanti tena taṃsahajātā dhammāti jīvitaṃ, tadeva anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-s0517a:379_1: jīvitindriyaṃ. Taṃ rūpajīvitindriyaṃ arūpajīvitindriyanti duvidhaṃ. Sabbakammajarūpasahajaṃ
atk-s0517a:380: Thīyati saṅghātaṃ gacchati etissā gabbhoti itthī, itthiliṅgādīsu indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, niyamato itthiyā eva indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:381_0: Puṃ-vuccati nirayo, puṃ saṅkhāte niraye risīyati hiṃsīyatīti puriso, purisaliṅgādīsu
atk-s0517a:381_1: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, niyamato purisasseva indriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ. Dvīsupetesu
atk-s0517a:382: Kusalavipākakāyaviññāṇasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ, kāyikasātalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, sukhameva indriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:383: Akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇasampayuttaṃ dukkhaṃ, kāyikaasātalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, dukkhameva indriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:384: Pītisomanassayogato sobhanaṃ mano assāti sumano, sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, cetasikasātalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, somanassameva indriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:385_0: Domanassayogato duṭṭhu mano assāti, hīnavedanattā vā kucchitaṃ mano assāti dummano,
atk-s0517a:385_1: dummanassa bhāvo domanassaṃ, cetasikaasātalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, domanassameva
atk-s0517a:385_3: tenākārena pavattatīti upekkhā, majjhattalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, upekkhā
atk-s0517a:386_0: Saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā, assaddhiyassa
atk-s0517a:386_1: abhibhavanato adhipatiatthena indriyaṃ, adhimokkhalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-s0517a:387_0: Vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ, vīrānaṃ vā kammaṃ, vidhinā vā nayena īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti
atk-s0517a:387_1: vīriyaṃ, kosajjassa abhibhavanato adhipatiatthena indriyaṃ, paggahaṇalakkhaṇe vā
atk-s0517a:387_2: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, vīriyameva indriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:388_0: Saranti tāya, sayaṃ vā sarati, saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati, muṭṭhasaccassa abhibhavanato
atk-s0517a:388_1: adhipatiatthena indriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, sati
atk-s0517a:389_0: Ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā ādhiyati ṭhapetīti samādhi, vikkhepassa abhibhavanato adhipatiatthena
atk-s0517a:389_1: indriyaṃ, avikkhepalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, samādhi eva indriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:390_0: “Idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā nayena ariyasaccāni pajānātīti paññā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “aniccaṃ
atk-s0517a:390_1: dukkhamanattāti paññāpanavasena paññā”ti vuttaṃ. Avijjāya abhibhavanato adhipatiatthena
atk-s0517a:390_2: indriyaṃ, dassanalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, paññā eva indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
atk-s0517a:391_0: Anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammameva vā jānissāmīti
atk-s0517a:391_1: paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Sotāpattimaggañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0517a:392_0: Paṭhamamaggena ñātaṃ mariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā tesaṃyeva tena maggena ñātānaṃ catusaccadhammānameva
atk-s0517a:392_1: jānanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca ājānanakaṃ indriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ. Sotāpattiphalādīsu
atk-s0517a:393_0: Aññātāvino catusaccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato
atk-s0517a:393_1: ca aññātāvindriyaṃ, aññātāvīnaṃ vā catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitakiccānaṃ cattāri saccāni
atk-s0517a:393_2: paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ abbhantare indaṭṭhasādhanena aññātāvindriyaṃ. Arahattaphalañāṇassetaṃ
atk-s0517a:393_3: nāmaṃ. Sabbānipetāni yathāyogaṃ indaliṅgaṭṭhena indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:393_4: indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena indajuṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddho paramissariyabhāvato
atk-s0517a:393_5: indo, kusalākusalañca kammaṃ kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato. Tenevettha kammajanitāni
atk-s0517a:393_6: indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṃ ulliṅgenti, tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:393_7: ca indriyāni. Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā munindena yathābhūtato pakāsitāni abhisambuddhāni
atk-s0517a:393_8: cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Teneva ca bhagavatā munindena
atk-s0517a:393_9: kānici gocarāsevanāya, kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenapi indriyāni.
atk-s0517a:393_10: Api ca ādhipaccasaṅkhātena issariyaṭṭhenapi etāni indriyāni. Cakkhuviññāṇādipavattiyañhi
atk-s0517a:393_11: cakkhādīnaṃ siddhamādhipaccaṃ tasmiṃ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti.
atk-s0517a:395: Kāmadhātuādīni dvādasa vissajjanāni bhavappabhedavasena niddiṭṭhāni. Kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena yuttā dhātu kāmadhātu, kāmasaṅkhātā vā dhātu kāmadhātu.
atk-s0517a:396: Kāmaṃ pahāya rūpena yuttā dhātu rūpadhātu, rūpasaṅkhātā vā dhātu rūpadhātu.
atk-s0517a:397: Kāmañca rūpañca pahāya arūpena yuttā dhātu arūpadhātu, arūpasaṅkhātā vā dhātu arūpadhātu.
atk-s0517a:398_0: Tā eva dhātuyo puna bhavapariyāyena vuttā. Bhavatīti hi bhavoti vuccati. Saññāya
atk-s0517a:398_1: yutto bhavo saññābhavo, saññāsahagato vā bhavo saññābhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti
atk-s0517a:398_2: saññābhavo. So kāmabhavo ca asaññābhavamutto rūpabhavo ca nevasaññānāsaññābhavamutto arūpabhavo ca hoti.
atk-s0517a:400_0: Oḷārikattābhāvato nevasaññā, sukhumattena sambhavato nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā,
atk-s0517a:400_1: tāya yutto bhavo nevasaññānāsaññābhavo. Atha vā oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā, sukhumāya
atk-s0517a:400_2: ca bhāvā nevasaññānāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo, so arūpabhavekadeso.
atk-s0517a:401: Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo ekena vokāro assa bhavassāti ekavokārabhavo, so asaññabhavova.
atk-s0517a:402: Catūhi arūpakkhandhehi vokiṇṇo bhavo catūhi vokāro assa bhavassāti catuvokārabhavo, so arūpabhavo eva.
atk-s0517a:403: Pañcahi khandhehi vokiṇṇo bhavo pañcahi vokāro assa bhavassāti pañcavokārabhavo, so kāmabhavo ca rūpabhavekadeso ca hoti.
atk-s0517a:404_0: 6. Paṭhamajjhānādīni dvādasa vissajjanāni jhānasamāpattivasena niddiṭṭhāni. Jhānanti
atk-s0517a:404_2: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ. Pītisukhacittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ. Sukhacittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ
atk-s0517a:405_0: Medati mejjatīti mettā, siniyhatīti attho. Mitte vā bhavā, mittassa vā esā pavattīti
atk-s0517a:405_1: mettā, paccanīkadhammehi muttattā ārammaṇe cādhimuttattā vimutti, cetaso vimutti
atk-s0517a:407_0: Modanti tāya taṃsamaṅgino, sayaṃ vā modati, modanamattameva vā tanti muditā. “Averā
atk-s0517a:407_1: hontū”tiādibyāpārappahānena majjhattabhāvūpagamanena ca upekkhatīti upekkhā. Mettādayo
atk-s0517a:407_2: tayo brahmavihārā paṭhamādīhi tīhi jhānehi yuttā. Upekkhābrahmavihāro catutthajjhānena yutto.
atk-s0517a:408_0: Pharaṇavasena natthi etassa antoti ananto. Ākāso ananto ākāsānanto, kasiṇugghāṭimākāso.
atk-s0517a:408_1: Ākāsānantoyeva ākāsānañcaṃ, taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa
atk-s0517a:408_3: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti. Pharaṇavasena ca natthi etassa antoti anantaṃ, taṃ ākāsārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:408_4: viññāṇaṃ. Anantameva ānañcaṃ, viññāṇaṃ ānañcaṃ “viññāṇānañca”nti avatvā “viññāṇañca”nti
atk-s0517a:408_5: vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha ruḷhisaddo. Taṃ viññāṇañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa
atk-s0517a:408_6: jhānassa “devānaṃ devāyatanamivā”ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ. Natthi etassa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:408_7: antamaso bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ.
atk-s0517a:408_10: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato, sukhumāya ca bhāvato nevassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa
atk-s0517a:408_11: saññā nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññaṃ. Nevasaññānāsaññañca taṃ manāyatanadhammāyatanapariyāpannattā
atk-s0517a:408_12: āyatanañcāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Atha vā yāyamettha saññā sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ
atk-s0517a:408_13: kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā nāsaññāti
atk-s0517a:408_14: nevasaññānāsaññā, nevasaññānāsaññā ca sā sesadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti
atk-s0517a:408_15: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Ākiñcaññāyatanārammaṇāya samāpattiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na
atk-s0517a:408_16: kevalaṃ ettha saññā edisī, atha kho vedanāpi nevavedanā nāvedanā. Cittampi nevacittaṃ
atk-s0517a:408_17: nācittaṃ. Phassopi nevaphasso nāphasso. Esa nayo sesasampayuttadhammesu. Saññāsīsena
atk-s0517a:409_0: Avijjādīni dvādasa vissajjanāni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgavasena niddiṭṭhāni. Pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:409_1: kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho. Taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā.
atk-s0517a:409_2: Tabbiparītato kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:409_3: rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0517a:409_4: saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0517a:409_5: catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā, antavirahite saṃsāre sabbayonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
atk-s0517a:409_6: satte javāpetīti avijjā, paramatthato avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesupi
atk-s0517a:409_7: khandhādīsu na javatīti avijjā, api ca cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca
atk-s0517a:409_8: dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā. Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:409_9: Namatīti nāmaṃ, nāmayatīti vā nāmaṃ. Ruppatīti rūpaṃ. Āye tanoti, āyatañca nayatīti
atk-s0517a:409_10: āyatanaṃ. Phusatīti phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Paritassatīti taṇhā. Upādiyati bhusaṃ
atk-s0517a:409_11: gaṇhātīti upādānaṃ. Bhavati, bhāvayatīti vā bhavo. Jananaṃ jāti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā. Maranti etenāti maraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:410_0: 7. Dukkhādīni aṭṭhasatāni aṭṭha ca vissajjanāni catusaccayojanāvasena niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:410_1: “Dukkhaṃ abhiññeyya”ntiādīsu hi channaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena catuvīsati vissajjanāni
atk-s0517a:410_3: abhiññeyyā”ti pariyosānena pañcanavutādhikena vissajjanasatena yojetvā vuttāni. Pañcanavutādhikaṃ
atk-s0517a:410_4: catukkasataṃ hoti, tesaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena asītiadhikāni satta vissajjanasatāni.
atk-s0517a:410_5: “Jarāmaraṇaṃ abhiññeyya”ntiādike catukke “cattāri vissajjanānī”ti evaṃ sabbāni aṭṭha
atk-s0517a:410_6: ca satāni aṭṭha ca vissajjanāni honti. Ettha ca tassa tassa dhammassa padhānabhūto
atk-s0517a:410_7: paccayo samudayoti veditabbo. Sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṃ nibbānaṃ nirodhoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:410_8: Anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi hi lokuttarindriyānaṃ ettha abhāvaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0517a:410_10: ariyamaggo eva. Evañhi vuccamāne phalepi maggavohārasambhavato aññindriyaaññātāvindriyānampi
atk-s0517a:410_11: yujjati. Puna dukkhādīnaṃ pariññaṭṭhādivasena aṭṭhasatāni aṭṭha ca vissajjanāni niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-s0517a:410_12: puna dukkhādīnaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhaṭṭhādivasena aṭṭhasatāni aṭṭha ca vissajjanāni niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:410_13: Pariññā ca sā paṭivijjhitabbaṭṭhena paṭivedho cāti pariññāpaṭivedho. Pariññāpaṭivedhova
atk-s0517a:411_0: 8. Puna tāneva dukkhādīni jarāmaraṇapariyantāni dviadhikāni dve padasatāni samudayādīhi
atk-s0517a:411_1: sattahi sattahi padehi yojetvā dviadhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ aṭṭhakasatānaṃ vasena sahassañca
atk-s0517a:411_2: cha ca satāni soḷasa ca vissajjanāni niddiṭṭhāni. Tattha padhānabhūto paccayo samudayo,
atk-s0517a:411_3: tassa nirodho samudayanirodho. Chando eva rāgo chandarāgo, dukkhe sukhasaññāya dukkhassa
atk-s0517a:411_4: chandarāgo, tassa nirodho chandarāganirodho. Dukkhaṃ paṭicca uppajjamānaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0517a:411_5: somanassaṃ dukkhassa assādo. Dukkhassa aniccatā dukkhassa vipariṇāmadhammatā dukkhassa
atk-s0517a:411_6: ādīnavo. Dukkhe chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ. “Yaṃ kho
atk-s0517a:411_7: pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ nirodho tassa nissaraṇa”nti vacanato
atk-s0517a:411_10: ṭhānesu nibbānameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Keci pana “āhārasamudayā dukkhasamudayo
atk-s0517a:411_11: āhāranirodhā dukkhanirodho sarasavasena samudayanirodho, atha vā udayabbayadassanena
atk-s0517a:411_12: samudayanirodho saha vipassanāya maggo chandarāganirodho”ti vadanti. Evañca vuccamāne
atk-s0517a:411_13: lokuttarindriyānaṃ avipassanūpagattā na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ hotīti paṭhamaṃ vuttanayova
atk-s0517a:411_14: gahetabbo. Lokuttarindriyesu hi chandarāgābhāvatoyeva chandarāganirodhoti yujjati.
atk-s0517a:411_15: Sarīre chandarāgeneva sarīrekadesesu kesādīsupi chandarāgo katova hoti, jarāmaraṇavantesu
atk-s0517a:411_16: chandarāgeneva jarāmaraṇesupi chandarāgo katova hoti. Evaṃ assādādīnavāpi yojetabbā.
atk-s0517a:411_17: Puna dukkhādīni jarāmaraṇapariyantāni dviadhikāni dve padasatāni samudayādīhi chahi
atk-s0517a:411_18: chahi padehi yojetvā dviadhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ sattakasatānaṃ vasena nayasahassañca cattāri
atk-s0517a:411_19: ca satāni cuddasa ca vissajjanāni niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-s0517a:412_0: 9. Idāni rūpādīni jarāmaraṇapariyantāni ekādhikāni dve padasatāni sattahi anupassanāhi
atk-s0517a:412_1: yojetvā niddisituṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva aniccānupassanādayo satta anupassanā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0517a:412_2: Tāni sabbāni sattahi suddhikaanupassanāvissajjanehi saddhiṃ sahassañca cattāri ca
atk-s0517a:412_3: satāni cuddasa ca vissajjanāni honti. Aniccanti anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Sā niccasaññāpaṭipakkhā.
atk-s0517a:412_4: Dukkhanti anupassanā dukkhānupassanā. Sā sukhasaññāpaṭipakkhā. Anattāti anupassanā
atk-s0517a:412_5: anattānupassanā. Sā attasaññāpaṭipakkhā. Tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ paripūrattā nibbindatīti
atk-s0517a:412_6: nibbidā, nibbidā ca sā anupassanā cāti nibbidānupassanā. Sā nandipaṭipakkhā. Catassannaṃ
atk-s0517a:412_7: anupassanānaṃ paripūrattā virajjatīti virāgo, virāgo ca so anupassanā cāti virāgānupassanā.
atk-s0517a:412_8: Sā rāgapaṭipakkhā. Pañcannaṃ anupassanānaṃ paripūrattā rāgaṃ nirodhetīti nirodho,
atk-s0517a:412_9: nirodho ca so anupassanā cāti nirodhānupassanā. Sā samudayapaṭipakkhā. Channaṃ anupassanānaṃ
atk-s0517a:412_10: paripūrattā paṭinissajjatīti paṭinissaggo, paṭinissaggo ca so anupassanā cāti paṭinissaggānupassanā.
