atk-s0517a:1682_9: vā pubbe hasitalapitakīḷitavatthūsu vā rāgo anupatati. Byāpādānupatitanti ettha manasikāre
atk-s0517a:1682_10: nirassādagatacittassa uppannadomanassavasena vā pubbe samudāciṇṇesu āghātavatthūsu
atk-s0517a:1682_11: vā byāpādo anupatati. Gāthāsu na samādhiyatīti na samāhitaṃ hoti. Adhicittanti cittasīsena
atk-s0517a:1683_0: 157. Ettāvatā tīhi chakkehi aṭṭhārasa upakkilese niddisitvā idāni tesaṃ upakkilesānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1683_1: samādhissa paripanthabhāvasādhanena ādīnavaṃ dassento puna assāsādimajjhapariyosānantiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1683_2: Tattha kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca hontīti vikkhepasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ vasena rūpakāyopi,
atk-s0517a:1683_3: vikkhepasantativasena cittampi mahatā khobhena khubhitā sadarathā ca honti. Tato
atk-s0517a:1683_4: mandatarena iñjitā kampitā, tato mandatarena phanditā calitā honti. Balavāpi majjhimopi
atk-s0517a:1683_5: mandopi khobho hotiyeva, na sakkā khobhena na bhavitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Cittaṃ vikampitattāti
atk-s0517a:1683_6: cittassa vikampitattā. Gāthāsu paripuṇṇā abhāvitāti yathā paripuṇṇā hoti, tathā abhāvitā.
atk-s0517a:1683_7: Iñjitoti kampito. Phanditoti mandakampito. Heṭṭhā nīvaraṇānaṃ anantarattā “imehi
atk-s0517a:1683_8: ca pana nīvaraṇehī”ti accantasamīpanidassanavacanaṃ kataṃ. Idha pana nigamane nīvaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1683_9: santarattā tehi ca pana nīvaraṇehīti parammukhanidassanavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1686_0: 158. Vodāne ñāṇānīti visuddhañāṇāni. Taṃ vivajjayitvāti yaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ atītānudhāvanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1686_1: cittaṃ vikkhepānupatitaṃ, taṃ vivajjayitvāti sambandhitabbaṃ. Ekaṭṭhāne samādahatīti
atk-s0517a:1686_2: assāsapassāsānaṃ phusanaṭṭhāne samaṃ ādahati patiṭṭhāpeti. Tattheva adhimocetīti
atk-s0517a:1686_3: ekaṭṭhāneti vutte assāsapassāsānaṃ phusanaṭṭhāneyeva sanniṭṭhapeti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti.
atk-s0517a:1686_6: vadanti. Sampajāno hutvāti asubhabhāvanādīhi. Puna sampajāno hutvāti mettābhāvanādīhi.
atk-s0517a:1686_7: Yena rāgena anupatitaṃ, yena byāpādena anupatitaṃ, taṃ pajahatīti sambandho. Taṃ
atk-s0517a:1686_8: cittaṃ īdisanti sampajānanto tappaṭipakkhena rāgaṃ pajahati, byāpādaṃ pajahatīti
atk-s0517a:1686_9: vā attho. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Pariyodātanti pabhassaraṃ. Ekattagataṃ hotīti
atk-s0517a:1686_10: taṃ taṃ visesaṃ pattassa taṃ taṃ ekattaṃ gataṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1687_0: Katame te ekattāti idha yujjamānāyujjamānepi ekatte ekato katvā pucchati. Dānūpasaggupaṭṭhānekattanti
atk-s0517a:1687_1: dānavatthusaṅkhātassa dānassa upasaggo vosajjanaṃ dānūpasaggo, dānavatthupariccāgacetanā.
atk-s0517a:1687_2: Tassa upaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā ṭhānaṃ dānūpasaggupaṭṭhānaṃ, tadeva
atk-s0517a:1687_3: ekattaṃ, tena vā ekattaṃ ekaggabhāvo dānūpasaggupaṭṭhānekattaṃ. Dānavosaggupaṭṭhānekattanti
atk-s0517a:1687_4: pāṭho sundarataro, so evattho. Etena paduddhāravasena cāgānussatisamādhi vutto. Paduddhāravasena
atk-s0517a:1687_5: vuttopi cesa itaresaṃ tiṇṇampi ekattānaṃ upanissayapaccayo hoti, tasmā idha niddiṭṭhanti
atk-s0517a:1687_6: vadanti. Visākhāpi hi mahāupāsikā āha – “idha, bhante, disāsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhū
atk-s0517a:1687_7: sāvatthiṃ āgacchissanti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti
atk-s0517a:1687_8: ‘itthannāmo, bhante, bhikkhu kālaṅkato, tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo’ti? Taṃ bhagavā
atk-s0517a:1687_9: byākarissati sotāpattiphale vā sakadāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arahatte vā. Tyāhaṃ
atk-s0517a:1687_10: upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmi ‘āgatapubbā nu kho, bhante, tena ayyena sāvatthī’ti? Sace
atk-s0517a:1687_11: me vakkhanti ‘āgatapubbā tena bhikkhunā sāvatthī’ti. Niṭṭhamettha gacchissāmi nissaṃsayaṃ
atk-s0517a:1687_12: paribhuttaṃ tena ayyena vassikasāṭikā vā āgantukabhattaṃ vā gamikabhattaṃ vā gilānabhattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1687_13: vā gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ vā gilānabhesajjaṃ vā dhuvayāgu vāti. Tassā me tadanussarantiyā
atk-s0517a:1687_14: pāmojjaṃ jāyissati, pamuditāya pīti jāyissati, pītimanāya kāyo passambhissati, passaddhakāyā
atk-s0517a:1687_15: sukhaṃ vedayissāmi, sukhiniyā cittaṃ samādhiyissati, sā me bhavissati indriyabhāvanā
atk-s0517a:1687_16: balabhāvanā bojjhaṅgabhāvanā”ti. Atha vā ekattesu paṭhamaṃ upacārasamādhivasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1687_17: dutiyaṃ appanāsamādhivasena, tatiyaṃ vipassanāvasena, catutthaṃ maggaphalavasenāti
atk-s0517a:1687_18: veditabbaṃ. Samathassa nimittaṃ samathanimittaṃ. Vayo bhaṅgo eva lakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1687_19: Nirodho nibbānaṃ. Sesametesu tīsu vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1688_0: Cāgādhimuttānanti dāne adhimuttānaṃ. Adhicittanti vipassanāpādakasamādhi. Vipassakānanti
atk-s0517a:1688_1: bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya tīhi anupassanāhi saṅkhāre vipassantānaṃ. Ariyapuggalānanti
atk-s0517a:1688_2: aṭṭhannaṃ. Dutiyādīni tīṇi ekattāni ānāpānassativasena sesakammaṭṭhānavasena ca yujjanti.
atk-s0517a:1688_3: Catūhi ṭhānehīti catūhi kāraṇehi. Samādhivipassanāmaggaphalānaṃ vasena “ekattagataṃ
atk-s0517a:1688_4: cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti
atk-s0517a:1688_5: uddesapadāni. “Paṭhamassa jhānassa ko ādī”tiādīni tesaṃ uddesapadānaṃ vitthāretukamyatāpucchāpubbaṅgamāni
atk-s0517a:1688_6: niddesapadāni. Tattha paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandanti paṭipadā eva nīvaraṇamalavisodhanato
atk-s0517a:1688_7: visuddhi, taṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiṃ pakkhandaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ. Upekkhānubrūhitanti tatramajjhattupekkhāya
atk-s0517a:1688_8: brūhitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsitanti pariyodāpakena ñāṇena sampahaṃsitaṃ
atk-s0517a:1688_9: pariyodāpitaṃ visodhitaṃ. Paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma sasambhāriko upacāro, upekkhānubrūhanā
atk-s0517a:1688_10: nāma appanā, sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇāti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Yasmā pana “ekattagataṃ
atk-s0517a:1688_11: cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ, tasmā antoappanāyameva āgamanavasena
atk-s0517a:1688_14: veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Yasmiñhi vāre appanā uppajjati, tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo
atk-s0517a:1688_15: tassa jhānassa paripantho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati, visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā
atk-s0517a:1688_16: majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati. Majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ nāma samappavatto
atk-s0517a:1688_17: appanāsamādhiyeva. Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittaṃ ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1688_18: upagacchamānaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati nāma. Evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena
atk-s0517a:1688_19: tattha pakkhandati nāma. Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākāranipphādikā paṭhamassa
atk-s0517a:1688_20: jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi veditabbā. Evaṃ visuddhassa
atk-s0517a:1688_21: pana tassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto visuddhaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:1688_22: ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna samādāne byāpāraṃ
atk-s0517a:1688_23: akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathapaṭipannabhāvato eva cassa
atk-s0517a:1688_24: kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto
atk-s0517a:1688_25: ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena upekkhānubrūhanā veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1689_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tattha jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā
atk-s0517a:1689_1: aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā, yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi
atk-s0517a:1689_2: vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni, yaṃ cesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1689_3: anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati, yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā, sabbepi te
atk-s0517a:1689_4: ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā
atk-s0517a:1689_5: sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā pariyodāpitattā nipphannā, tasmā dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena
atk-s0517a:1689_6: pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbāti vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0517a:1689_7: yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, yathāha – “tathāpaggahitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ
atk-s0517a:1689_8: ajjhupekkhati, upekkhāvasena paññāvasena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Upekkhāvasena
atk-s0517a:1689_9: nānattakilesehi cittaṃ vimuccati, vimokkhavasena paññāvasena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1689_10: hoti. Vimuttattā te dhammā ekarasā honti, ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā”ti. Tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā
atk-s0517a:1690_0: Evaṃ tivattagatantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni. Tattha evaṃ tivattagatanti
atk-s0517a:1690_2: tividhabhāvaṃ gataṃ. Vitakkasampannanti kilesakkhobhavirahitattā vitakkena sundarabhāvaṃ
atk-s0517a:1690_3: pannaṃ gataṃ. Cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena
atk-s0517a:1690_4: adhiṭṭhānena sampannaṃ anūnaṃ. Yathā adhiṭṭhānavasiyaṃ adhiṭṭhānanti jhānappavatti,
atk-s0517a:1690_5: tathā idhāpi cittassa adhiṭṭhānanti cittekaggatāpi yujjati. Tena hi ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe
atk-s0517a:1690_6: cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, na ettha vikkhipatīti. “Samādhisampanna”nti visuṃ vuttattā pana
atk-s0517a:1690_7: vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. Atha vā samādhisseva jhānasaṅgahitattā cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti
atk-s0517a:1690_9: dutiyajjhānādīsu pana alabbhamānāni padāni pahāya labbhamānakavasena pītisampannantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1691_0: Aniccānupassanādīsu aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu vitakkādayo paripuṇṇāyeva tāsaṃ kāmāvacarattā.
atk-s0517a:1691_1: Etāsu ca appanāya abhāvato paṭipadāvisuddhiādayo khaṇikasamādhivasena yojetabbā.
atk-s0517a:1691_2: Catūsu maggesu paṭhamajjhānikavasena vitakkādīnaṃ labbhanato labbhamānakavaseneva
atk-s0517a:1691_3: vitakkādayo paripuṇṇā vuttā. Dutiyajjhānikādīsu hi maggesu vitakkādayo jhānesu viya
atk-s0517a:1691_4: parihāyantīti. Ettāvatā terasa vodānañāṇāni vitthārato niddiṭṭhāni honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0517a:1691_5: Ekaṭṭhāne samādahanena tattheva adhimuccanena kosajjappajahanena uddhaccappajahanena
atk-s0517a:1691_6: rāgappajahanena byāpādappajahanena sampayuttāni cha ñāṇāni, catūhi ekattehi sampayuttāni
atk-s0517a:1692_0: 159. Evaṃ santepi ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanāvasena tesaṃ nipphattiṃ dassetukāmo tāni
atk-s0517a:1692_1: ñāṇāni anigametvāva nimittaṃ assāsapassāsātiādinā nayena codanāpubbaṅgamaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanāvidhiṃ
atk-s0517a:1692_2: dassetvā ante tāni ñāṇāni nigametvā dassesi. Tattha nimittaṃ vuttameva. Anārammaṇāmekacittassāti
atk-s0517a:1692_3: anārammaṇā ekacittassa. Ma-kāro panettha padasandhikaro. Anārammaṇamekacittassātipi
atk-s0517a:1692_4: pāṭho, ekassa cittassa ārammaṇaṃ na bhavantīti attho. Tayo dhammeti nimittādayo tayo
atk-s0517a:1692_5: dhamme. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. Kathanti paṭhamaṃ vuttāya codanāgāthāya
atk-s0517a:1692_6: anantaraṃ vuttāya parihāragāthāya atthaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Na cimeti na ca ime.
atk-s0517a:1692_7: Na cametipi pāṭho, soyeva padacchedo. Kathaṃ na ca aviditā honti, kathaṃ na ca cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:1692_8: vikkhepaṃ gacchatīti evaṃ kathaṃ saddo sesehi pañcahi yojetabbo. Padhānañca paññāyatīti
atk-s0517a:1692_9: ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanārambhakaṃ vīriyaṃ sandissati. Vīriyañhi padahanti tenāti
atk-s0517a:1692_10: padhānanti vuccati. Payogañca sādhetīti nīvaraṇavikkhambhakaṃ jhānañca yogī nipphādeti.
atk-s0517a:1692_11: Jhānañhi nīvaraṇavikkhambhanāya payuñjīyatīti payogoti vuttaṃ. Visesamadhigacchatīti
atk-s0517a:1692_12: saṃyojanappahānakaraṃ maggañca paṭilabhati. Maggo hi samathavipassanānaṃ ānisaṃsattā
atk-s0517a:1692_13: visesoti vutto. Visesassa ca pamukhabhūtattā ca-kārena samuccayo na kato.
atk-s0517a:1693_0: Idāni taṃ pucchitamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento seyyathāpi rukkhotiādimāha. Tassattho
atk-s0517a:1693_1: – yathā nāma kakacena phālanatthaṃ vāsiyā tacchitvā rukkho phālanakāle niccalabhāvatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:1693_2: same bhūmipadese payogakkhamaṃ katvā ṭhapito. Kakacenāti hatthakakacena. Āgateti
atk-s0517a:1693_3: rukkhaṃ phusitvā attano samīpabhāgaṃ āgate. Gateti rukkhaṃ phusitvā parabhāgaṃ gate.
atk-s0517a:1693_4: Vā-saddo samuccayattho. Na aviditā hontīti rukkhe kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaṃ purisena
atk-s0517a:1693_5: pekkhamānaṃ ṭhānaṃ appatvā tesaṃ āgamanagamanābhāvato sabbepi kakacadantā viditāva
atk-s0517a:1693_7: vacanaṃ upamāya natthi. Upanibandhanā nimittanti upanibandhanāya satiyā nimittabhūtaṃ
atk-s0517a:1693_8: kāraṇabhūtaṃ nāsikaggaṃ vā mukhanimittaṃ vā. Upanibandhati etāya ārammaṇe cittanti
atk-s0517a:1693_9: upanibandhanā nāma sati. Nāsikagge vāti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge. Mukhanimitte vāti
atk-s0517a:1693_10: rassanāsiko uttaroṭṭhe. Uttaroṭṭho hi mukhe satiyā nimittanti mukhanimittanti vutto.
atk-s0517a:1693_11: Āgateti phuṭṭhaṭṭhānato abbhantaraṃ āgate. Gateti phuṭṭhaṭṭhānato bahiddhā gate.
atk-s0517a:1693_12: Na aviditā hontīti phusanaṭṭhānaṃ appatvā assāsapassāsānaṃ āgamanagamanābhāvato sabbepi
atk-s0517a:1693_13: te viditā eva honti. Kammaniyaṃ hotīti yena vīriyena kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ
atk-s0517a:1693_14: bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti. Idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānaṃ nāmāti phalena kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1693_15: Upakkilesā pahīyantīti vikkhambhanavasena nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti. Vitakkā vūpasammantīti
atk-s0517a:1693_16: nānārammaṇacārino anavaṭṭhitā vitakkā upasamaṃ gacchanti. Yena jhānena upakkilesā
atk-s0517a:1693_17: pahīyanti, vitakkā vūpasammanti. Ayaṃ payogoti payogamapekkhitvā pulliṅganiddeso
atk-s0517a:1693_18: kato. Saññojanā pahīyantīti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhā saññojanā samucchedappahānena pahīyanti.
atk-s0517a:1693_19: Anusayā byantīhontīti pahīnānaṃ puna anuppattidhammakattā vigato uppādanto vā vayanto
atk-s0517a:1693_20: vā etesanti byantā, pubbe abyantā byantā hontīti byantīhonti, vinassantīti attho.
atk-s0517a:1693_21: Saññojanappahānaṃ anusayappahānena hoti, na aññathāti dassanatthaṃ anusayappahānamāha.
atk-s0517a:1693_22: Yena maggena saññojanā pahīyanti anusayā byantīhonti, ayaṃ visesoti attho. Catutthacatukke
atk-s0517a:1693_23: ariyamaggassāpi niddiṭṭhattā idha ariyamaggo vutto. Ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvassa
atk-s0517a:1693_24: avuttepi siddhattā taṃ avissajjetvāva evaṃ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇā na
atk-s0517a:1694_0: 160. Idāni taṃ bhāvanāsiddhisādhakaṃ yogāvacaraṃ thunanto ānāpānassati yassāti gāthaṃ
atk-s0517a:1694_1: vatvā tassā niddesamāha. Tattha ānāpānassatiyo yathā buddhena desitā, tathā paripuṇṇā
atk-s0517a:1694_2: subhāvitā anupubbaṃ paricitā yassa atthi saṃvijjanti. So imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti. Kiṃ
atk-s0517a:1694_3: viya? Abbhā muttova candimā yathā abbhādīhi mutto candimā imaṃ okāsalokaṃ pabhāseti,
atk-s0517a:1694_4: tathā so yogāvacaro imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ pabhāsetīti gāthāya sambandho. “Abbhā muttova
atk-s0517a:1694_5: candimā”ti ca padassa niddese mahikādīnampi vuttattā ettha ādisaddalopo katoti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1694_6: Gāthāniddese no passāso no assāsoti so soyeva attho paṭisedhena visesetvā vutto.
atk-s0517a:1694_7: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti asammussanatāya tameva assāsaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ sati nāmāti attho.
atk-s0517a:1694_8: Tathā passāsaṃ. Ettāvatā ānāpānesu sati ānāpānassatīti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1695_0: Idāni sativaseneva “yassā”ti vuttaṃ puggalaṃ niddisitukāmo yo assasati, tassupaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1695_1: Yo passasati, tassupaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ. Yo assasati, tassa sati assāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:1695_2: Yo passasati, tassa sati passāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti attho. Paripuṇṇāti jhānavipassanāmaggaparamparāya
atk-s0517a:1695_3: arahattamaggappattiyā paripuṇṇā. Teyeva hi jhānavipassanāmaggadhamme sandhāya pariggahaṭṭhenātiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1695_4: Te hi dhammā iminā yoginā pariggayhamānattā pariggahā, tena pariggahaṭṭhena paripuṇṇā.
atk-s0517a:1695_5: Tattha sabbesaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ aññamaññaparivārattā parivāraṭṭhena paripuṇṇā. Bhāvanāpāripūrivasena
atk-s0517a:1695_6: paripūraṭṭhena paripuṇṇā. Catasso bhāvanātiādīni subhāvitāti vuttapadassa atthavasena
atk-s0517a:1695_7: vuttāni. Catasso bhāvanā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Yānīkatāti yuttayānasadisā katā. Vatthukatāti
atk-s0517a:1695_8: patiṭṭhaṭṭhena vatthusadisā katā. Anuṭṭhitāti paccupaṭṭhitā. Paricitāti samantato
atk-s0517a:1695_9: citā upacitā. Susamāraddhāti suṭṭhu samāraddhā sukatā. Yattha yattha ākaṅkhatīti
atk-s0517a:1695_10: yesu yesu jhānesu yāsu yāsu vipassanāsu sace icchati. Tattha tatthāti tesu tesu jhānesu
atk-s0517a:1695_11: tāsu tāsu vipassanāsu. Vasippattoti vasībhāvaṃ bahubhāvaṃ patto. Balappattoti samathavipassanābalappatto.
atk-s0517a:1695_12: Vesārajjappattoti visāradabhāvaṃ paṭubhāvaṃ patto. Te dhammāti samathavipassanā dhammā.
atk-s0517a:1695_13: Āvajjanapaṭibaddhāti āvajjanāyattā, āvajjitamatteyeva tassa santānena, ñāṇena vā
atk-s0517a:1695_14: sampayogaṃ gacchantīti attho. Ākaṅkhapaṭibaddhāti ruciāyattā, rocitamatteyeva vuttanayena
atk-s0517a:1695_15: sampayogaṃ gacchantīti attho. Manasikāro panettha āvajjanāya cittuppādo. Ākaṅkhanāya
atk-s0517a:1695_16: vevacanavasena atthavivaraṇatthaṃ vutto. Tena vuccati yānīkatāti evaṃ katattāyeva
atk-s0517a:1695_17: te yuttayānasadisā katā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1696_0: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vatthusminti soḷasasu vatthūsu ekekasmiṃ. Svādhiṭṭhitanti suppatiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1696_1: Sūpaṭṭhitāti suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā. Sampayuttacittasatīnaṃ saheva sakasakakiccakaraṇato
atk-s0517a:1696_2: anulomapaṭilomavasena yojetvā te dve dhammā dassitā. Tena vuccati vatthukatāti evaṃ
atk-s0517a:1696_3: bhūtattāyeva katapatiṭṭhā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yena yena cittaṃ abhinīharatīti pubbappavattito
atk-s0517a:1696_4: apanetvā yattha yattha bhāvanāvisese cittaṃ upaneti. Tena tena sati anuparivattatīti
atk-s0517a:1696_5: tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva bhāvanāvisese sati anukūlā hutvā pubbappavattito nivattitvā pavattati.
atk-s0517a:1696_6: “Yena, tenā”ti cettha “yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādīsu viya bhummattho veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1696_7: Tena vuccati anuṭṭhitāti evaṃ karaṇatoyeva taṃ taṃ bhāvanaṃ anugantvā ṭhitā hontīti
atk-s0517a:1696_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Ānāpānassatiyā satipadhānattā vatthukatānuṭṭhitapadesu satiyā saha yojanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1697_0: Yasmā pana paripuṇṇāyeva paricitā honti vaḍḍhitā laddhāsevanā, tasmā “paripuṇṇā”tipade
atk-s0517a:1697_1: vuttā tayo atthā “paricitā”tipadepi vuttā, catuttho visesatthopi vutto. Tattha satiyā
atk-s0517a:1697_2: pariggaṇhantoti sampayuttāya, pubbabhāgāya vā satiyā pariggahetabbe pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0517a:1697_3: yogī. Jināti pāpake akusale dhammeti samucchedavasena lāmake kilese jināti abhibhavati.
atk-s0517a:1697_4: Ayañca puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā. Dhammesu hi jinantesu taṃdhammasamaṅgīpuggalopi
atk-s0517a:1697_5: jināti nāma. Te ca dhammā satiṃ avihāya attano pavattikkhaṇe jinitumāraddhā jitāti
atk-s0517a:1697_6: vuccanti yathā “bhuñjitumāraddho bhutto”ti vuccati. Lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthato
atk-s0517a:1697_7: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ santepi “parijitā”ti vattabbe ja-kārassa ca-kāraṃ katvā “paricitā”ti
atk-s0517a:1697_8: vuttaṃ, yathā sammā gado assāti sugatoti atthavikappe da-kārassa ta-kāro niruttilakkhaṇena
atk-s0517a:1697_9: kato, evamidhāpi veditabbo. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe paricitāti padaṃ kattusādhanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1698_0: Cattāro susamāraddhāti cattāro susamāraddhatthāti vuttaṃ hoti, atthasaddassa lopo
atk-s0517a:1698_1: daṭṭhabbo. Susamāraddhāti padassa atthāpi hi idha susamāraddhāti vuttāti veditabbā,
atk-s0517a:1698_2: susamāraddhadhammā vā. Caturatthabhedato cattāroti vuttāti veditabbā, na dhammabhedato.
atk-s0517a:1698_3: Yasmā pana subhāvitāyeva susamāraddhā honti, na aññe, tasmā tayo bhāvanatthā idhāpi
atk-s0517a:1698_4: vuttā. Āsevanatthopi tīsu vuttesu vuttoyeva hoti, tasmā taṃ avatvā tappaccanīkānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1698_5: susamūhatattho vutto. Paccanīkasamugghātena hi āraddhapariyosānaṃ paññāyati, tena
atk-s0517a:1698_6: susamāraddhassa sikhāppatto attho vutto hoti. Tattha tappaccanīkānanti tesaṃ jhānavipassanāmaggānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1698_9: Potthakesu pana “susamugghātattā”ti likhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
atk-s0517a:1699_0: 161. Puna tasseva padassa aññampi atthavikappaṃ dassento susamantiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0517a:1699_1: tattha jātāti tasmiṃ sikhāppattabhāvanāvisese jātā. Anavajjāti kilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvānupagamanena
atk-s0517a:1699_2: kilesadosavirahitā. Kusalāti jātivasena kusalā. Bodhipakkhiyāti bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhīti
atk-s0517a:1699_3: laddhanāmassa ariyassa pakkhe bhavattā bodhipakkhiyā. Pakkhe bhavattāti hi upakārabhāve
atk-s0517a:1699_4: ṭhitattā. Te ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā,
atk-s0517a:1699_5: pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti sattatiṃsa
atk-s0517a:1699_6: dhammā. Idaṃ samanti idaṃ maggakkhaṇe dhammajātaṃ samucchedavasena kilese sameti
atk-s0517a:1699_7: vināsetīti samaṃ nāma. Nirodho nibbānanti dukkhanirodhattā nirodho, vānasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0517a:1699_8: taṇhāya abhāvā nibbānaṃ. Idaṃ susamanti idaṃ nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavisamāpagatattā
atk-s0517a:1699_9: suṭṭhu samanti susamaṃ nāma. Ñātanti bodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātaṃ samaṃ asammohato ñāṇena
atk-s0517a:1699_10: ñātaṃ, nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ susamaṃ ārammaṇato ñāṇena ñātaṃ. Tadeva dvayaṃ teneva cakkhunā
atk-s0517a:1699_11: viya diṭṭhaṃ. Viditanti tadeva dvayaṃ santāne uppādanena ārammaṇakaraṇena ca paṭiladdhaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1699_12: Ñātaṃ viya paññāya sacchikataṃ phassitañca. “Asallīnaṃ asammuṭṭhā asāraddho ekagga”nti
atk-s0517a:1699_13: purimassa purimassa padassa atthappakāsanaṃ. Tattha āraddhanti paṭṭhapitaṃ. Asallīnanti
atk-s0517a:1699_14: asaṅkucitaṃ. Upaṭṭhitāti upagantvā ṭhitā. Asammuṭṭhāti avinaṭṭhā. Passaddhoti nibbuto.
atk-s0517a:1699_15: Asāraddhoti niddaratho. Samāhitanti samaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Ekagganti avikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1700_1: pana susamavacanassa, “ñāta”ntiādi āraddhavacanassa vikappatthā. Tatthāyaṃ padatthasaṃsandanā
atk-s0517a:1700_2: – “samā ca susamā ca samasusamā”ti vattabbe ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ katvā “susamā” icceva
atk-s0517a:1700_3: vuttā yathā nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti. “Idaṃ samaṃ, idaṃ susama”nti
atk-s0517a:1700_4: pana anaññāpekkhaṃ katvā napuṃsakavacanaṃ kataṃ. Yasmā pana ñātampi diṭṭhanti vuccati,
atk-s0517a:1700_5: diṭṭhañca āraddhañca atthato ekaṃ. Viditasacchikataphassitāni pana ñātavevacanāni,
atk-s0517a:1701_0: Āraddhaṃ hoti vīriyaṃ asallīnanti ayaṃ pana āraddhavacanassa ujukatthoyeva. Upaṭṭhitā
atk-s0517a:1701_1: satītiādīni pana sampayuttavīriyassa upakārakadhammadassanatthaṃ vuttāni, na āraddhavacanassa
atk-s0517a:1701_2: atthadassanatthaṃ. Purimena atthena suṭṭhu samāraddhāti susamāraddhā ca, iminā atthena
atk-s0517a:1701_3: susamā āraddhāti susamāraddhā ca ekasese kate “susamāraddhā”ti vuccanti. Imamatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:1702_0: Anupubbanti yathānukkamenāti attho, pubbaṃ pubbaṃ anūti vuttaṃ hoti. Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti
atk-s0517a:1702_1: dīghanti vuttaassāsavasena. Purimā purimāti purimā purimā sati. Etena pubbantipadassa
atk-s0517a:1702_2: attho vutto hoti. Pacchimā pacchimāti satiyeva. Etena anūtipadassa attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a:1702_3: Ubhayena pubbañca anu ca paricitāti attho vutto hoti. Upari soḷasa vatthūni vitthāretvā
atk-s0517a:1702_4: vacanato idha saṅkhipitvā “paṭinissaggānupassī”ti antimameva dassitaṃ. Yasmā sikhāppattabhāvanassa
atk-s0517a:1702_5: sabbāpi ānāpānassatiyo punappunaṃ yathāruci pavattanato anuparicitāpi honti. Tena
atk-s0517a:1702_6: vuttaṃ – “aññamaññaṃ paricitā ceva honti anuparicitā cā”ti.
atk-s0517a:1703_0: Yathatthāti yathāsabhāvatthā. Attadamathatthoti arahattamaggakkhaṇe attano nibbisevanattho.
atk-s0517a:1704_0: Buddhotipadassa abhāvepi buddhenātipade yo so buddho, taṃ niddisitukāmena buddhoti
atk-s0517a:1704_1: vuttaṃ. Sayambhūti upadesaṃ vinā sayameva bhūto. Anācariyakoti sayambhūpadassa atthavivaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1704_2: Yo hi ācariyaṃ vinā saccāni paṭivijjhati, so sayambhū nāma hoti. Pubbe ananussutesūtiādi
atk-s0517a:1704_3: anācariyakabhāvassa atthappakāsanaṃ. Ananussutesūti ācariyaṃ ananussutesu. Sāmanti
atk-s0517a:1704_4: sayameva. Abhisambujjhīti bhusaṃ sammā paṭivijjhi. Tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇīti
atk-s0517a:1704_5: tesu ca saccesu sabbaññubhāvaṃ pāpuṇi. Yathā saccāni paṭivijjhantā sabbaññuno honti,
atk-s0517a:1704_6: tathā saccānaṃ paṭividdhattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbaññutaṃ pattotipi pāṭho. Balesu ca
atk-s0517a:1704_7: vasībhāvanti dasasu ca tathāgatabalesu issarabhāvaṃ pāpuṇi. Yo so evaṃ bhūto, so
atk-s0517a:1704_8: buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha sabbesu dhammesu appaṭihatañāṇanimittānuttaravimokkhādhigamaparibhāvitaṃ
atk-s0517a:1704_9: khandhasantānaṃ upādāya paṇṇattiko, sabbaññutapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya
atk-s0517a:1704_10: paṇṇattiko sattaviseso buddho. Ettāvatā atthato buddhavibhāvanā katā hoti.
atk-s0517a:1705_0: 162. Idāni byañjanato vibhāvento buddhoti kenaṭṭhena buddhotiādimāha. Tattha yathā
atk-s0517a:1705_1: loke avagantā avagatoti vuccati, evaṃ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho. Yathā paṇṇasosā
atk-s0517a:1705_2: vātā paṇṇasusāti vuccanti, evaṃ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho. Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya
atk-s0517a:1705_3: buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammānaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0517a:1705_4: diṭṭhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhanīyato sayameva
atk-s0517a:1705_5: buddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva
atk-s0517a:1705_6: vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhotiādīhi chahi pariyāyehi
atk-s0517a:1705_8: buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekattā saṅkhātenāti vacanassa koṭṭhāsenāti
atk-s0517a:1705_10: pahīnattā ekantavacanena visesetvā ekantavītarāgotiādi vuttaṃ. Ekantanikkilesoti
atk-s0517a:1705_11: rāgadosamohāvasesehi sabbakilesehi nikkileso. Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1705_12: dhātūnaṃ bujjhanatthattā bujjhanatthāpi dhātuyo gamanatthā honti, tasmā ekāyanamaggaṃ
atk-s0517a:1705_13: gatattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekāyanamaggoti cettha –
atk-s0517a:1707: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0517a:1708_0: Maggassa bahūsu nāmesu ayananāmena vutto. Tasmā ekamaggabhūto maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti
atk-s0517a:1708_1: attho. Atha vā ekena ayitabbo maggoti ekāyanamaggo. Ekenāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya
atk-s0517a:1708_2: pavivekena cittena. Ayitabboti paṭipajjitabbo. Ayanti vā etenāti ayano, saṃsārato
atk-s0517a:1708_3: nibbānaṃ gacchantīti attho. Ekesaṃ ayano ekāyano. Eketi seṭṭhā, sabbasattaseṭṭhā
atk-s0517a:1708_4: ca sammāsambuddhā, tasmā ekāyanamaggoti sammāsambuddhānaṃ ayanabhūto maggoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0517a:1708_5: hoti. Ayatīti vā ayano, gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ekasmiṃ ayano maggoti ekāyanamaggo,
atk-s0517a:1708_6: ekasmiṃyeva buddhasāsane pavattamāno maggo, na aññatthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Api ca ekaṃ
atk-s0517a:1708_7: ayatīti ekāyano, pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva
atk-s0517a:1708_8: gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā ekāyanamaggoti ekanibbānagamanamaggoti attho. Eko anuttaraṃ
atk-s0517a:1708_9: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho, kiṃ pana sayameva
atk-s0517a:1708_10: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Abuddhivihatattā
atk-s0517a:1708_11: buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti pariyāyavacanametaṃ. Tattha yathā
atk-s0517a:1708_12: nīlarattaguṇayogā nīlo paṭo ratto paṭoti vuccati, evaṃ buddhaguṇayogā buddhoti ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1709_0: Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi “atthamanugatā ayaṃ paññattī”ti ñāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0517a:1709_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha mittā sahāyā. Amaccā bhaccā. Ñātī pitupakkhikā. Sālohitā mātupakkhikā.
atk-s0517a:1709_2: Samaṇā pabbajjūpagatā. Brāhmaṇā bhovādino, samitapāpabāhitapāpā vā. Devatā sakkādayo
atk-s0517a:1709_3: brahmāno ca. Vimokkhantikanti vimokkho arahattamaggo, vimokkhassa anto arahattaphalaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1709_4: tasmiṃ vimokkhante bhavaṃ vimokkhantikaṃ nāma. Sabbaññubhāvo hi arahattamaggena sijjhati,
atk-s0517a:1709_5: arahattaphalodaye siddho hoti, tasmā sabbaññubhāvo vimokkhante bhavo hoti. Taṃ nemittikampi
atk-s0517a:1709_6: nāmaṃ vimokkhante bhavaṃ nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantāna”nti.
atk-s0517a:1709_7: Bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhāti mahābodhirukkhamūle yathāvuttakkhaṇe
atk-s0517a:1709_8: sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhena saha. Sacchikā paññattīti arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0517a:1709_9: sabbadhammasacchikiriyāya vā jātā paññatti. Yadidaṃ buddhoti yā ayaṃ buddhoti paññatti,
atk-s0517a:1710_0: “Yathā buddhena desitā”tigāthāpādassa pana iminā padabhājanīye vuttatthena ayaṃ saṃsandanā
atk-s0517a:1710_1: – ānāpānassatiyo ca yathā buddhena desitā, yena pakārena desitā. Yathāsaddena saṅgahitā
atk-s0517a:1710_2: dasa yathatthā ca yathā buddhena desitā, yena pakārena desitāti pakāratthassa ca
atk-s0517a:1710_3: yathāsaddassa, sabhāvatthassa ca yathāsaddassa sarūpekasesavasena ekasesaṃ katvā
atk-s0517a:1710_4: “yathā”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Padabhājanīye panassa yathatthesu ekekassa yojanāvasena
atk-s0517a:1711_0: “Soti gahaṭṭho vā hoti pabbajito vā”ti vuttattā ādipadepi yassa gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa
atk-s0517a:1711_1: vāti vuttameva hoti. Lokattho vuttoyeva. Pabhāsetīti attano ñāṇassa pākaṭaṃ karotīti
atk-s0517a:1711_2: attho. Abhisambuddhattāti sāvakapāramiñāṇenapi paṭividdhabhāvena. Obhāsetīti kāmāvacarabhūtaṃ
atk-s0517a:1711_3: lokaṃ. Bhāsetīti rūpāvacarabhūtaṃ lokaṃ. Pabhāsetīti arūpāvacarabhūtaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1712_0: Ariyañāṇanti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Mahikā muttoti mahikāya mutto. Mahikāti nīhāro vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1712_1: Mahiyā muttotipi pāṭho. Dhūmarajā muttoti dhūmato ca rajato ca mutto. Rāhugahaṇā
atk-s0517a:1712_2: vippamuttoti rāhuno candassa āsannupakkilesattā dvīhi upasaggehi visesetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1712_3: Bhāsate iti saobhāsaṭṭhena. Tapate iti satejaṭṭhena. Virocate iti ruciraṭṭhena. Evamevanti
atk-s0517a:1712_4: evaṃ evaṃ. Yasmā pana candopi sayaṃ bhāsanto tapanto virocanto imaṃ okāsalokaṃ obhāseti,
atk-s0517a:1712_5: bhikkhu ca paññāya bhāsanto tapanto virocanto imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ paññāya obhāseti,
atk-s0517a:1712_6: tasmā ubhayatrāpi “bhāsetī”ti avatvā “bhāsate” icceva vuttaṃ. Evañhi vutte hetuatthopi
atk-s0517a:1712_7: vutto hoti. Ativisadatarābhasūriyopamaṃ aggahetvā kasmā candopamā gahitāti ce? Sabbakilesapariḷāhavūpasamena
atk-s0517a:1712_8: santassa bhikkhuno santaguṇayuttacandopamā anucchavikāti gahitāti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0517a:1712_9: ānāpānassatibhāvanāsiddhisādhakaṃ yogāvacaraṃ thunitvā imāni terasa vodāne ñāṇānīti
atk-s0517a:1715_0: 163. Satokāriñāṇaniddese mātikāyaṃ idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. Ayañhi
atk-s0517a:1715_2: aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca. Vuttañhetaṃ – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe…
atk-s0517a:1716_0: Araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vāti idamassa ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1716_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhiārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1716_2: abhiruhituṃ na icchati, kūṭagoṇayuttaratho viya uppathameva dhāvati. Tasmā seyyathāpi
atk-s0517a:1716_3: nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0517a:1716_4: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya, athassa
atk-s0517a:1716_5: so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya
atk-s0517a:1716_6: vā upanipajjeyya vā, evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0517a:1716_7: duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ
atk-s0517a:1716_8: vā pavesetvā tattha assāsapassāsathambhe satiyottena bandhitabbaṃ. Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:1716_9: ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0517a:1716_10: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0517a:1717: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
atk-s0517a:1719_0: Evamassa taṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanānurūpaṃ hoti. Atha vā yasmā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānappabhede
atk-s0517a:1719_3: na sukaraṃ bhāvetuṃ saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassa. Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena
atk-s0517a:1719_4: idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatukkajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0517a:1719_5: saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ. Tasmā tassa anurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1720_0: Vatthuvijjācariyo viya hi bhagavā, so yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā
atk-s0517a:1720_1: suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati, sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite
atk-s0517a:1720_2: rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati, evamevaṃ yogāvacarassa anurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā
atk-s0517a:1720_3: “ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati, tato tattha kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttena
atk-s0517a:1720_4: yoginā kamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ
atk-s0517a:1720_5: labhati. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu “dīpisadiso”ti vuccati. Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1720_6: vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo
atk-s0517a:1720_7: mige gaṇhāti, evamevaṃ ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena
atk-s0517a:1720_8: sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamagge ceva ariyaphalāni ca gaṇhātīti veditabbo. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0517a:1725_0: Tattha araññagatoti upari vuttalakkhaṇaṃ yaṃkiñci pavivekasukhaṃ araññaṃ gato. Rukkhamūlagatoti
atk-s0517a:1725_1: rukkhasamīpaṃ gato. Suññāgāragatoti suññaṃ vivittokāsaṃ gato. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā araññañca
atk-s0517a:1725_3: Navavidhañhi senāsanaṃ. Yathāha – “so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0517a:1725_4: pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñja”nti. Evamassa
atk-s0517a:1725_6: alīnānuddhaccapakkhikaṃ santamiriyāpathaṃ upadisanto nisīdatīti āha. Athassa nisajjāya
atk-s0517a:1725_8: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvātiādimāha. Tattha pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Ābhujitvāti
atk-s0517a:1725_9: bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake
atk-s0517a:1725_10: koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā. Evañhi nisinnassa dhammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa
atk-s0517a:1725_11: yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. Tāsu anuppajjamānāsu
atk-s0517a:1725_12: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0517a:1726_0: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā. So satova
atk-s0517a:1726_1: assasati sato passasatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ nisīditvā evañca satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā taṃ
atk-s0517a:1726_2: satiṃ avijahanto sato eva assasati sato passasati, satokārī hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1727_0: Idāni yehi pakārehi satokārī hoti, te pakāre dassetuṃ dīghaṃ vā assasantotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1727_1: Tattha dīghaṃ vā assasantoti dīghaṃ vā assāsaṃ pavattayanto. Tathā rassaṃ. Yā pana
atk-s0517a:1727_2: nesaṃ dīgharassatā, sā kālavasena veditabbā. Kadāci hi manussā hatthiahiādayo viya
atk-s0517a:1727_3: kālavasena dīghaṃ assasanti ca passasanti ca, kadāci sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1727_4: Aññathā hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇā assāsapassāsā dīgharassā nāma na honti. Tasmā te dīghaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0517a:1727_5: pavisantā ca nikkhamantā ca dīghā, rassaṃ kālaṃ pavisantā ca nikkhamantā ca rassāti
atk-s0517a:1727_6: veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu upari vuttehi navahākārehi dīghaṃ assasanto ca passasanto
atk-s0517a:1727_7: ca dīghaṃ assasāmi, passasāmīti pajānāti, tathā rassaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1729: “Dīgho rasso ca assāso, passāsopi ca tādiso;
atk-s0517a:1731_1: veditabbā. Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmīti sikkhati. Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī passasissāmīti
atk-s0517a:1731_2: sikkhatīti sakalassa assāsakāyassādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto
atk-s0517a:1731_3: assasissāmīti sikkhati. Sakalassa passāsakāyassādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto
atk-s0517a:1731_4: pākaṭaṃ karonto passasissāmīti sikkhati. Evaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttacittena
atk-s0517a:1731_5: assasati ceva passasati ca. Tasmā “assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1731_6: Ekassa hi bhikkhuno cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭe assāsakāye, passāsakāye vā ādi pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1731_7: na majjhapariyosānaṃ. So ādimeva pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, majjhapariyosāne kilamati.
atk-s0517a:1731_8: Ekassa majjhaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, na ādipariyosānaṃ. So majjhameva pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1731_9: ādipariyosāne kilamati. Ekassa pariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, na ādimajjhaṃ. So pariyosānaṃyeva
atk-s0517a:1731_10: pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, ādimajjhe kilamati. Ekassa sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, so sabbampi
atk-s0517a:1731_11: pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, na katthaci kilamati. Tādisena bhavitabbanti dassento āha –
atk-s0517a:1732_0: Tattha sikkhatīti evaṃ ghaṭati vāyamati. Yo vā tathābhūtassa saṃvaro, ayamettha adhisīlasikkhā.
atk-s0517a:1732_1: Yo tathābhūtassa samādhi, ayaṃ adhicittasikkhā. Yā tathābhūtassa paññā, ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhāti
atk-s0517a:1732_2: imā tisso sikkhāyo tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tāya satiyā tena manasikārena sikkhati āsevati
atk-s0517a:1732_3: bhāveti bahulīkarotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha yasmā purimanayena kevalaṃ
atk-s0517a:1732_4: assasitabbaṃ passasitabbameva ca, na aññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ, ito paṭṭhāya pana ñāṇuppādanādīsu
atk-s0517a:1732_5: yogo karaṇīyo. Tasmā tattha “assasāmīti pajānāti passasāmīti pajānāti”cceva vattamānakālavasena
atk-s0517a:1732_6: pāḷiṃ vatvā ito paṭṭhāya kattabbassa ñāṇuppādanādino ā-kārassa dassanatthaṃ “sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0517a:1732_7: assasissāmī”tiādinā nayena anāgatakālavasena pāḷi āropitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1733: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ…pe… sikkhatīti oḷārikaṃ assāsapassāsasaṅkhātaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento paṭippassambhento nirodhento vūpasamento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1734_0: Tatrevaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā ca passaddhi ca veditabbā – imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle
atk-s0517a:1734_1: kāyo ca cittañca sadarathā honti oḷārikā. Kāyacittānaṃ oḷārikatte avūpasante assāsapassāsāpi
atk-s0517a:1734_2: oḷārikā honti, balavatarā hutvā pavattanti, nāsikā nappahoti, mukhena assasantopi
atk-s0517a:1734_3: passasantopi tiṭṭhati. Yadā panassa kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā honti, tadā te santā
atk-s0517a:1734_4: honti vūpasantā. Tesu vūpasantesu assāsapassāsā sukhumā hutvā pavattanti, “atthi
atk-s0517a:1734_5: nu kho, natthī”ti vicetabbākārappattā honti. Seyyathāpi purisassa dhāvitvā pabbatā
atk-s0517a:1734_6: vā orohitvā mahābhāraṃ vā sīsato oropetvā ṭhitassa oḷārikā assāsapassāsā honti, nāsikā
atk-s0517a:1734_7: nappahoti, mukhena assasantopi passasantopi tiṭṭhati. Yadā panesa taṃ parissamaṃ
atk-s0517a:1734_8: vinodetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca allasāṭakaṃ hadaye katvā sītāya chāyāya nipanno hoti,
atk-s0517a:1734_9: athassa te assāsapassāsā sukhumā honti “atthi nu kho, natthī”ti vicetabbākārappattā,
atk-s0517a:1734_10: evamevaṃ imassa bhikkhuno apariggahitakāleti vitthāretabbaṃ. Tathā hissa pubbe apariggahitakāle
atk-s0517a:1734_12: pana atthi. Tenassa apariggahitakālato pariggahitakāle kāyasaṅkhāro sukhumo hoti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0517a:1737_0: Pariggahepi oḷāriko, paṭhamajjhānūpacāre sukhumo. Tasmimpi oḷāriko, paṭhamajjhāne
atk-s0517a:1737_1: sukhumo. Paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷāriko, dutiyajjhāne sukhumo. Dutiyajjhāne
atk-s0517a:1737_2: ca tatiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷāriko, tatiyajjhāne sukhumo. Tatiyajjhāne ca catutthajjhānūpacāre
atk-s0517a:1737_3: ca oḷāriko, catutthajjhāne atisukhumo appavattimeva pāpuṇāti. Idaṃ tāva dīghabhāṇakasaṃyuttabhāṇakānaṃ mataṃ.
atk-s0517a:1738_0: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “paṭhamajjhāne oḷāriko, dutiyajjhānūpacāre sukhumo”ti evaṃ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato
atk-s0517a:1738_1: uparūparijjhānūpacārepi sukhumataraṃ icchanti. Sabbesaṃyeva pana matena apariggahitakāle
atk-s0517a:1739_0: Vipassanāyaṃ pana apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro oḷāriko, mahābhūtapariggahe
atk-s0517a:1739_1: sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, upādārūpapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, sakalarūpapariggahe
atk-s0517a:1739_2: sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, arūpapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, rūpārūpapariggahe sukhumo.
atk-s0517a:1739_3: Sopi oḷāriko, paccayapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, sappaccayanāmarūpadassane sukhumo.
atk-s0517a:1739_4: Sopi oḷāriko, lakkhaṇārammaṇika vipassanāya sukhumo. Sopi dubbalavipassanāya oḷāriko,
atk-s0517a:1739_5: balavavipassanāya sukhumo. Tattha pubbe vuttanayeneva purimassa purimassa pacchimena
atk-s0517a:1739_6: pacchimena paṭippassaddhi veditabbā. Evamettha oḷārikasukhumatā paṭippassaddhi ca
atk-s0517a:1739_7: veditabbā. Ayaṃ tāvettha kāyānupassanāvasena vuttassa paṭhamacatukkassa anupubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a:1740_0: Yasmā panettha idameva catukkaṃ ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ, itarāni pana
atk-s0517a:1740_1: tīṇi catukkāni ettha pattajjhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena, tasmā imaṃ
atk-s0517a:1740_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā ānāpānacatukkajjhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0517a:1740_3: arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena ādikammikena kulaputtena visuddhimagge vuttanayena sīlaparisodhanādīni
atk-s0517a:1740_4: sabbakiccāni katvā sattaṅgasamannāgatassa ācariyassa santike pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1740_5: uggahetabbaṃ. Tatrime pañca sandhayo uggaho paripucchā upaṭṭhānaṃ appanā lakkhaṇanti.
atk-s0517a:1740_6: Tattha uggaho nāma kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ. Paripucchā nāma kammaṭṭhānassa paripucchanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1740_7: Upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānaṃ. Appanā nāma kammaṭṭhānassa appanā. Lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1740_8: nāma kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇaṃ, “evaṃ lakkhaṇamidaṃ kammaṭṭhāna”nti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvūpadhāraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1741_0: Evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhanto attanāpi na kilamati, ācariyampi na viheseti.
atk-s0517a:1741_1: Tasmā thokaṃ uddisāpetvā bahuṃ kālaṃ sajjhāyitvā evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1741_2: uggahetvā ācariyassa santike vā aññattha vā aṭṭhārasa dosayutte vihāre vajjetvā pañcaṅgasamannāgate
atk-s0517a:1741_4: paṭivinodetvā sukhanisinnena ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā ācariyuggahato
atk-s0517a:1741_5: ekapadampi aparihāpentena idaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ manasikāravidhi –
atk-s0517a:1744_0: Tattha gaṇanāti gaṇanāyeva. Anubandhanāti anugamanā. Phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Ṭhapanāti
atk-s0517a:1744_1: appanā. Sallakkhaṇāti vipassanā. Vivaṭṭanāti maggo. Pārisuddhīti phalaṃ. Tesañca
atk-s0517a:1744_2: paṭipassanāti paccavekkhaṇā. Tattha iminā ādikammikena kulaputtena paṭhamaṃ gaṇanāya
atk-s0517a:1744_3: idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ. Gaṇentena pana pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na ṭhapetabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1744_4: dasannaṃ upari na netabbaṃ, antarā khaṇḍaṃ na dassetabbaṃ. Pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhapentassa
atk-s0517a:1744_5: hi sambādhe okāse cittuppādo vipphandati sambādhe vaje sanniruddhagogaṇo viya. Dasannaṃ
atk-s0517a:1744_6: upari nentassa gaṇananissitova cittuppādo hoti. Antarā khaṇḍaṃ dassentassa “sikhāppattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1744_7: nu kho me kammaṭṭhānaṃ, no”ti cittaṃ vikampati, tasmā ete dose vajjetvā gaṇetabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1745_0: Gaṇentena ca paṭhamaṃ dandhagaṇanāya dhaññamāpakagaṇanāya gaṇetabbaṃ. Dhaññamāpako
atk-s0517a:1745_1: hi nāḷiṃ pūretvā “eka”nti vatvā okirati, puna pūrento kiñci kacavaraṃ disvā chaḍḍento
atk-s0517a:1745_2: “ekaṃ eka”nti vadati. Eseva nayo dve dvetiādīsu. Evamevaṃ imināpi assāsapassāsesu
atk-s0517a:1745_3: yo upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvā “ekaṃ eka”ntiādiṃ katvā yāva “dasa dasā”ti pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1745_4: pavattamānaṃ upalakkhetvāva gaṇetabbaṃ. Tassa evaṃ gaṇayato nikkhamantā ca pavisantā
atk-s0517a:1746_0: Athānena taṃ dandhagaṇanaṃ dhaññamāpakagaṇanaṃ pahāya sīghagaṇanāya gopālakagaṇanāya
atk-s0517a:1746_1: gaṇetabbaṃ. Cheko hi gopālako sakkharādayo ucchaṅgena gahetvā rajjudaṇḍahattho pātova
atk-s0517a:1746_2: vajaṃ gantvā gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā palighatthambhamatthake nisinno dvāraṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1746_3: pattaṃyeva gāvaṃ “eko dve”ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā khipitvā gaṇeti. Tiyāmarattiṃ sambādhe
atk-s0517a:1746_4: okāse dukkhaṃ vutthagogaṇo nikkhamanto aññamaññaṃ upanighaṃsanto vegena vegena puñjapuñjo
atk-s0517a:1746_5: hutvā nikkhamati. So vegena vegena “tīṇi cattāri pañca dasā”ti gaṇetiyeva, evamassāpi
atk-s0517a:1746_6: purimanayena gaṇayato assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hutvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ punappunaṃ sañcaranti.
atk-s0517a:1746_7: Tato tena “punappunaṃ sañcarantī”ti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca aggahetvā dvārappattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1746_8: dvārappattaṃyeva gahetvā “eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca, eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca
atk-s0517a:1746_9: cha, eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca cha satta…pe… aṭṭha nava dasā”ti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbameva.
atk-s0517a:1746_10: Gaṇanāpaṭibaddhe hi kammaṭṭhāne gaṇanabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti arittupatthambhanavasena
atk-s0517a:1747_0: Tassevaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0517a:1747_1: Atha “nirantaraṃ pavattatī”ti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0517a:1747_2: vegena vegena gaṇetabbaṃ. Antopavisanavātena hi saddhiṃ cittaṃ pavesayato abbhantaraṃ
atk-s0517a:1747_3: vātabbhāhataṃ medapūritaṃ viya hoti. Bahinikkhamanavātena saddhiṃ cittaṃ nīharato
atk-s0517a:1747_4: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipati. Phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhokāse pana satiṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0517a:1747_5: bhāventasseva bhāvanā sampajjati. Tena vuttaṃ – “anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā
atk-s0517a:1748_0: Kīvaciraṃ panetaṃ gaṇetabbanti? Yāva vinā gaṇanāya assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0517a:1748_1: Bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedaṃ katvā assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati saṇṭhāpanatthaṃyeva hi gaṇanāti.
atk-s0517a:1749_0: Evaṃ gaṇanāya manasi katvā anubandhanāya manasi kātabbaṃ. Anubandhanā nāma gaṇanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1749_1: paṭisaṃharitvā satiyā nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanaṃ. Tañca kho na ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena.
atk-s0517a:1749_2: Ādimajjhapariyosānāni tassānugamane ādīnavā ca heṭṭhā vuttāyeva.
atk-s0517a:1750_0: Tasmā anubandhanāya manasikarontena na ādimajjhapariyosānavasena manasi kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1750_1: apica kho phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabbaṃ. Gaṇanānubandhanāvasena
atk-s0517a:1750_2: viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi, phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva pana
atk-s0517a:1750_3: gaṇento gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karoti, tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te
atk-s0517a:1750_4: satiyā anubandhanto, appanāvasena ca cittaṃ ṭhapento “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya
atk-s0517a:1750_5: ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti vuccati. Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāsu vuttapaṅguḷadovārikopamāhi
atk-s0517a:1751_0: Tatrāyaṃ paṅguḷopamā – seyyathāpi paṅguḷo dolāya kīḷataṃ mātāputtānaṃ dolaṃ khipitvā
atk-s0517a:1751_1: tattheva dolāthambhamūle nisinno kamena āgacchantassa ca gacchantassa ca dolāphalakassa
atk-s0517a:1751_2: ubho koṭiyo majjhañca passati, na ca ubhokoṭimajjhānaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti,
atk-s0517a:1751_3: evameva bhikkhu sativasena upanibandhanatthambhamūle ṭhatvā assāsapassāsadolaṃ khipitvā
atk-s0517a:1751_4: tattheva nimitte satiyā nisīdanto kamena āgacchantānañca gacchantānañca phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0517a:1751_5: assāsapassāsānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchanto tattheva cittaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0517a:1751_6: passati, na ca tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti. Ayaṃ paṅguḷopamā.
atk-s0517a:1752_0: Ayaṃ pana dovārikopamā – seyyathāpi dovāriko nagarassa anto ca bahi ca purise “ko
atk-s0517a:1752_1: tvaṃ, kuto vā āgato, kuhiṃ vā gacchasi, kiṃ vā te hatthe”ti na vīmaṃsati. Na hi tassa
atk-s0517a:1752_2: te bhārā, dvārappattaṃ dvārappattaṃyeva pana vīmaṃsati, evameva imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0517a:1752_3: antopaviṭṭhavātā ca bahinikkhantavātā ca na bhārā honti, dvārappattā dvārappattāyeva
atk-s0517a:1753: Kakacūpamā pana “nimittaṃ assāsapassāsā”tiādinā nayena idha vuttāyeva. Idha panassa āgatāgatavasena amanasikāramattameva payojananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1754_0: Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto kassaci na cireneva nimittañca uppajjati, avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0517a:1754_1: appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjati. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato
atk-s0517a:1754_2: pabhuti yathā sāraddhakāyassa mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdato mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati vikūjati,
atk-s0517a:1754_3: paccattharaṇaṃ valiṃ gaṇhāti, asāraddhakāyassa pana nisīdato neva mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati
atk-s0517a:1754_4: na vikūjati, na paccattharaṇaṃ valiṃ gaṇhāti, tūlapicupūritaṃ viya mañcapīṭhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1754_5: Kasmā? Yasmā asāraddho kāyo lahuko hoti, evamevaṃ gaṇanāvasena manasikārakālato pabhuti
atk-s0517a:1754_6: anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi
atk-s0517a:1754_7: lahukaṃ hoti, sarīraṃ ākāse laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0517a:1755_0: Tassa oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhe sukhumaassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0517a:1755_1: Tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1756_0: Yathā hi aññāni kammaṭṭhānāni uparūpari vibhūtāni honti, na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ pana
atk-s0517a:1756_1: uparūpari bhāventassa sukhumattaṃ gacchati, upaṭṭhānampi na upagacchati. Evaṃ anupaṭṭhahante
atk-s0517a:1756_2: pana tasmiṃ tena bhikkhunā “ācariyaṃ pucchissāmī”ti vā “naṭṭhaṃ dāni me kammaṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0517a:1756_3: vā uṭṭhāyāsanā na gantabbaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ vikopetvā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ navanavameva
atk-s0517a:1757_0: Tatrāyaṃ āharaṇūpāyo – tena bhikkhunā kammaṭṭhānassa anupaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ñatvā iti
atk-s0517a:1757_1: paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “ime assāsapassāsā nāma kattha atthi, kattha natthi. Kassa vā
atk-s0517a:1757_2: atthi, kassa vā natthī”ti. Athevaṃ paṭisañcikkhato “ime antomātukucchiyaṃ natthi,
atk-s0517a:1757_3: udake nimuggānaṃ natthi, tathā asaññībhūtānaṃ matānaṃ catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1757_4: rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ nirodhasamāpannāna”nti ñatvā evaṃ attanāva attā paṭicodetabbo
atk-s0517a:1757_5: “nanu, tvaṃ paṇḍita, neva mātukucchigato, na udake nimuggo, na asaññībhūto, na mato,
atk-s0517a:1757_6: na catutthajjhānasamāpanno, na rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgī, na nirodhasamāpanno. Atthiyeva
atk-s0517a:1757_7: te assāsapassāsā, mandapaññatāya pana pariggahetuṃ na sakkosī”ti. Athānena pakatiphuṭṭhavasena
atk-s0517a:1757_8: cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo. Ime hi dīghanāsikassa nāsāpuṭaṃ ghaṭṭentā
atk-s0517a:1757_9: pavattanti, rassanāsikassa uttaroṭṭhaṃ. Tasmānena imaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ ghaṭṭentīti nimittaṃ
atk-s0517a:1757_10: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Imameva hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0517a:1757_11: muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatibhāvanaṃ vadāmī”ti. Kiñcāpi hi yaṃkiñci
atk-s0517a:1757_12: kammaṭṭhānaṃ satassa sampajānasseva sampajjati, ito aññaṃ pana manasikarontassa pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0517a:1757_13: hoti. Idaṃ pana ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ garukaṃ garukabhāvanaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1757_14: mahāpurisānaṃyeva manasikārabhūmibhūtaṃ, na ceva ittaraṃ, na ca ittarasattasamāsevitaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1757_15: Yathā yathā manasi karīyati, tathā tathā santañceva hoti sukhumañca. Tasmā ettha
atk-s0517a:1757_16: balavatī sati ca paññā ca icchitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1758_0: Yathā hi maṭṭhasāṭakassa tunnakaraṇakāle sūcipi sukhumā icchitabbā, sūcipāsavedhanampi
atk-s0517a:1758_1: tato sukhumataraṃ, evamevaṃ maṭṭhasāṭakasadisassa imassa kammaṭṭhānassa bhāvanākāle
atk-s0517a:1758_2: sūcipaṭibhāgā satipi sūcipāsavedhanapaṭibhāgā taṃsampayuttā paññāpi balavatī icchitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1758_3: Tāhi ca pana satipaññāhi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
atk-s0517a:1759_0: Yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasitvā balībadde muñcitvā gocaramukhe katvā chāyāya nisinno
atk-s0517a:1759_1: vissameyya, athassa te balībaddā vegena aṭaviṃ paviseyyuṃ. Yo hoti cheko kassako,
atk-s0517a:1759_2: so puna te gahetvā yojetukāmo na tesaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā aṭaviṃ āhiṇḍati. Atha kho
atk-s0517a:1759_3: rasmiñca patodañca gahetvā ujukameva tesaṃ nipātanatitthaṃ gantvā nisīdati vā nipajjati
atk-s0517a:1759_4: vā. Atha te goṇe divasabhāgaṃ caritvā nipātanatitthaṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā
atk-s0517a:1759_5: ca paccuttaritvā ṭhite disvā rasmiyā bandhitvā patodena vijjhanto ānetvā yojetvā
atk-s0517a:1759_6: puna kammaṃ karoti. Evamevaṃ tena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā
atk-s0517a:1759_7: pariyesitabbā. Satirasmiṃ pana paññāpatodañca gahetvā pakatiphuṭṭhokāse cittaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0517a:1759_8: manasikāro pavattetabbo. Evaṃ hissa manasikaroto na cirasseva te upaṭṭhahanti nipātanatitthe
atk-s0517a:1759_9: viya goṇā. Tato tena satirasmiyā bandhitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā paññāpatodena
atk-s0517a:1759_10: vijjhantena punappunaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ. Tassevamanuyuñjato na cirasseva
atk-s0517a:1759_11: nimittaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Taṃ panetaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ hoti, apica kho kassaci sukhasamphassaṃ
atk-s0517a:1759_12: uppādayamāno tūlapicu viya kappāsapicu viya vātadhārā viya ca upaṭṭhātīti ekacce āhu.
atk-s0517a:1760_0: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsu vinicchayo – idañhi kassaci tārakarūpaṃ viya maṇiguḷikā viya
atk-s0517a:1760_1: muttāguḷikā viya ca, kassaci kharasamphassaṃ hutvā kappāsaṭṭhi viya dārusārasūci
atk-s0517a:1760_2: viya ca, kassaci dīghapāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya kusumadāmaṃ viya dhūmasikhā viya ca, kassaci
atk-s0517a:1760_3: vitthataṃ makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya valāhakapaṭalaṃ viya padumapupphaṃ viya rathacakkaṃ
atk-s0517a:1760_4: viya candamaṇḍalaṃ viya sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhāti, tañca panetaṃ yathā sambahulesu
atk-s0517a:1760_5: bhikkhūsu suttantaṃ sajjhāyitvā nisinnesu ekena bhikkhunā “tumhākaṃ kīdisaṃ hutvā
atk-s0517a:1760_6: idaṃ suttaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti vutte eko “mayhaṃ mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viya hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti
atk-s0517a:1760_7: āha. Aparo “mayhaṃ ekā vanarāji viya”. Añño “mayhaṃ eko sītacchāyo sākhāsampanno
atk-s0517a:1760_8: phalabhārabharito rukkho viyā”ti. Tesañhi taṃ ekameva suttaṃ saññānānatāya nānato
atk-s0517a:1760_9: upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ekameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti. Saññajañhi etaṃ
atk-s0517a:1760_10: saññānidānaṃ saññāpabhavaṃ, tasmā saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1761_0: Evaṃ upaṭṭhite pana nimitte tena bhikkhunā ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ
atk-s0517a:1761_1: “mayhaṃ, bhante, evarūpaṃ nāma upaṭṭhātī”ti. Ācariyena pana “nimittamidaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0517a:1761_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ punappunaṃ manasi karohi sappurisā”ti vattabbo. Athānena nimitteyeva
atk-s0517a:1761_3: cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Evamassāyaṃ ito pabhuti ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-s0517a:1764_0: Tassevaṃ nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva,
atk-s0517a:1764_1: cittaṃ upacārasamādhinā samāhitameva. Athānena taṃ nimittaṃ neva vaṇṇato manasi kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1764_2: na lakkhaṇato paccavekkhitabbaṃ, apica kho khattiyamahesiyā cakkavattigabbho viya
atk-s0517a:1764_3: kassakena sāliyavagabbho viya ca āvāsādīni satta asappāyāni vajjetvā tāneva satta
atk-s0517a:1764_4: sappāyāni sevantena sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ, atha naṃ evaṃ rakkhitvā punappunaṃ manasikāravasena
atk-s0517a:1764_5: vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayitvā dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ, vīriyasamatā
atk-s0517a:1764_6: yojetabbā. Tassevaṃ ghaṭentassa visuddhimagge vuttānukkamena tasmiṃ nimitte catukkapañcakajjhānāni
atk-s0517a:1764_7: nibbattanti. Evaṃ nibbattacatukkapañcakajjhāno panettha bhikkhu sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena
atk-s0517a:1764_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmo tadeva jhānaṃ pañcahākārehi vasippattaṃ
atk-s0517a:1764_9: paguṇaṃ katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti. Kathaṃ? So hi samāpattito
atk-s0517a:1764_10: vuṭṭhāya assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti passati. Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā
atk-s0517a:1764_11: dhamamānāya bhastañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto sañcarati, evamevaṃ
atk-s0517a:1764_12: kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsāti. Tato assāsapassāse ca kāyañca rūpanti,
atk-s0517a:1764_13: cittañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme arūpanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0517a:1765_0: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesati, pariyesanto ca taṃ disvā
atk-s0517a:1765_1: tīsupi addhāsu nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ ārabbha kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, vitiṇṇakaṅkho kalāpasammasanavasena
atk-s0517a:1765_2: “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge uppanne
atk-s0517a:1765_3: obhāsādayo dasa vipassanupakkilese pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1765_4: “maggo”ti vavatthapetvā udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅgānupassanaṃ patvā nirantaraṃ bhaṅgānupassanena
atk-s0517a:1765_5: bhayato upaṭṭhitesu sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto yathākkamena
atk-s0517a:1765_6: cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhāya ekūnavīsatibhedassa paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa
atk-s0517a:1765_7: pariyantaṃ patto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti. Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1765_8: ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā samattā hotīti. Ayaṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0517a:1766_0: Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi, tasmā
atk-s0517a:1766_1: anupadavaṇṇanānayeneva tesaṃ evamattho veditabbo. Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ
atk-s0517a:1766_2: karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati. Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti
atk-s0517a:1766_3: paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
atk-s0517a:1767: Kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
atk-s0517a:1768_0: Kathaṃ asammohato? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ
atk-s0517a:1768_1: khayato vayato sammasati, tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena asammohato pīti
atk-s0517a:1768_2: paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbāni. Idaṃ panettha
atk-s0517a:1768_3: visesamattaṃ – tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena sukhapaṭisaṃviditā hoti. Catunnampi jhānānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1768_5: Passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāranti oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento, nirodhentoti
atk-s0517a:1768_6: attho. So vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vuttanayena veditabbo. Apicettha pītipade pītisīsena
atk-s0517a:1768_7: vedanā vuttā, sukhapade sarūpeneva vedanā. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesu “saññā ca vedanā
atk-s0517a:1768_8: ca cetasikā, ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato saññāsampayuttā
atk-s0517a:1768_9: vedanāti evaṃ vedanānupassanānayena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1769_0: Tatiyacatukkepi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃviditā veditabbā. Abhippamodayaṃ
atk-s0517a:1769_1: cittanti cittaṃ modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-s0517a:1769_2: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
atk-s0517a:1770_0: Kathaṃ samādhivasena? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati, so samāpattikkhaṇe sampayuttāya
atk-s0517a:1770_1: pītiyā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti. Kathaṃ vipassanāvasena? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā
atk-s0517a:1770_2: vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati. Evaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe jhānasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0517a:1770_3: pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti. Evaṃ paṭipanno “abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0517a:1771_0: Samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādivasena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento,
atk-s0517a:1771_1: tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato
atk-s0517a:1771_2: sammasato vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena uppajjati khaṇikacittekaggatā, evaṃ
atk-s0517a:1771_3: uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya vasenapi ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento
atk-s0517a:1772_0: Vimocayaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento, dutiyena
atk-s0517a:1772_1: vitakkavicārehi, tatiyena pītiyā, catutthena sukhadukkhehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
atk-s0517a:1772_2: tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato
atk-s0517a:1772_3: sammasati. So vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
atk-s0517a:1772_5: nandito, virāgānupassanāya rāgato, nirodhānupassanāya samudayato, paṭinissaggānupassanāya
atk-s0517a:1772_6: ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati ca. Tena vuccati – “vimocayaṃ
atk-s0517a:1772_7: cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti. Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ
atk-s0517a:1773_0: Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ, aniccatā veditabbā,
atk-s0517a:1773_1: aniccānupassanā veditabbā, aniccānupassī veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā.
atk-s0517a:1773_2: Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā. Aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathattaṃ, hutvā
atk-s0517a:1773_3: abhāvo vā, nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭṭhatvā khaṇabhaṅgena bhedoti attho. Aniccānupassanāti
atk-s0517a:1773_4: tassā aniccatāya vasena rūpādīsu “anicca”nti anupassanā. Aniccānupassīti tāya anupassanāya
atk-s0517a:1773_5: samannāgato. Tasmā evaṃbhūto assasanto ca passasanto ca idha “aniccānupassī assasissāmi
atk-s0517a:1774_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha pana dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca. Tattha khayavirāgoti
atk-s0517a:1774_1: saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo. Accantavirāgoti nibbānaṃ. Virāgānupassanāti tadubhayadassanavasena
atk-s0517a:1774_2: pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca. Tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto
atk-s0517a:1774_3: ca passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0517a:1775_0: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
atk-s0517a:1775_1: ca. Paṭinissaggoyeva anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā, vipassanāmaggānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1775_2: Vipassanāti tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati, saṅkhatadosadassanena
atk-s0517a:1775_3: ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
atk-s0517a:1775_4: cāti vuccati. Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0517a:1775_5: ārammaṇakaraṇena ca nibbāne pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
atk-s0517a:1775_6: cāti vuccati. Ubhayampi pana purimapurimañāṇānaṃ anuanu passanato anupassanāti vuccati.
atk-s0517a:1775_7: Tāya duvidhāyapi paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto ca passasanto
atk-s0517a:1776_0: Ettha ca “aniccānupassī”ti taruṇavipassanāya vasena vuttaṃ, “virāgānupassī”ti tato
atk-s0517a:1776_3: maggassa āsannabhūtāya atitikkhāya vipassanāya vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yattha
atk-s0517a:1776_4: pana maggopi labbhati, so abhinnoyeva. Evamidaṃ catukkaṃ suddhavipassanāvasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1778_0: 164. Idāni yathānikkhittaṃ mātikaṃ paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā dassetuṃ idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyātiādi
atk-s0517a:1778_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva
atk-s0517a:1778_2: kathitaṃ. Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati, tasseva khamanavasena
atk-s0517a:1778_3: khanti, ruccanavasena ruci, gahaṇavasena ādāyo, sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo, sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a:1778_4: vinayo, tadubhayenapi dhammavinayo, pavuttavasena pāvacanaṃ, seṭṭhacariyaṭṭhena brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1778_5: anusiṭṭhidānavasena satthusāsananti vuccati. Tasmā “imissā diṭṭhiyā”tiādīsu imissā
atk-s0517a:1778_6: buddhadiṭṭhiyā, imissā buddhakhantiyā, imissā buddharuciyā, imasmiṃ buddhaādāye,
atk-s0517a:1778_7: imasmiṃ buddhadhamme, imasmiṃ buddhavinaye, imasmiṃ buddhadhammavinaye, imasmiṃ buddhapāvacane,
atk-s0517a:1778_8: imasmiṃ buddhabrahmacariye, imasmiṃ buddhasatthusāsaneti attho veditabbo. Apicetaṃ
atk-s0517a:1778_9: sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sakalaṃ pāvacanaṃ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā
atk-s0517a:1778_10: sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi. Bhagavato khamanavasena khanti. Ruccanavasena
atk-s0517a:1778_11: ruci. Gahaṇavasena ādāyo. Attano kārakaṃ apāye apatamānaṃ dhāretīti dhammo. Sova
atk-s0517a:1778_12: saṃkilesapakkhaṃ vinetīti vinayo. Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo, kusaladhammehi
atk-s0517a:1778_13: vā akusaladhammānaṃ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo. Teneva vuttaṃ – “ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami,
atk-s0517a:1778_14: dhamme jāneyyāsi ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti, no sarāgāya…pe… ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-s0517a:1778_15: dhāreyyāsi eso dhammo eso vinayo etaṃ satthusāsana”nti. Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti
atk-s0517a:1781_0: Tathā “dhammena nayamānānaṃ, kā usūyā vijānata”nti. Dhammāya vā vinayo dhammavinayo.
atk-s0517a:1781_1: Anavajjadhammatthaṃ hesa vinayo, na bhavabhogāmisatthaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā – “nayidaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1781_2: bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanattha”nti vitthāro. Puṇṇattheropi āha –
atk-s0517a:1781_3: “anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti. Visuddhaṃ
atk-s0517a:1781_4: vā nayatīti vinayo, dhammato vinayo dhammavinayo. Saṃsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato
atk-s0517a:1781_5: vā esa visuddhaṃ nibbānaṃ nayati, dhammassa vā vinayo, na titthakarānanti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0517a:1781_6: Dhammabhūto hi bhagavā, tasseva esa vinayo. Yasmā vā dhammā eva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā
atk-s0517a:1781_7: pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca, tasmā esa dhammesu vinayo, na sattesu na jīvesu
atk-s0517a:1781_8: cāti dhammavinayo. Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṃ vacanato padhānaṃ vacananti pavacanaṃ,
atk-s0517a:1781_9: pavacanameva pāvacanaṃ. Sabbacariyāhi visiṭṭhacariyabhāvena brahmacariyaṃ. Devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1781_10: satthubhūtassa bhagavato sāsananti satthusāsanaṃ, satthubhūtaṃ vā sāsanantipi satthusāsanaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1781_11: “Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti
atk-s0517a:1781_12: hi dhammavinayova satthāti vutto. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo. Yasmā pana
atk-s0517a:1781_13: imasmiṃyeva sāsane sabbākāraānāpānassatisamādhinibbattako bhikkhu vijjati, na aññatra,
atk-s0517a:1781_14: tasmā tattha tattha “imissā”ti ca “imasmi”nti ca ayaṃ niyamo katoti veditabbo. Ayaṃ
atk-s0517a:1782_0: Puthujjanakalyāṇako vātiādinā ca bhikkhusaddassa vacanatthaṃ avatvā idhādhippetabhikkhuyeva
atk-s0517a:1782_1: dassito. Tattha puthujjano ca so kilesānaṃ asamucchinnattā, kalyāṇo ca sīlādipaṭipattiyuttattāti
atk-s0517a:1782_3: sekkho. Sotāpanno vā sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā. Akuppo calayitumasakkuṇeyyo arahattaphaladhammo
atk-s0517a:1782_4: assāti akuppadhammo. Sopi hi imaṃ samādhiṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0517a:1783_0: Araññaniddese vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti
atk-s0517a:1783_1: āgataṃ. Suttantapariyāyena āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1783_2: pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ. Vinayasuttantā pana ubhopi pariyāyadesanā
atk-s0517a:1783_3: nāma, abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0517a:1783_4: bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṃ, indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho. Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlantipi
atk-s0517a:1783_5: pāṭho, indakhīlaṃ atikkamitvā bahīti vuttaṃ hoti. Indakhīloti cettha gāmassa vā nagarassa vā ummāro.
atk-s0517a:1784_0: Rukkhamūlaniddese rukkhamūlassa pākaṭattā taṃ avatvāva yatthātiādimāha. Tattha yatthāti
atk-s0517a:1784_1: yasmiṃ rukkhamūle. Āsanti nisīdanti etthāti āsanaṃ. Paññattanti ṭhapitaṃ. Mañco vātiādīni
atk-s0517a:1784_2: āsanassa pabhedavacanāni. Mañcopi hi nisajjāyapi okāsattā idha āsanesu vutto. So
atk-s0517a:1784_5: cinitvā katā. Cammakhaṇḍoti nisajjāraho yo koci cammakhaṇḍo. Tiṇasantharādayo tiṇādīni
atk-s0517a:1784_6: gumbetvā katā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ rukkhamūle. Caṅkamati vātiādīhi rukkhamūlassa catuiriyāpathapavattanayogyatā
atk-s0517a:1784_7: kathitā. “Yatthā”tiādīhi sabbapadehi rukkhamūlassa sandacchāyatā janavivittatā ca
atk-s0517a:1784_8: vuttā hoti. Kenacīti kenaci samūhena. Taṃ samūhaṃ bhinditvā vitthārento gahaṭṭhehi
atk-s0517a:1784_9: vā pabbajitehi vāti āha. Anākiṇṇanti asaṃkiṇṇaṃ asambādhaṃ. Yassa senāsanassa samantā
atk-s0517a:1784_10: gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ hoti, na koci avelāya
atk-s0517a:1784_11: upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti, idaṃ santikepi anākiṇṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana aḍḍhayojanikaṃ vā
atk-s0517a:1784_12: yojanikaṃ vā hoti, idaṃ dūratāya eva anākiṇṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0517a:1785_0: Vihāroti aḍḍhayogādimuttako avasesāvāso. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṃ. Pāsādoti
atk-s0517a:1785_1: dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo. Hammiyanti upariākāsatale patiṭṭhitakūṭāgārapāsādoyeva.
atk-s0517a:1785_2: Guhāti iṭṭhakāguhā silāguhā dāruguhā paṃsuguhāti evañhi khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1785_3: Vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṃ antoyeva rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni
atk-s0517a:1785_4: ca dassetvā katasenāsanaṃ. Guhāti bhūmiguhā, yattha rattindivaṃ dīpaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0517a:1785_5: Pabbataguhā vā bhūmiguhā vāti idaṃ dvayaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ. Mātikāya sabbakālasādhāraṇalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0517a:1785_6: “nisīdatī”ti vattamānavacanaṃ kataṃ, idha pana nisinnassa bhāvanārambhasabbhāvato
atk-s0517a:1785_7: nisajjārambhapariyosānadassanatthaṃ nisinnoti niṭṭhānavacanaṃ kataṃ. Yasmā pana ujuṃ
atk-s0517a:1785_8: kāyaṃ paṇidhāya nisinnassa kāyo ujuko hoti, tasmā byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā adhippetama
atk-s0517a:1785_9: eva dassento ujukotiādimāha. Tattha ṭhito supaṇihitoti ujukaṃ paṇihitattā ujuko hutvā
atk-s0517a:1785_10: ṭhito, na sayamevāti attho. Pariggahaṭṭhoti pariggahitaṭṭho. Kiṃ pariggahitaṃ? Niyyānaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1785_11: Kiṃ niyyānaṃ? Ānāpānassatisamādhiyeva yāva arahattamaggā niyyānaṃ. Tenāhaniyyānaṭṭhoti
atk-s0517a:1785_12: mukhasaddassa jeṭṭhakatthavasena saṃsārato niyyānaṭṭho vutto. Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhoti sabhāvaṭṭhoyeva.
atk-s0517a:1785_13: Sabbehi panetehi padehi pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satiṃ katvāti attho vutto hoti. Keci
atk-s0517a:1785_14: pana “pariggahaṭṭhoti satiyā pariggahaṭṭho, niyyānaṭṭhoti assāsapassāsānaṃ pavisananikkhamanadvāraṭṭho”ti
atk-s0517a:1785_15: vaṇṇayanti. Pariggahitaassāsapassāsaniyyānaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0517a:1786_0: 165. Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti tāsu tāsu avatthāsu yathākkamena labbhamānānaṃ anavasesapariyādānavasena
atk-s0517a:1786_1: vuttaṃ. Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti mātikāya “dīgha”ntivuttaassāsavasena. Evaṃ sesesu.
atk-s0517a:1786_2: Ekaggatanti ekaggabhāvaṃ. Avikkhepanti avikkhipanaṃ. Ekaggatā eva hi nānārammaṇesu
atk-s0517a:1786_3: cittassa avikkhipanato avikkhepoti vuccati. Pajānatoti asammohavasena pajānantassa,
atk-s0517a:1786_4: vindantassāti vā attho. “Avikkhepo me paṭiladdho”ti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pajānantassa
atk-s0517a:1786_5: vā. Tāya satiyāti tāya upaṭṭhitāya satiyā. Tena ñāṇenāti tena avikkhepajānanañāṇena.
atk-s0517a:1786_6: Sato kārī hotīti ettha yasmā ñāṇasampayuttā eva sati satīti adhippetā, yathāha –
atk-s0517a:1786_7: “satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato”ti. Tasmā “sato”ti vacaneneva ñāṇampi gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0517a:1787_0: 166. Addhānasaṅkhāteti dīghasaṅkhāte kāle. Dīgho hi maggo addhānoti vuccati. Ayampi
atk-s0517a:1787_1: kālo dīghattā addhāno viya addhānoti vutto. “Assasatī”ti ca “passasatī”ti ca assāsañca
atk-s0517a:1787_2: passāsañca visuṃ visuṃ vatvāpi bhāvanāya nirantarappavattidassanatthaṃ “assasatipi
atk-s0517a:1787_3: passasatipī”ti puna samāsetvā vuttaṃ. Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanābhivuddhiyā bhiyyobhāvāya
atk-s0517a:1787_4: chando jāyati. Sukhumataranti passambhanasabbhāvato vuttaṃ. Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti
atk-s0517a:1787_5: bhāvanāpāripūriyā pīti jāyati. Assāsapassāsāpi cittaṃ vivattatīti assāsapassāse nissāya
atk-s0517a:1787_6: paṭibhāganimitte uppajjante pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati. Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti
atk-s0517a:1787_7: tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanāsamādhipattiyā puna samādhāne byāpārābhāvato
atk-s0517a:1787_8: tatramajjhattupekkhā saṇṭhāti nāma. Navahākārehīti ettha bhāvanārambhato pabhuti
atk-s0517a:1787_9: pure chanduppādā “assasatipi passasatipī”ti vuttā tayo ākārā, chanduppādato pabhuti
atk-s0517a:1787_10: pure pāmojjuppādā tayo, pāmojjuppādato pabhuti tayoti nava ākārā. Kāyoti cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi
atk-s0517a:1787_11: assāsapassāsā samūhaṭṭhena kāyo. Pakatiassāsapakatipassāse nissāya uppannanimittampi
atk-s0517a:1787_12: assāsapassāsāti nāmaṃ labhati. Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti taṃ ārammaṇaṃ upecca tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0517a:1787_13: sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Anupassanā ñāṇanti samathavasena nimittakāyānupassanā, vipassanāvasena
atk-s0517a:1787_14: nāmakāyarūpakāyānupassanā ñāṇanti attho. Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo upecca tiṭṭhati
atk-s0517a:1787_15: ettha satīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. No satīti so kāyo sati nāma na hotīti attho. Tāya satiyāti
atk-s0517a:1787_16: idāni vuttāya satiyā. Tena ñāṇenāti idāneva vuttena ñāṇena. Taṃ kāyaṃ anupassatīti
atk-s0517a:1787_17: samathavipassanāvasena yathāvuttaṃ kāyaṃ anugantvā jhānasampayuttañāṇena vā vipassanāñāṇena vā passati.
atk-s0517a:1788_0: Mātikāya kāyādīnaṃ padānaṃ abhāvepi imassa catukkassa kāyānupassanāvasena vuttattā
atk-s0517a:1788_1: idāni vattabbaṃ “kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā”ti vacanaṃ sandhāya kāyapadaniddeso
atk-s0517a:1788_2: kato. Kāye kāyānupassanāti bahuvidhe kāye tassa tassa kāyassa anupassanā. Atha vā
atk-s0517a:1788_3: kāye kāyānupassanā, na aññadhammānupassanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Aniccadukkhānattāsubhabhūte
atk-s0517a:1788_4: kāye na niccasukhattasubhānupassanā, atha kho aniccadukkhānattāsubhato kāyasseva
atk-s0517a:1788_5: anupassanā. Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā itthīti vā purisoti vā gahetabbassa
atk-s0517a:1788_6: kassaci ananupassanato tasseva kāyamattassa anupassanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upari vedanāsu
atk-s0517a:1788_7: vedanānupassanātiādīsu tīsupi eseva nayo. Satiyeva upaṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyānupassanāya
atk-s0517a:1788_8: sampayuttaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ, tassa bhāvanā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā.
atk-s0517a:1789_0: 167. Taṃ kāyanti aniddiṭṭhepi nāmarūpakāye kāyasaddena tassāpi saṅgahitattā niddiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0517a:1789_1: viya katvā vuttaṃ. Aniccānupassanādayo hi nāmarūpakāye eva labbhanti, na nimittakāye.
atk-s0517a:1789_2: Anupassanā ca bhāvanā ca vuttatthā eva. Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsavasenātiādi ānāpānassatibhāvanāya
atk-s0517a:1789_3: ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tassā hi sativepullatāñāṇavepullatā ca ānisaṃso. Tattha
atk-s0517a:1789_4: cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti paṭiladdhajjhānassa vipassanākāle cittekaggataṃ
atk-s0517a:1789_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Viditā vedanāti sāmaññato udayadassanena viditā vedanā. Viditā upaṭṭhahantīti
atk-s0517a:1789_6: khayato vayato suññato viditā upaṭṭhahanti. Viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti sāmaññato
atk-s0517a:1789_7: vayadassanena viditā vināsaṃ gacchanti, bhijjantīti attho. Saññāvitakkesupi eseva
atk-s0517a:1789_8: nayo. Imesu pana tīsu vuttesu sesā rūpadhammāpi vuttā honti. Kasmā pana ime tayo
atk-s0517a:1789_9: eva vuttāti ce? Duppariggahattā. Vedanāsu tāva sukhadukkhā pākaṭā, upekkhā pana sukhumā
atk-s0517a:1789_10: duppariggahā, na suṭṭhu pākaṭā. Sāpi cassa pākaṭā hoti, saññā ākāramattaggāhakattā
atk-s0517a:1789_11: na yathāsabhāvaggāhinī. Sā ca sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇaggāhakena vipassanāñāṇena sampayuttā
atk-s0517a:1789_12: ati viya apākaṭā. Sāpi cassa pākaṭā hoti, vitakko ñāṇapatirūpakattā ñāṇato visuṃ
atk-s0517a:1789_13: katvā duppariggaho. Ñāṇapatirūpako hi vitakko. Yathāha – “yā cāvuso visākha, sammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0517a:1789_14: yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti. Sopi cassa vitakko pākaṭo
atk-s0517a:1789_15: hotīti evaṃ duppariggahesu vuttesu sesā vuttāva hontīti. Imesaṃ pana padānaṃ niddese
atk-s0517a:1789_16: kathaṃ viditā vedanā uppajjantīti pucchitvā taṃ avissajjetvāva vedanuppādassa viditatteyeva
atk-s0517a:1789_17: vissajjite vedanāya viditattaṃ vissajjitaṃ hotīti kathaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hotītiādimāha.
atk-s0517a:1789_18: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Avijjāsamudayā avijjānirodhātiādayo heṭṭhā vuttatthā eva. Imināva
atk-s0517a:1789_19: nayena saññāvitakkāpi veditabbā. Vitakkavāre pana “phassasamudayā phassanirodhā”ti
atk-s0517a:1789_20: avatvā phassaṭṭhāne saññāsamudayā saññānirodhāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ kasmā iti ce? Saññāmūlakattā
atk-s0517a:1789_21: vitakkassa. “Saññānānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saṅkappanānatta”nti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1790_0: Aniccato manasikarototiādīsu ca “vedanaṃ aniccato manasikaroto”tiādinā nayena tasmiṃ
atk-s0517a:1790_1: tasmiṃ vāre so soyeva dhammo yojetabbo. Yasmā pana vipassanāsampayuttā vedanā vipassanākiccakaraṇe
atk-s0517a:1790_2: asamatthattā vipassanāya anupakārikā, tasmāyeva ca bodhipakkhiyadhammesu nāgatā.
atk-s0517a:1790_3: Vipassanāsampayuttāya pana saññāya kiccameva aparibyattaṃ, tasmā sā vipassanāya ekantamanupakārikā
atk-s0517a:1790_4: eva. Vitakkaṃ pana vinā vipassanākiccameva natthi. Vitakkasahāyā hi vipassanā sakakiccaṃ karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0517a:1791_0: “Paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1791_1: vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1791_2: hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṃ
atk-s0517a:1791_3: sakkoti, aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0517a:1791_4: evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti, abhiniropanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0517a:1791_5: pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyādāya
atk-s0517a:1792_0: Tasmā vedanāsaññānaṃ vipassanāya anupakārattā lakkhaṇamattavaseneva dassetuṃ “vedanāya
atk-s0517a:1792_1: saññāyā”ti tattha tattha ekavacanena niddeso kato. Yattako pana vipassanāya bhedo,
atk-s0517a:1792_2: tattako eva vitakkassāti dassetuṃ “vitakkāna”nti tattha tattha bahuvacanena niddeso
atk-s0517a:1793_0: 168. Puna dīghaṃ assāsapassāsavasenātiādi ānāpānassatibhāvanāya sampattiṃ bhāvanāphalañca
atk-s0517a:1793_1: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha samodhānetīti ārammaṇaṃ ṭhapeti, ārammaṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti
atk-s0517a:1793_2: vā attho. Samodahanabyāpārābhāvepi bhāvanāpāripūriyā eva samodahati nāma. Gocaranti
atk-s0517a:1793_3: vipassanākkhaṇe saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ, maggakkhaṇe phalakkhaṇe ca nibbānārammaṇaṃ. Samatthanti
atk-s0517a:1793_4: samameva attho, samassa vā atthoti samattho. Taṃ samatthaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0517a:1793_5: Maggaṃ samodhānetīti maggaphalakkhaṇeyeva gocaraṃ nibbānameva. Ayaṃ puggaloti ānāpānassatibhāvanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1793_6: anuyutto yogāvacarova. Imasmiṃ ārammaṇeti ettha pana “kāye”tipadena saṅgahite nāmarūpakāyasaṅkhāte
atk-s0517a:1793_7: saṅkhatārammaṇe teneva kamena magge nibbānārammaṇe ca. Yaṃ tassātiādīhi ārammaṇagocarasaddānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1793_8: ekatthatā vuttā. Tassāti tassa puggalassa. Pajānātīti puggalo pajānanā paññāti puggalo
atk-s0517a:1793_9: paññāya pajānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānanti vipassanākkhaṇe saṅkhārārammaṇassa,
atk-s0517a:1793_10: maggaphalakkhaṇe nibbānārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ sati. Ettha ca kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ
atk-s0517a:1793_11: yathā rañño upaṭṭhānanti. Avikkhepoti samādhi. Adhiṭṭhānanti yathāvuttasaṅkhārārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0517a:1793_12: nibbānārammaṇañca. Tañhi adhiṭṭhāti ettha cittanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Vodānanti ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1793_13: Tañhi vodāyati visujjhati tena cittanti vodānaṃ. Līnapakkhiko samādhi alīnabhāvappattiyā
atk-s0517a:1793_14: samabhūtattā samaṃ, uddhaccapakkhikaṃ ñāṇaṃ anuddhatabhāvappattiyā samabhūtattā samaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1793_15: Tena vipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhatā vuttā hoti. Sati
atk-s0517a:1793_16: pana sabbatthikattā tadubhayasamatāya upakārikāti samaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ samatādhiṭṭhānattā
atk-s0517a:1793_17: samaṃ. Anavajjaṭṭhoti vipassanāya anavajjasabhāvo. Niklesaṭṭhoti maggassa nikkilesasabhāvo.
atk-s0517a:1793_18: Nikkilesaṭṭhoti vā pāṭho. Vodānaṭṭhoti phalassa parisuddhasabhāvo. Paramaṭṭhoti nibbānassa
atk-s0517a:1793_19: sabbadhammuttamasabhāvo. Paṭivijjhatīti taṃ taṃ sabhāvaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0517a:1793_20: Ettha ca “ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhāna”ntiādīhi sammā paṭivedho vutto. Ettheva ca vodānaṭṭhapaṭivedhassa
atk-s0517a:1795: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. ;
atk-s0517a:1796_0: Anavajjaṭṭho nikkilesaṭṭho cettha avikkhepasaṅkhātassa samassa attho payojananti
atk-s0517a:1796_1: samattho, vodānaṭṭho vipassanāmaggavodānaṃ sandhāya samameva atthoti samattho, phalavodānaṃ
atk-s0517a:1796_2: sandhāya maggavodānasaṅkhātassa samassa atthoti samattho, paramaṭṭho pana samameva
atk-s0517a:1796_3: atthoti vā nibbānapayojanattā sabbassa samassa atthoti vā samattho, taṃ vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0517a:1796_4: samañca samatthañca ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ katvā samatthañca paṭivijjhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0517a:1796_5: Indriyabalabojjhaṅgadhammā vipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇepi labbhanti, maggo ca tisso
atk-s0517a:1796_6: ca visuddhiyo maggaphalakkhaṇeyeva, vimokkho ca vijjā ca khaye ñāṇañca maggakkhaṇeyeva,
atk-s0517a:1796_7: vimutti ca anuppāde ñāṇañca phalakkhaṇeyeva, sesā vipassanākkhaṇepīti. Dhammavāre
atk-s0517a:1796_8: ime dhamme imasmiṃ ārammaṇe samodhānetīti nibbānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā yathāyogaṃ veditabbā.
atk-s0517a:1796_9: Idaṃ pana yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Avuttatthā panettha heṭṭhā vuttā eva. Ekekacatukkavasenettha
